descriptionHTML:
Join millions of players worldwide as you build your village, raise a clan, and compete in epic Clan Wars!

Mustachioed Barbarians, fire wielding Wizards, and other unique troops are waiting for you!

New Features:
● Journey to the Builder Base and discover new buildings and characters in a new mysterious world.
● Battle with all new troops, including Raged Barbarian, Sneaky Archer, Boxer Giant, Bomber, Cannon Cart, and the new Hero Battle Machine.
● Go head to head with other players in the new Versus battle mode.

Classic Features:
● Join a Clan of fellow players or start your own and invite friends.
● Fight in Clan Wars as a team against other players across the globe.
● Defend your village with a multitude of cannons, bombs, traps, mortars, and walls.
● Fight against the Goblin King in a campaign through the realm.
● Plan unique battle strategies with countless combinations of spells, troops, and Heroes!
● Friendly Challenges, Friendly Wars, and special events.
● Train unique troops with multiple levels of upgrades.

PLEASE NOTE! Clash of Clans is free to download and play, however, some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you don't want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases in your device's settings. Also, under our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy, you must be at least 13 years of age to play or download Clash of Clans.

A network connection is also required.

Support: Chief, are you having problems? Visit http://supercell.helpshift.com/a/clash-of-clans/ or http://supr.cl/ClashForum or contact us in game by going to Settings > Help and Support.

Privacy Policy: http://www.supercell.net/privacy-policy/

Terms of Service: http://www.supercell.net/terms-of-service/

Parent’s Guide: http://www.supercell.net/parents

comments: I think it's a good game but sometimes the ball would go in but then it bounces out you should also add modes, one like there are walls all around and I like the game keep making these addictive games:D also all you guys stop with the adds just turn off your WiFi let them have some money after hard work on many game's like would you want to make a game and not get money and just get  ALL YOUR COMMENTS WITH ADDS! ohhh that would be soo annoying.

Ya hate ads? Turn off wifi and play. Stupid phone/gaming noobs. Its a good game and dont hate on it for ads. The ads make the people who made the game MONEY. Give then a break. Let them have money while u watch something u might want. If u wanna turn it off, like i said, turn off wifi.

I love the game it is so simple yet super fun. Just the only down side is that there are WAY to many ads. I stared playing a round and then an ad pops up.. Like really. At least put a 15 second ad up after the round is finished where you can choose to wat h and ad to continue after you have missed and your time is up. If that person skips the chance then put up and ad. Or just remove them. Thank you dev for the lovely game though ¬∂:

Don't get me wrong this app is addicting and fun. The thing that ruins this app is ads. For a game were it is meant to be played in quick bursts and you aren't meant to succeed for long periods of time, i don't understand how you can put an ad after every attempt. Sure one per 3 to 5 games and the another 30 second ad, but at the rate they come this game isn't fun anymore. The craziest thing to me is that i can't find a way to invest a few cents into the app to perma-block the ads. Come on dev i know you can do better than this. I will adjust the rating when i am offered a solution. Until then this 4 to 5 star app has 1 to 2 star potential.

It would be 5 stars if for one, the ball didn't just disappear more or less everytime it goes of the screen. And two, if the ball actually moved when i tap the screen rather than decide to just lay on the ground like a dead badger. As for reason three, there are waaaay to many ads. It asks me if i want to watch an ad to continue so then i press no and it still makes me watch an ad, that's just cheap. I understand they have to make money but this is a whole different story here. But  when it does decide to work and when i turn my wifi off, its pretty fun.
Would pay for the game to remove ads. I get you can turn off WiFi/data but it shouldn't be necessary, and is unfair to the company itself. Please offer a paid ad-free version!

comments: I used to play this game a couple years ago, and at the time, it had satisfying gameplay and great time killing qualities. I used to love it then and I still do now, but I've recently noticed pretty annoying glitch that's driving me away from the game. For some reason, a few hours after I download the game, it doesn't allow me to enter the game anymore. When I open the game,  it will run smoothly up until the point when it reaches the loading screen and simply returns me to the home screen. I try to reopen it and the same thing happens. I'm not really sure why this happens, but until this glitch is gone, I will be forced to stay away from the game entirely as the only way to fix this glitch is to download the game again which is quite time consuming.

description: Welcome to the dojo, ninja. Your objective: become a master of slicing fruit! What better way to do that than play Fruit Ninja, the original hit fruit-slicing mobile game? üçâUnsheathe your blade and start the juicy carnage with the three classic game modes that billions of players have come to know and love. Experience the thrill of setting a new high score in the fan-favourite Arcade mode as you focus on dodging bombs and slicing massive combos with the help of the special Double Score, Freeze or Frenzy bananas. Need something less intense? Simply relax and slash for stress relief in Zen Mode. Finally, cut as much as you can in the endless Classic mode ‚Äì just avoid the bombs and make sure you don‚Äôt drop the fruit! Make your game even more exciting by equipping special powerups that will give your score a juicy boost. üçìOnce you‚Äôve sharpened your skills and reflexes, put them to the test in Event mode, where you‚Äôll enter challenging and intense clashes with characters like Truffles the pig, Mari and Rinjin for the chance to win unique swords and dojos that can be used in Classic, Zen and Arcade mode. Spice up your day and make yourself more energetic in our daily Challenge mode - can you out-slice the other ninjas for special prizes and glory? üèÜProve to your friends and family that you‚Äôre the top ninja around. Show them how much you can cut in a shared-screen local multiplayer match, or compare your score with your friends to rise through the ranks and reach the top of the leaderboard! Big fan of Fruit Ninja: Puss in Boots? Be sure to challenge yourself with the entertaining and addictive minigames and find your favourite! üçíWhat are you waiting for? Whether you're playing for some mindless fun and trying to relax and pass the time, or trying to improve your skills as a master ninja, this is the game for you. Enjoy the awesomeness and believe the hype of Fruit Ninja ‚Äì chop chop! ‚öîÔ∏èView our privacy policy at http://halfbrick.com/pp View our terms of service at http://halfbrick.com/tosNeed help with the game? Email us at fruitninja@halfbrick.com
descriptionHTML:
Welcome to the dojo, ninja. Your objective: become a master of slicing fruit! What better way to do that than play Fruit Ninja, the original hit fruit-slicing mobile game? 🍉

Unsheathe your blade and start the juicy carnage with the three classic game modes that billions of players have come to know and love. Experience the thrill of setting a new high score in the fan-favourite Arcade mode as you focus on dodging bombs and slicing massive combos with the help of the special Double Score, Freeze or Frenzy bananas. Need something less intense? Simply relax and slash for stress relief in Zen Mode. Finally, cut as much as you can in the endless Classic mode – just avoid the bombs and make sure you don’t drop the fruit! Make your game even more exciting by equipping special powerups that will give your score a juicy boost. 🍓

Once you’ve sharpened your skills and reflexes, put them to the test in Event mode, where you’ll enter challenging and intense clashes with characters like Truffles the pig, Mari and Rinjin for the chance to win unique swords and dojos that can be used in Classic, Zen and Arcade mode. Spice up your day and make yourself more energetic in our daily Challenge mode - can you out-slice the other ninjas for special prizes and glory? 🏆

Prove to your friends and family that you’re the top ninja around. Show them how much you can cut in a shared-screen local multiplayer match, or compare your score with your friends to rise through the ranks and reach the top of the leaderboard! Big fan of Fruit Ninja: Puss in Boots? Be sure to challenge yourself with the entertaining and addictive minigames and find your favourite! 🍒

What are you waiting for? Whether you're playing for some mindless fun and trying to relax and pass the time, or trying to improve your skills as a master ninja, this is the game for you. Enjoy the awesomeness and believe the hype of Fruit Ninja – chop chop! ⚔️

View our privacy policy at http://halfbrick.com/pp
View our terms of service at http://halfbrick.com/tos
Need help with the game? Email us at fruitninja@halfbrick.com
developerAddress: 23 Musgrave Road, Red Hill, Queensland 4059, Australia
recentChanges: General bug fixes and minor improvements.
summary: Fruit is waiting to be sliced, ninja. Play the hit mobile game for free!
title: Fruit Ninja¬Æ

comments: Ive been playing for the better part of a year, and this game started out great for a long while. But IGG not only panders and gives better deals to Chinese people, cheaper packs etc. But literally 99% of all mega guilds and players are Chinese or Vietnamese. If your not asain don't play this game  you'll end up like me playing forever just to quit because of the obvious discrimination IGG holds with its playerbase

Not a good game for new players.  Was fun and  interesting at first but you qucikly realise that you are just food for high level players with no way to reach a defensible level.  High level players basically teleport in, raid everyone and teleport out.  They should lock servers to keep it balanced and give more guidance for new players. This game is  clearly weighted towards the people who have been playing it the longest. Dont waste your time

Kingdom 249 is open before just 50 days back. And one guild have 2B might. Most of the guys have millions of might one of them got 700M might. How's this is possible. Kingdom 277 is opened before 15 days back but one guild K03 got more powerful. Top guys got 120M might in just 15 days. Does IGG employees playing this game. We are lover of this game please don't lose your credibility. This two kingdom which I observed only Chinese players are strong. How overall kingdom only Chinese players got higher might in less time.

This game is fun but be prepared for the mother of all Pay2win games.  These folks at IGG are experts at crafting new and exciting ways at fleecing their customers of every cent they can.  You CANNOT compete if u dont pay and pay often.  Players here ...just regular people... dump hundreds of rl $$$ regularly.  You have been warned.

Do NOT go for high level military research without searching monster hunting, and Do NOT go for T4 if you not going to spent thousands of dollars. descriptionHTML:
Want to clash with 110 million global players? Dive into LORDS MOBILE, the real-time strategy mobile MMO game chosen as one of Google Play's Most Competitive Games, and an Android Excellence Game of 2017!

Explore exotic magical lands thrown into chaos by terrifying monsters and powerful enemies. Choose your favorite heroes, make new friends, and charge fearlessly into war! Strike down your foes and build an empire!

FEATURES
☆ An Open-World Mobile Game ☆
Join with millions of players in an open world, on mobile! See, chat, and clash with other players in this MMO game!
☆ Finding Friends ☆
Unite your allies in your kingdom and ride into war together!
☆ Rule as the Emperor ☆
Claim the throne in a battle royale for the kingdom! Will your legacy as a ruler be just or cruel?!
☆ Powerful Heroes ☆
Recruit and upgrade heroes with unique skills and character! Let them lead your kingdom to glory, or mix and match them to complete an RPG-style campaign that you will want to play again and again!
☆ Master Your Strategy ☆
How will you prepare your troops for the clash? Think of new lineups and perfect your strategy! Find the best way to strike down your opponent in this top-notch mobile MMO SLG!
☆ Animated Battles ☆
Experience the thrill of war as armies clash in beautiful 3D graphics!
☆ Switching Kingdoms ☆
Establish your empire on new lands by moving to any server you want with a simple tap! Get mobile!
☆ Choose Your Path ☆
Will you conquer enemy kingdoms and imprison rival lords? Will you liberate prisoners of war? Or will your kingdom and empire crumble to dust?
☆ Summon Familiars ☆
Forge pacts with fearsome monsters and make them Familiars! Train and groom your new companions to their full potential. With their powers by your side, nothing can stand in your way!

Write your own legacy, only in LORDS MOBILE!

Official Facebook Page: https://www.facebook.com/LordsMobile

descriptionHTML:
🎱Relaxed Game of 8 Ball🎱

Billiards City is a modern arcade style pool game with single player, If you love a relaxed game of 8 ball, this is the game for you!

With Billiards City, gameplay is king! Billiards City uses the latest technology to create the most exciting and realistic billiards simulator. Experience pool like never before, thanks to the stunning HD graphics, fantastic playability and ultra realistic ball physics. Challenge a variety of stylish new level of different ability from beginner right up to pro level. Hone your skills, improve your game and defeat the opposition to gain access to new city bars, win trophies and become the acclaimed Billiards City Champion!

Play BILLIARDS CITY and become mesmerised by our balls and decals, so join us please, and just have fun playing pool!!

Key Features
🎱 Amazing Single Player Mode
🎱 Powerful simulation with accurate ball physics
🎱 Realistic 3D ball animation
🎱 Touch control for moving the stick
🎱 Super smooth controls

Grab a cue and play now!

comments: One way to check how much products I have left is by touching the machine and thr corresponding product but sometimes the game will assume  that you are putting the product into production hence it will put the product into production whether you want it or not so it will waste production time. Sometimes the touch is too sensitive. Sometimes the touch is not sensitive enough which forces me to drag the product into the production slot up to 10 ten times just to start production. I know this feedback is not much but maybe an undo button will help. It makes the gameplay million times difference if you  put your players comfort a priority.

They keep taking my diamonds and telling me I spent them somewhere. Like I spent 19 on fast tracking 1 Coco tree while I have Tom for 6 days and 102 Coco's in my silo then tell me they can't refund it because I'm a liar! They took 50 from my husband and only refunded him 30!! Super cell is ripping players off!!

I buy an axe it will last forever same thing with other tools but here I have to keep buying tools to do the job. An if I need more crop I get the land ready for more seeding get the water. This you have to bring in more people that never show up to do the work. That's why if I'm going to farm I count on one person me. Here you need others. It not for me.

Long time player returning to the game after taking a break. I leveled up to level 41 today. Before leveling up it showed I should get 1 white and 1 black rabbit with the new level but I didn't get either of them. I would also like to see it a bit easier to get wildlife refuge animals. 36 puzzle pieces seems a bit much.

descriptionHTML:
Best. Farm. Ever. Welcome to Hay Day, the most popular farming game on mobiles and tablets, number one in 122 countries.

Learn the lay of the land, tend to your crops, and trade goods with neighbors and friends. It’s a real special place where the crops never die even though it never rains. Sharing the farm with our quirky animals only makes things more fun!

PLEASE NOTE! Hay Day is free to download and install. However, some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you do not want to use this feature, please set up password protection for purchases in the settings of your Google Play Store app. A network connection is also required.

~~~~~~~~~~
FEATURES
~~~~~~~~~~
♥ Grow and customize your farm
♥ Trade crops and fresh goods with neighbors and friends through your very own roadside shop
♥ Fulfill orders with your truck and even by steamboat
♥ Repair your dock and cast your lure to fish the waters
♥ Build your own town and welcome visitors

~~~~~~~~~~~
MEDIA MENTIONS
~~~~~~~~~~~

Hay Day‘s presentation is fairly cinematic for a mobile game. It’s eye candy. [...] If you’re a fan of simulation games, Hay Day is visually pleasing and will definitely keep your inner agriculturalist giddy for hours

http://www.gamezebo.com/2012/07/03/hay-day-review/

Watching your crops grow and your twee factories spew out products is a quietly pleasing experience.

comments: Why I liked it? Because it's a simple game that doesn't make you addicted to phone but rather enjoy going forward focusing your attention entirely on your finger. What comes to music as I read in comments, I always play games without music so haven't listened to this game's. I play this game as a reward after working hard and I'm entirely satisfied. There have been no crashes so far. Lots of ads, though.

I mean the game in itself is......alright  it could be a lot better.  I think the controls are rubbish and I understand it's meant to be "skillfull" but thats harder than skillfull, you can't even see where the circle is, this also adds to the game being bad. Having said all this you have also added rubbish music..... like you could have put something decent on. I get even more of an urge to uninstall the game every time I play it. Overall I definitely do NOT recommend this game. Game developers I hope you read this as it will probably help you to make the game better. I understand it would take a while but I don't care. If any of the game developers want to feedback on my feedback you are welcome to.Thank you.
This is game is ok if you are bored and don't know what to do.... however it becomes irritating after playing for a while.... overall its a nice game
I would like to report a bug. When you pause the game, moving obstacles keep moving. Someone would use this as a cheat
This is the best game to relax. But i have a problem i do i change the music there are some music that i like and i want only that to play so i request ro put a music option  Thank you

It's ok because the controls are horrible I say that this game is very annoying and that you should not play it if you are stressed because it will irratate you even more it is an ok game if you are bored and do not know what to do

comments: Is this game for You? Do you enjoy spending most of the game watching ads? Do you enjoy games that make it impossible to play without spending real money? Do you enjoy being grabbed by the crotch so hard you change genders?  If you answered yes or no to any of these then no this game is not for you. It's nothing but a crappy game designed to rake in as much money as possible, rather than making something fun. Forced to watch 30 second ads after each round. Forced to use the currency you earn when you don't want too. Enemy power will suddenly jump up 10 fold making spells and goldimpossible to gain without watching an addition 30 second ad. Even if you win and get the key you are forced to watch a 30 sec ad to unlock as if you didn't get a key.

Should be called adzy. During the level theres an ad banner at the bottom. At the end of every level there's an ad, some you can't skip and have to wait an entire 30 secs to sit through. To make matters worse, the chests can be boosted by 50% by watching, you guessed it, an ad.  They don't even give you a shop option to remove ads for a small amount of money or some sort of package. Pure plain greed

All in all it is a really great game there are very few ads, its fun, the graphics are crisp. Its amazing except for one thing. On one of the levels all of the monsters have exactly 666 health and im not religious or anything but I'm pretty sure that if some one who is religious see's that, well lets just say that it might not be good for the company, so I suggest you fix this.  Thanks.

Good little time waster, simple classic gameplay but puts its own unique twist on it.   Side note: I clearly played this game more than they thought anyone would as I have started getting repeated designs when I upgrade my spells xD

It stopped working on my One plus! Help! I was excited about the side games! *********************************** Excellent, addictive fun. I reached shield 135 (level 1154) and it doesn't level up any more. Gutted! Still a great game but so sad I can't progress any more. No reason why really! Incidentally, good for helping kids with Mathematics.

This game is simple. So simple that it is stupidly addictive at times when my mental and physical ability equates to a bowl of fruit. Nothing in this game brings me more satisfaction than the immensity of lag when bolts are caught in rapid bounce in a confined space. I say that with the utmost sincerity, no sarcasm at all. The lag is so intense, so joyful to watch. Please don't take it away from me. It is beautiful.
description: Looking for a way to enter the world of magic? Well then look no further than Bounzy! - the newest title by Gram Games. You‚Äôre a mage, facing an onslaught of fantastic beasts. Using your mystic powers, fight them back, and protect your town. As your spells strike the beasts, they will lose health - just make sure they‚Äôre fully vanquished before they reach you. Each attack you stave off will reward you with a chest. Destroy all enemies to find its key and unlock valuable diamonds and gold, which you can use to improve your strength and skill.The more powerful your spells, and the stronger your defenses, the more likely you are to succeed. Visit the laboratory to build the strength of your spells. Venture into the academy to learn special spells that will help you to defeat the enemies. And make sure to maintain the strength of your wall - these beasts have a knack for breaking through faulty barriers.Think you can protect your town? Try Bounzy! today.
descriptionHTML:
Looking for a way to enter the world of magic? Well then look no further than Bounzy! - the newest title by Gram Games. You’re a mage, facing an onslaught of fantastic beasts. Using your mystic powers, fight them back, and protect your town. As your spells strike the beasts, they will lose health - just make sure they’re fully vanquished before they reach you. Each attack you stave off will reward you with a chest. Destroy all enemies to find its key and unlock valuable diamonds and gold, which you can use to improve your strength and skill.

The more powerful your spells, and the stronger your defenses, the more likely you are to succeed. Visit the laboratory to build the strength of your spells. Venture into the academy to learn special spells that will help you to defeat the enemies. And make sure to maintain the strength of your wall - these beasts have a knack for breaking through faulty barriers.

Think you can protect your town? Try Bounzy! today.

comments: I used to play this game a long time ago with my brother. I thought since after all these years so many new updates have come, the game must feel different. But it's the same. I love the tune that plays as you play it. It's so nostalgic. My brother isn't anymore with me but playing this game makes me really very happy. It's just like I am back in those old days. Specially for me, as it has so many memories, this game is the absolute best.

The game is really addictive. but repeated zombie birds are generated and diamonds are getting wasted. Please change that. One bird one time please. One bird should be at max 3 level not another set. It's wasting my internet to watch video to get diamonds for collecting birds

I personally loved this game. First off,  u cant jump for high periods of time cause u to run into the bombs. Secondly, whats sup with these prices? Thats ridiculous. You cant level up with prices that high and u have to buy üíé gems and coins just to get a level up... But tum... Very great game overall.

I love this game cause it kills our time when were bored. Yep, we, my mom also is addicted to this game hahaha, shes always getting my phone and play this game whenever im sleeping. Love it, I recommend this game to everyoneüíñ you'll be definitely love this game. MobiGame you slaaaay hahaha

I was confident to delete the app from my phone cos it says that the game will be saved on my fb acc. But only the highest score remained and the potion got back to 1. I was already at 56! Deym! Ayusin nyo buhay nyo! Sayang effort ko! Aba!
Too much bombs. Like i have 16 zombies and they put 7 bombs in a row! How am i supposed to win if i cant jump that high with all those bombs in the way.

comments: I Love Gardenscapes and It Is Fun Way to Be Creative.  A Recent Update has Made it Definitely Better.  The Support Team Has Been Exceptional With Quick Responses and Answers!  There is Room for Improvement in the Amount of Coins Obtained in Completing Tasks, as Well as Eliminating Repetitious Tasks Requiring More Moves.

Addictive, colourful and charming. I love it because I've spent zero real money on it and am at over level 280! I only use my in game coins when I'm desperate and I'm fine only playing a few times a day to let lives regenerate. Some levels are so frustrating but that's why you save the coins!

I believe the game would be more relaxing if the timed levels were either gone or longer.  Also, 2 stars to complete almost anything is ridiculous.  Takes me a week to play a day.  And the rewards for levels should be higher.  Otherwise, the graphics are nice. The rewards are getting better, would still like 1 star to complete a task.

Addictive, waiting 30 mins for a life is a pain. Also some of the levels are redicilously hard, esp when u get a rubbish sequence, always happens on lemonade levels!  Reason for 3 stars is mostly because, when u have struggled to get the stars for a task, when u open it, it's all chat & u have to get more stars to complete the actual task, I think that's unfair, 3 stars for a phone call, then another 3 for the job?  And the safe task? No option not to do it & can only prevail of the gamers winnings if u spend real money to buy the coins you earned.

Enjoyable but just not enough lives. Phone conversations could be on 1 screen. I know that you can skip them but you might miss something important. Fed up with doing things like using lives to make calls and feeding and training the dog.  I originally gave it a higher rating, but now I've played for some time I realise it's not as great as I thought.  Too many lives used to gain just 1 star now. Need to be able to decorate more.

Should make the money in higher value as it is very hard to accumulate.  Poor marks because it takes so much of your hard earned levels and drops you down the ranks if you don't solve immediately.  I was at ruby level and have so many points taken away now I am back to silver....uninstalling thanks for nothing.

comments: This is by far the best chess "trainer" for me.  It's got a nice flow and the game isn't "stupid" like most other chess apps/games I've played.  I plat at least a few games every night and I feel like it give me a nice challenge and makes me really think about the moves I'm making.  Especially at the higher difficulty levels.  Overall a great chess app with no glitches and a good brain inside of it.  A must for a chess player with any real skill at the game.

I really was worried it would be too easy or too tough. tho I am not a master, yet, I know my way around the board.  I realized it has been making me a spectacular player ..the computer does not just do the same dumb moves over and over its almost like its stalking me like prey around the board! ha great game!!!-!!

I love this game and the best brain exerciser game ever in the history.  The cool 3d view makes the game as if I am playing on the real board, very good graphics. However, it doesn't show the list of killed chessman during game play the only drawback. I am expecting this upgradation and this will be the perfect Android chess.

For the non experts, let me tell you that 5his game cheats. I sat with a real chessboard to analyse why wasn't I  able to crack master level.   And what i observed was it didn't allow you to make actual moves when you show high levels of intell8gence. Sometimes it makes moves which are faulty. I think there is some mistakes in coding, perhaps deliberately made.  So not a fair play but a foul play.

So far it's o.k. I like the fact that it is simply a chess game with no fancy sound effects or graphics. I see no real reason to have the higher difficulty levels locked out until they are beaten but they are. I got it to practice with. It is useful for that. It's not bad...Just a simple down to earth chess game

The game has been drawn because the other player has no legal move and is not in check. If they can ot move then I win because they cannot move to a legal position. The computer ends the games too early because they cannot be bothered to chase you around the board. You cannot unlock the higher difficulty games because it just says draw.
description: Chess in your AndroidChess is a board game for two players. It is played on a square board, made of 64 smaller squares, with eight squares on each side. Each player starts with sixteen pieces: eight pawns, two knights, two bishops, two rooks, one queen and one king. The goal of the game is for each player to try and checkmate the king of the opponent. Checkmate is a threat ('check') to the opposing king which no move can stop. It ends the game.During the game the two opponents take turns to move one of their pieces to a different square of the board. One player ('White') has pieces of a light color; the other player ('Black') has pieces of a dark color. There are rules about how pieces move, and about taking the opponent's pieces off the board. The player with white pieces always makes the first move. Because of this, White has a small advantage, and wins more often than Black in tournament games.Chess is popular and is often played in competitions called chess tournaments. It is enjoyed in many countries, and is a national hobby in Russia.Features:- five different themes- seven levels of difficulty- two players mode- game assistant (Helper)- realistic graphics- sound effects- small size
descriptionHTML:
Chess in your Android

Chess is a board game for two players. It is played on a square board, made of 64 smaller squares, with eight squares on each side. Each player starts with sixteen pieces: eight pawns, two knights, two bishops, two rooks, one queen and one king. The goal of the game is for each player to try and checkmate the king of the opponent. Checkmate is a threat ('check') to the opposing king which no move can stop. It ends the game.

During the game the two opponents take turns to move one of their pieces to a different square of the board. One player ('White') has pieces of a light color; the other player ('Black') has pieces of a dark color. There are rules about how pieces move, and about taking the opponent's pieces off the board. The player with white pieces always makes the first move. Because of this, White has a small advantage, and wins more often than Black in tournament games.

Chess is popular and is often played in competitions called chess tournaments. It is enjoyed in many countries, and is a national hobby in Russia.

Features:

- five different themes
- seven levels of difficulty
- two players mode
- game assistant (Helper)
- realistic graphics
- sound effects
- small size
recentChanges: - added the save function
- updated difficulties of levels
- added description of stalemate
summary: Chess is a board logic game with beautiful graphics and progressive levels
title: Chess

comments: Everything costs money. You'll be playing then run out of grenades. That'll be 30g. Don't have that? Well enjoy losing until you figure out a way to win. Love this game though. Made a purchase right off for a gun. Then I saw how much grinding is involved for the upgrades. The jump between a level 2 and 3 upgrade? Then the outfits, 2nd and 3rd weapons. Man. Sorry no thank you. This shooter however is very fun but the paywall is so well thought out I am not prepared to drop that kind of money. Learned my lesson losing 1k to Megopolis.

I love the game. the game play itself is very self explanatory, quick and very good fps however, they have scammed me. I spent 12.99 on gbucks, the purchase was confirmed, and right after they asked me if i had liked to submit another card number for another purchase. I recall having credentials on a different prepaid visa card in my notes, so I go look, unfortunately I didn't have the CVS code for it. I go back to the game, it had reloaded but I didn't get my gbucks. I was a little confused as the purchase had been confirmed, and the money was taken off my card. I tried contacting them 3 separate times about it but obviously they aren't vigilant of their customers and don't take them as a priority. I recommend playing the game but avoid spending money on it. If I could get some help and get a refund on my card, or the gbucks I originally paid for, I will give it 5 stars, as I would like to.

Great game with a lot of potential.... There can be so many more additions to make this fps better. More grenade varieties? A spectator mode? Clan levels that allow more players to join when we reacher higher levels? Gun balancing changes? I feel like the Cerberus should be buffed. It is expensive, and the 3 shots at once doesn't allow for many attempts for kills. Adventure mode for more gunbucks? Death match option? Allowing us to pick the map? I understand the game is fairly new, so keep on adding changes and new improvements. Thanks for listening!

If u guys also provide  like that then ur game gonna be top in fps games üòÄ n mainly  not much places only 3-4... try to add more places n increase the area Size for more fun n more Dodge , now game look like playing in a pocket u guys need to increase area.

Add more events like the festival for more incentives.. Want to earn more than trophies for each battle.. first place should get trophies win or lose.. let the time run all the way down during battles that last ten seconds makes a big difference... Give us the option of playing team deathmatch or capture the points..  Love the game!

You will come back because the game experience is just topnotch.‚Äù ‚Äî AndroidCommunity‚úî ‚ÄúGuns of Boom is some solid, streamlined shooting that feels better than quite a few other mobile shooters.‚Äù ‚Äî 148Apps‚Ä¢ Easy and intuitive controls: pump your opponents full of lead from the get-go!‚Ä¢ Awesome graphics for immersive gameplay: stylish levels and cool animation will keep you glued to the screen!‚Ä¢ Autofire: all you need to do is get the enemy into your crosshairs.‚Ä¢ Dynamic battles: play on a team and rip your enemies to shreds! The more active you are in battle, the better your reward will be! ‚Ä¢ Various guns: 48 weapons to choose from, including machine guns, assault and sniper rifles, shotguns, and more. Each has its own unique ability: increased headshot damage, slowing down enemies, and even health leeching. Find a gun that fits your style of play!‚Ä¢ Explosive fun: free mobile shoot-outs that will leave your heart pounding! Gear up, soldiers!Soldier! You are one step away from action-packed combat! Can you keep steady aim under heavy fire and gun down enemies while grenades are exploding all around you? Can you handle that kind of fun?! Welcome to the game then! This ain‚Äôt no regular army, though. No one will tell you what to do or where to shoot. You have to make your own decisions and choose your own battles. Team up with other soldiers, get good at killing opponents and dominate the battlefield. Make a blitz attack, spraying lead in all directions, or try and shoot your opponent from a safe distance, taking your time to aim directly for the head. It's always your call.  Now, these wars won‚Äôt fight themselves! Get to the armory, gear up, and start making a BOOM! On the double!Guns of Boom is a hardcore multiplayer shooter with eye-popping 3D graphics and blood-boiling gameplay. It‚Äôs so simple that your cat can learn the controls, but the skill-cap is high enough to make even hardened FPS veterans break a sweat. Engage in online PvP battles on a variety of maps, utilizing different deadly guns, as well as frag grenades and med kits. Experience the ultimate competitive tension without leaving your couch!
descriptionHTML:
✔ “A brilliant multiplayer FPS that you should just go and play right now. 9/10” — PocketGamer
✔ “It’s so simple that your cat can learn the controls, but the skill-cap is high enough to make even hardened FPS veterans break a sweat.” — Android and Me
✔ “Guns of Boom has gone where no game has gone before – it’s a legitimately great shooter on mobile.” — Droid Gamers
✔ “You’ve never seen an FPS for mobile quite as good as this. You will come back because the game experience is just topnotch.” — AndroidCommunity
✔ “Guns of Boom is some solid, streamlined shooting that feels better than quite a few other mobile shooters.” — 148Apps

• Easy and intuitive controls: pump your opponents full of lead from the get-go!
• Awesome graphics for immersive gameplay: stylish levels and cool animation will keep you glued to the screen!
• Autofire: all you need to do is get the enemy into your crosshairs.
• Dynamic battles: play on a team and rip your enemies to shreds! The more active you are in battle, the better your reward will be!
• Various guns: 48 weapons to choose from, including machine guns, assault and sniper rifles, shotguns, and more. Each has its own unique ability: increased headshot damage, slowing down enemies, and even health leeching. Find a gun that fits your style of play!
• Explosive fun: free mobile shoot-outs that will leave your heart pounding! Gear up, soldiers!


Soldier!
You are one step away from action-packed combat! Can you keep steady aim under heavy fire and gun down enemies while grenades are exploding all around you? Can you handle that kind of fun?! Welcome to the game then!

This ain’t no regular army, though. No one will tell you what to do or where to shoot. You have to make your own decisions and choose your own battles. Team up with other soldiers, get good at killing opponents and dominate the battlefield. Make a blitz attack, spraying lead in all directions, or try and shoot your opponent from a safe distance, taking your time to aim directly for the head. It's always your call.  Now, these wars won’t fight themselves! Get to the armory, gear up, and start making a BOOM! On the double!
Guns of Boom is a hardcore multiplayer shooter with eye-popping 3D graphics and blood-boiling gameplay. It’s so simple that your cat can learn the controls, but the skill-cap is high enough to make even hardened FPS veterans break a sweat. Engage in online PvP battles on a variety of maps, utilizing different deadly guns, as well as frag grenades and med kits. Experience the ultimate competitive tension without leaving your couch!

comments: Just way too many ads. Eventually you start having to watch an ad after every second other level. Its a free game, so I get it but the levels are so quick sometimes I'm watching more than I am playing. Fun game, though. Easy controls and great graphics and sound.

Good fun and very addictive. I see people moaning about the adds üòß but what can you expect from a free game? You get an add pop up after about 5 puzzles and to be honest it is only for a few seconds....just close it if you don't want to see them.

This game is outstanding. Love the graphics, simple to understand. Some appear quite easy and then you suddenly get a level that looks like it should be but has you scratching your head for AGES!!! Love it. I can live with the adverts, just wish i could put the phone down.

Wonderful game, excellent graphics, its a free game, I solve 2 puzzles and a video ad plays I cant get over it, ad's are repeatedly played and I can't skip, but uninstalling cos too too much of ad's... after 2nd level game is very easy didn't find much interesting..

This game is sooooo frustrating that the game made me through my phone on the ground. If you are good with controlling your stress then you should try it. But if your not good at controlling your stress then do not get it.

Agree with other comments. Great graphics, fun to play, but the ADS!!!!!!!! eventually destroy the fun. Very repetitive after a while and challenge levels seem quite mixed. Have decided to delete the game mainly because of the ad onslaught. Other games have a much better ad/play psychology approach.

comments: Very run game.  Just wish you could save your progress when you have to exit out for a phone call, text messages, reboot the device or anything that requires you to exit.  That's the only reason I gave 4 üåü's. Once they add save life option I will change to 5 üåü's. Great game though. Would recommend everyone to try this game.

Nice gameplay, runs smoothly. Simple graphics. Good game overall, not much to complain with except for the lack of criminal jobs, or weapons like guns that you require to do such jobs, maybe adding a prostitute career would be nice. Just anything more crime related like a dealer or mafia or hitman.

This is a decent game, but it needs a lot of work. I think there should be more options after school than just college then work average Joe jobs or go to prison. I suggest the possibility to get into politics, become president even (or prime minister, or not be able to at all depending on country), or join the military, and perhaps participate in wars if they arise. Right now, the game really only offers boring straightforward lives, and I hope that is changed.

This is one of the best games I have ever played! And it's so simple. The unknown thought of what can happen and the varieties of life you can have is extraordinary! You guys deserve hella credit for such a good game! Save feature would be nice though. :)

S very addictive entertaining I have played this for about 3 months before the game had fully come out it is very fun I really do recommend it a little we're like I need to listen to music while playing this but it's really fun and I love it I just actually like a little more instruction how to do some things but transition don't know how to do tha
Game is addictive and I enjoy it but I would prefer if there was a save button or feature so I don't have to start a new life every time I open the app
description: Release a platinum album at the age of 17, or die of old age only having a few qualifications in school and not much else, the choice is yours.Pass your driving test and die in a fatal accident a year later or become a famous musician and become restricted in what you can do. Will you go to university or give it a miss?Meet different people each time you play, start a relationship. Will they be the one? Let them move in and live happily ever after. Or... Will they leave you?Jobs, and companies, are generated and are different for each game. Jobs require different qualifications to get hired, make sure you work hard and get that promotion! Will the companies CEO step down and allow you to change the company for the better?Find your perfect house! Can't afford it? Get a mortgage, make sure to keep your payments up...Each year you live contains new experiences. The ultimate life simulation.InstLife does not require an internet connection, and can be played offline.
descriptionHTML:
Release a platinum album at the age of 17, or die of old age only having a few qualifications in school and not much else, the choice is yours.

Pass your driving test and die in a fatal accident a year later or become a famous musician and become restricted in what you can do. Will you go to university or give it a miss?

Meet different people each time you play, start a relationship. Will they be the one? Let them move in and live happily ever after. Or... Will they leave you?

Jobs, and companies, are generated and are different for each game. Jobs require different qualifications to get hired, make sure you work hard and get that promotion! Will the companies CEO step down and allow you to change the company for the better?

Find your perfect house! Can't afford it? Get a mortgage, make sure to keep your payments up...

Each year you live contains new experiences. The ultimate life simulation.

InstLife does not require an internet connection, and can be played offline.

comments: Classic UNO with a couple of modern twists and turns. I have never spent any real money in a game and I don't ever plan to, but here you also don't really need to. I've won many tournaments and got really far in the game without buying anything. You get extra coins by winning and completing daily tasks, as well as watching ads. But you're not forced to watch them. It's not just about luck. You have to play smart to win, just like any other card game. I love it.

Tokens take too long to refill. Level up gives a few coins, why not a token refill? Tournament champion gets 4 tokens. 7 tokens for a day? Cheapskates! When do you want us to play, every 5 days? So cheap in giving prizes, guessing you want us to buy eh? I'll give myself a few weeks playing this game and am out. No daily prize wheel, just a daily "less than 20 coins" reward. Sooooooo cheap!

It's just ok.  Hard to see your entire hand at times and some of the rules are different than the actual UNO game itself. When I contacted this apps tech support, they sounded as if they could care less and said they will not be making any changes to the game.  So I play until they want me to buy credits then I stop.  When they give me more free credits I play again.  I like the game UNO, just not this one so much.  Why do I still play?  Hmmm, that's a good question.

Great game in the graphics department however, I agree with other consumers when they say the special abilities you can obtain by playing this game ruins it. Simple is best and this uno app is anything but. Sometimes when I log in, the tokens don't even recharge overnight and I have to wait a few more hours before I play three free rounds of uno before you have to pay for more tokens. Very hit and miss app.

Okay, this is actually a decent game HOWEVER unless you buy your way through its almost impossible to win tournaments.  They shouldn't be putting people in the "club" and level 100+ with people who are like level 10 and not in this "club" it makes it almost impossible for them to win unless they're INSANELY lucky.  People with cheats can turn you from being at uno and winning, to being in last place in seconds and it honestly just kills the enjoyment of the game

Would be good if someone actually thought about what they were making. This is an over computerized auto random winning when that person didnt actually win game. Many flaws need to be fixed. Start from scrat ch and make a more user friendly uno to play with my actual friends, not random people until I make it to level 5. Not cool.

comments: I've liked this game for years. Some adjustments needed: realistically if gas goes empty and you're still coasting or you're in the air you should be able to coast until the vehicle completely stops or lands before the game stops. You've had the nitros in now which is great. However, you still haven't fixed the previous issue. IF I CAN COAST OR NITRO BOOST MYSELF TO A GAS CAN THAT'S LOGICAL. However, you stop the game before the vehicle stops moving which is in a sense, removing logic, and the law of motion!

The best racing game ever, I've played this game along time ago. the first version it has 4/5 cars it was so fuuun.That was 5 years ago now I want to play it again.I feel the nostalgia ooohh the good old days.Now I'm going to install the game.U guys change my life Thank u guys soo much guys. I hope my tears will help u guys. :)

Great game, but I only have one issue which prevents me from giving 5 stars. This issue is that the hot rod doesn't go as fast as it should, I know this because I have grown up around hot rods and Rockabilly since birth. This is only a small problem for me, but it prevents me from enjoying the game as much as I'd like to. Please improve it.

Maybe some new vehicles? Taxi. Limo. Tow truck. Hearse.... maybe some new stages too? Under water. Race track. Bridges. Derby. Graveyard.  I originally posted this way back in 2015 and yet you said you are constantly improving the game??? We try and give you the developer new ideas but it seems that no one bothers to read our comments? I guess it's just a lack of interest. Hopefully this time someone will read it............
Best game ever. I play it all the time even at work but people look at me stupid because im trying to keep from dying and tilting my phone like a moron.. Please make my efforts not be in vain!

description: One of the most addictive and entertaining physics based driving games ever made! And it's free!Meet Newton Bill, the young aspiring uphill racer. He is about to embark on a journey that takes him to where no ride has ever been before. From Ragnarok to a Nuclear Plant, all places are a racing track to Bill. With little respect to the laws of physics, Bill will not rest until he has conquered the highest hills up on the moon! Face the challenges of unique hill climbing environments with many different cars. Gain bonuses from daring tricks and collect coins to upgrade your car and reach even higher distances. Watch out though - Bill's stout neck is not what it used to be when he was a kid! And his good old gasoline crematorium will easily run out of fuel.Features: - Lots of different vehicles with unique upgrades (many different vehicles: bike, truck, jeep, tank, etc.) - Tuneable parts include engine, suspension, tires and 4WD - Numerous stages with levels to reach in each (Countryside, Desert, Arctic and the Moon! +++) - Share your score with a screenshot with your friends! - Cool graphics and smooth physics simulation - Designed to look good on low resolution and high resolution devices (incl. tablets) - Real turbo sound when you upgrade your engine! - Garage mode: build and drive your dream vehicle with custom parts! - Get new boosters to drive even further - 27+ Levels! - 28+ Vehicles!Vehicles: jeep, motocross bike, monster truck, tractor, hippie van, onewheeler, quad bike, tourist bus, race car, police car, ambulance, fire truck, snow mobile, super offroad, and many more! Hill Climb Racing is free to play but there are optional in-app purchases available.Remember that we're always reading your feedback and are hard at work creating new vehicles, levels, features and of course fixing any issues you may find. So we'd really appreciate if you'd report what you like or dislike and any issues you may have with the game to support@fingersoft.net and please include your device make and model.Follow Us:* Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Fingersoft* Twitter: @fingersoft* Web: https://www.fingersoft.net* Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/hillclimbracing_officialTerms of Use: http://fingersoft.net/eulaPrivacy Policy: http://fingersoft.net/privacyHill Climb Racing is a registered trademark of Fingersoft Ltd. All rights reserved.

One of the most addictive and entertaining physics based driving games ever made! And it's free!

Meet Newton Bill, the young aspiring uphill racer. He is about to embark on a journey that takes him to where no ride has ever been before. From Ragnarok to a Nuclear Plant, all places are a racing track to Bill. With little respect to the laws of physics, Bill will not rest until he has conquered the highest hills up on the moon!

Face the challenges of unique hill climbing environments with many different cars. Gain bonuses from daring tricks and collect coins to upgrade your car and reach even higher distances. Watch out though - Bill's stout neck is not what it used to be when he was a kid! And his good old gasoline crematorium will easily run out of fuel.

Features:
- Lots of different vehicles with unique upgrades (many different vehicles: bike, truck, jeep, tank, etc.)

comments: I'm totally addicted to this game! great graphics and lots of fun games that really make you think.  I just wish that it used up lives rather than credits because the credits can run out so fast and take a while to build the pot up again unless you want to pay ¬£

Love it and it really made  my brain thinking like do I want to risk lose money on wild card or go ahead to pick card from deck. When I won love that dog jump over three stars. I try to recalled did dog jump over two or one star. Maybe not. But still love it. Keep it coming

The only thing I do not like about Grand Harvest Solitaire is not being able to earn more coins to play longer. Games cost 2000 coins to play and you don't win much more than 2000 so you're always relying on harvests for coin & unable to play until you build your coins back up by harvesting every hour...

The game is so much fun and great game play and graphics, etc. But it has one fatal flaw. When you get to higher levels, it becomes way too expensive. I paid for extra credits twice but then realized how worthless it is. Sad because I'd be willing to pay for packages for bonuses but it's way too expensive to have to keep paying for rounds just to play.
It's a joke. It is impossible to keep a game streak going because you earn less than you spend even if you get 3 stars on a level. Just a joke of a money grab. Hope your company goes out of business!

It's a really fun and addictive game with one major flaw. After you start getting to the harder levels, you might as well quit and find a new game unless you only want to play one or two rounds an hour or pay to play. Every level costs coins to play and if you fail a level you are out pretty much your whole hourly allotment of coins. Winning a round doesn't make up for even one loss either. Love the game,  but really annoyed that I can't actually play it consistently enough to truly enjoy it.

comments: Absolutely love all of the geometry dash games! Colors and graphics are awesome, game play is challenging but fun, and the music is perfect! Only thing I can complain about is that I wish all of the levels from these free versions were in the full version. I own the full version and would much prefer to be able to play these levels without ads and with all of the cool characters and colors I have unlocked. Other than that though, amazing work you guys, keep it up!

Woah. WOAH. WWOOAAHH!!! Oh. Another Chllenging game but thhe only thing i like in it tha it has Dantdm's Old Intro at the press start! Wow. I am pro at Geometry Dash Games and another one oh yea and there is Sub Zero(MK) name there like i saw them quickly. And i would say for the creator: plz. Creator keep the good work! Ok!!! And make more Geometry Dash and can u make something more fun for more people to play with!!!

Oh my god... This is the best geometry dash free game I have ever played,  and is almost more fun than the full version.  Robtop, you have regained full respect after what happened with meltdown. I'm just speechless, at the amount of work that was put into these three levels, going from the camera angles to the animations. This game is not like meltdown,  which is three short amateur levels, but with three long, harder levels. This game is like a preview to 2.2, and I know it's going to be good.  We'll done, Robtop! Keep up the great work!

This just blows my mind... one thing I would like to see in the future is some rob-top made tutorials on how each editing items works in the game so other players can feel more comfortable making their own levels and not be intimidated by all the other fan made levels... I am one of those players who is intimidated by the other fan made levels... This could help young and creative minds to create their own levels their friends can enjoy. Thanks 10/10

I love this game so much.  Some of the effects and colours added into the game make it so fun to play and watch. Its challenging and thats what makes it fun. Its not like one of those games that are so easy you finish it in an hour. This game takes time and effort. Also the backround music is pretty cool. Especially nock em with headphones. controls are very easy to use, just tap to jump and usually hold to use the vehicles, so easy! This game is perfect and absolutely fun. I would highly recommend downloading geometry dash subzero.

Don't get me wrong, these new levels and songs are fun and addictive and all of the new stuff is awesome... but stop making new apps? Why not just update the original? It's kind of frustrating to have a paid version with stuff I've unlocked but have to deal with an unpaid version (aka, ads) and have to unlock skins and colors all over again because new apps keep being made.

comments: Honestly i really enjoy the game thus far thank you for all the recent updates niantic... but there is one thing that has been bothering me and that is 1v1 with friends and trading... both features were shown in the original trailer... yet again i love the care your giving the game niantic i truly praise it but i would like to know whats happening with my 2 listed thoughts

Simply just needs more events. I get why trading isnt available yet, which is to prevent RMT and if you have RMT that's just the end of the game. But hope you could soon add the 1v1 battle feature, BUT WITH MOVES LIKE THE REAL GAME NOT JUST TAP AND USING THE SPECIAL SKILL.   Overall love it tho, been walking 2km/day for 2 whole weeks now. (Lookin for a gastly xD)

Please have more legendary raid events with gen 1 and 2 Pokemon for new and returning players who want to collect everything. With regards to using GPS and joystick cheats you guys actually benefit by getting more players from rural areas or dangerous areas playing and spending money. Besides you still have to do all the hard work minus the walking so it technically isn't that unfair to others especially since everyone is level 40 these days with legendary Pokemon. The game is already balanced just needs more events. Please consider a premium service to pay for where we can use a joystick in game. We can pay monthly or something so everyone benefits.

I love this game! Been just playing on my wife's account. Just recently decided to make my own, and it will not let me get past choosing my first Pokemon. They all spawn in the same spot and it quickly shows error 11 or whatever and won't even register me moving. I've tried everything to toubleshoot and fix it. Nothings working. Really sucks because I love playing. Can someone fix this or tell me what's going on?

thx for niantic that always listened our sugesttion, but i wish we can trade or battling with other player around the world by staying at poke center or else... - and btw you should update the new gym and new pokestop... since when i was on holiday in Indonesia theres not so much pokestop and gym around :( even there are many landmark in there - another suggestion plz maked some item that can be used to summon legendary/raid battle in location that we want, so its much easier  for the communities to do raid battle in specific location

Can you developers make it so people can trade pokemon and other things like items? Itll make the game sooooo much better if teamates could trade items and Pokemon. People did it with cards, atleast to trade Pokemon. My bf and i play along with his friend David and when one of them need something that i got and visa versa, we should be able to trade. If you guys can make it happen, ill give this 5 stars instead of 4.

descriptionHTML:
Join Trainers across the globe who are discovering Pokémon as they explore the world around them. The newest update to Pokémon GO, the global gaming sensation that has been downloaded over 750 million times and named “Best Mobile Game” by The Game Developers Choice Awards and “Best App of the Year” by TechCrunch, introduced a dynamic weather system that recognizes real-world weather, impacting the gameplay experience in a variety of ways, from changing the Pokémon encountered to increasing their effectiveness in combat.

Venusaur, Charizard, Blastoise, Pikachu, and many other Pokémon have been discovered!
Pokémon are out there, and you need to find them. As you walk around a neighborhood, your smartphone will vibrate when there’s a Pokémon nearby. Take aim and throw a Poké Ball… You’ll have to stay alert, or it might get away!

Search far and wide for Pokémon and items
Certain Pokémon appear near their native environment—look for Water-type Pokémon by lakes and oceans. Visit PokéStops and Gyms—found at interesting places like museums, art installations, historical markers, and monuments—to stock up on Poké Balls and helpful items.

Catching, hatching, evolving, and more
As you level up, you’ll be able to catch more-powerful Pokémon to complete your Pokédex. You can add to your collection by hatching Pokémon Eggs based on the distances you walk. Help your Pokémon evolve by catching many of the same kind. Choose a Buddy Pokémon to walk with and earn Candy that will help you make your Pokémon stronger.

Compete in epic Gym battles
You’ll join one of three teams and battle for the ownership of Gyms with your Pokémon at your side. As your Charmander evolves to Charmeleon and then Charizard, you can battle together to defeat a Gym and assign your Pokémon to defend it against all comers.

Team up to defeat powerful Raid Bosses
A Raid Battle is a cooperative gameplay experience that encourages you to work with up to 20 other Trainers to defeat an extremely powerful Pokémon known as the Raid Boss. If you succeed in defeating it in battle, you’ll have the chance to catch an extra powerful Pokémon of your own!

It’s time to get moving—your real-life adventures await!

Note:

- This app is free-to-play and offers in-game purchases. It is optimized for smartphones, not tablets.
- Compatible with Android devices that have 2GB RAM or more and have Android Version 4.4–7.0+ installed.
- Compatibility is not guaranteed for devices without GPS capabilities or devices that are connected only to Wi-Fi networks.
- Compatibility with tablet devices is not guaranteed.
- Application may not run on certain devices even if they have compatible OS versions installed.
- It is recommended to play while connected to a network in order to obtain accurate location information.
- Compatibility information may be changed at any time.
- Please visit www.PokemonGO.com for additional compatibility information.
- Information current as of December 6, 2017.
developerAddress:
One Ferry Building, Suite 200
San Francisco, CA 94111

summary: Step outside and catch Pok√©mon in the real world! Collect & battle with others.
title: Pok√©mon GO

comments: Excellent fun and a fantastic way to introduce a new audience to some wonderful classical music as well as very talented contempory composers. My one gripe is that recently players have been given multiple oportunities to get 3 crowns or very high scores with ad powered resources. I feel this takes a lot of the challenge from the game. Anyone can get 3 crowns in 4 or 5 goes where us old guard of the game did if in 1 or 2 Still an awesome game though and well worth the download anytime.

This game can fit almost ANY personality type, keeping you entertained for hours!  Don't worry about getting low scores, because the game starts out slow and gets faster, so you'll always be prepared for faster tiles.  There are challenges where you challenge other people in the world!  I never want to give up on this game, its really addicting!

I enjoy this game a lot and always loved how it challenged me. It was also fun when me and my friends would fight to see who's better but I dislike the update where they added boosters, it doesn't seem fair and for me it feel like it loses the title for being relaxing. I don't think that adding those futures was a great idea in my opinion and I really miss the old version a lot.

This game has no WORLD'S favourite song  DESPACITO  SO i m hating it tooooo much  when i see this then i think that let's download it bcoz it contains despacito song also but when i see all album of this app then i started hated it. So i would request from CHEETAH GAMES that plezz add DESPACITO SONG also in it This is my humble request from CHEETAH GAMES.

Great game. Played to level 120 and have over 500 gems but then I switched devices. This requires a Facebook account which I did not have. It worked for a little bit until Facebook disabled my account for doing nothing. They need to fix the method they use to sync progress. Now I am level 3 with 17 gems.

I'm in love with this game. It's challenging, you don't have to listen to the music to follow the tiles, and it gives you the feeling to be better. I have a suggestion for a new song you can buy for diamonds. Can you add any song from the My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic TV show? Thanks.

comments: I LOVE this game My only complaint is in campaign mode it's said more worlds coming soon for YEARS!!! If they're not going to add a world eny time soon  they should at least change the coming soon part. But overall this is a good game and it seems like Cubic Games really care about what the consumers think.

This used to be really cool. If you want to be strong buy gem weapons. It is too hard too earn coins or.gems. Also your opponents must be with same armor or level. I once fought a guy with the minigun shotgun and diamond armor and before I rekt everyone with the demoman but now it sucks

I think this game is brilliant. An absolute pleasure to play and I never get bored. This game should be voted one of the best games ever. Obviously I like other games but this is a whole different story. I just wanted to say please make it so u can join lower levels friends? I can't join my sister and were only five levels apart.

Absolutely great game ,but you made some far too powerful guns too accessible early in the game, so I went down two trophies after I ran into a bunch of wallet warriors. And for God's sakes put a more powerful gun at the end of the campaign, I worked my ass off and it wasn't worth it. Other than that large rant, I love it so much and play it every day. Make exp,gold and diamond easier to obtain though.

I don't like this update. Why does it cost so much to upgrade  weapons 2 more damage higher. And I don't like the fact that all the weapons that have low stars are nerfed. When I was on level 6 the hellraiser was a beast. Then when I got to level 7 I it wasn't as good, so I tried to upgrade it. BUT the price cost 120 coins. I am really disappointed about this. I played this game for 2 years and it sad to see how hard it is to win. They only want money that's it. Make your game better and fair. It's so unbalanced.

It's a great game.... until you reach level 27, then there is a REDICULOUS difficulty curve. I was steadily climbing the tornament leaderboard, I was good, then I kept getting destroyed after hitting 27 with OP items and no gems to get the new weapons, because I had spent them leveling up my weapons and was out. What are you thinking? Lag, not double jumping, not firing when I need to, occasionally. How rediculous.
description: Try Pixel Gun 3D in MULTIPLAYER MODE with Cooperative, Deathmatch & Deadly Games!  Also it is a cool modern block world shooter with singleplayer campaign and survival arena.  This is a pocket edition for mobile devices. Now you have a perfect chance to battle with your friends, classmates and colleagues or anyone else around the world! You can create and customize your character using a special skins maker and then show off on the battlefield!  It is an awesome pocket FPS shooter for all kinds of players! *** MULTIPLAYER MODES***  Deathmatch mode benefits:  ‚Ä¢ WORLDWIDE and local.  ‚Ä¢ unique maps of various shapes and sizes.  ‚Ä¢ Varied weaponry, ranging from Magic Bow, Combat M16 Rifle, Golden Desert Eagle and Lightsaber to the simplest things, in case you want to butcher someone with a knife.  ‚Ä¢ Up to 8 players in one game.  ‚Ä¢ Now chat is available! Talk with friends right in the battle! ‚Ä¢ Challenging and exciting experience that can really get you hooked!  *** COOPERATIVE MODE ***  Cooperative mode features:  ‚Ä¢ Up to 4 Players in one game.  ‚Ä¢ Chat is available as well! ‚Ä¢ 8 special maps. ‚Ä¢ Hardcore gameplay.  ‚Ä¢ Coins as a prize for top results.  *** SURVIVAL CAMPAIGN ***  In this story mode your character is ‚Äúface to face‚Äù with hordes of zombies attacking you from all sides. A lot of enemies from cops & robbers to nurses and swat members! You have to wipe them out otherwise you are doomed!  Your only task is not an easy one - to whack all the monsters. Don't let the seeds of fear grown in your head. If you survive all the attacks of the dead, you'll face an EVIL ZOMBIE BOSS in this mod. Having made mincemeat of him, you open the portal to the next battlefields! Start your combat.  New cool features in a campaign mode:  ‚Ä¢ A new training camp for first-timers.  ‚Ä¢ More detailed graphics.‚Ä¢ New cool maps like a Forest full of seeds. ‚Ä¢ Cool new songs‚Ä¢ More challenging gameplay: now you are not able to pass through enemies & different mobs. Watch out for narrow passages and lanes! There you almost have no chance to get out alive!  Make up your mind about the gun (though you may prefer a bow or a knife) and polish your killing skills! Perform at your best and share your high score on Facebook and Twitter!  Main Features of a campaign mode:  ‚Ä¢ Wide choice of arms, such as Colt, Heavy machine gun, AK47, MP5, and many others.  ‚Ä¢ A lot of absolutely different maps.  ‚Ä¢ Many types of zombies and enemies.  ‚Ä¢ Awesome HD pixel graphics with dynamic light.  ‚Ä¢ Breathtaking sound effects and songs. Use headphones for maximum fun!  ‚Ä¢ Cool fun on the age of PC FPS shooters.*** SKINS MAKER ***  Now you can make your OWN SKIN and USE IT IN THE MULTIPLAYER GAME!Thank you for all the comments and advices, we really appreciate it. In this version we tried to fulfill your wishes. Wait for the next updates with new cool features!  ‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚ÄîThis is not an official Mojang app. Pixel Gun 3D is not associated or connected with Mojang AB and its game Minecraft - Pocket Edition. Minecraft is a trademark of Mojang AB and it is not endorsed by or affiliated with the creator of this game or its licensers.
descriptionHTML:
Try Pixel Gun 3D in MULTIPLAYER MODE with Cooperative, Deathmatch & Deadly Games! Also it is a cool modern block world shooter with singleplayer campaign and survival arena.

This is a pocket edition for mobile devices. Now you have a perfect chance to battle with your friends, classmates and colleagues or anyone else around the world! You can create and customize your character using a special skins maker and then show off on the battlefield! It is an awesome pocket FPS shooter for all kinds of players!

*** MULTIPLAYER MODES***

Deathmatch mode benefits:
• WORLDWIDE and local.
• unique maps of various shapes and sizes.
• Varied weaponry, ranging from Magic Bow, Combat M16 Rifle, Golden Desert Eagle and Lightsaber to the simplest things, in case you want to butcher someone with a knife.
• Up to 8 players in one game.
• Now chat is available! Talk with friends right in the battle!
• Challenging and exciting experience that can really get you hooked!

*** COOPERATIVE MODE ***
Cooperative mode features:
• Up to 4 Players in one game.
• Chat is available as well!
• 8 special maps.
• Hardcore gameplay.
• Coins as a prize for top results.


*** SURVIVAL CAMPAIGN ***
In this story mode your character is “face to face” with hordes of zombies attacking you from all sides. A lot of enemies from cops & robbers to nurses and swat members! You have to wipe them out otherwise you are doomed!
Your only task is not an easy one - to whack all the monsters. Don't let the seeds of fear grown in your head. If you survive all the attacks of the dead, you'll face an EVIL ZOMBIE BOSS in this mod. Having made mincemeat of him, you open the portal to the next battlefields! Start your combat.

New cool features in a campaign mode:
• A new training camp for first-timers.
• More detailed graphics.
• New cool maps like a Forest full of seeds.
• Cool new songs
• More challenging gameplay: now you are not able to pass through enemies & different mobs. Watch out for narrow passages and lanes! There you almost have no chance to get out alive!

Make up your mind about the gun (though you may prefer a bow or a knife) and polish your killing skills! Perform at your best and share your high score on Facebook and Twitter!

Main Features of a campaign mode:
• Wide choice of arms, such as Colt, Heavy machine gun, AK47, MP5, and many others.
• A lot of absolutely different maps.
• Many types of zombies and enemies.
• Awesome HD pixel graphics with dynamic light.
• Breathtaking sound effects and songs. Use headphones for maximum fun!
• Cool fun on the age of PC FPS shooters.

*** SKINS MAKER ***
Now you can make your OWN SKIN and USE IT IN THE MULTIPLAYER GAME!

Thank you for all the comments and advices, we really appreciate it. In this version we tried to fulfill your wishes. Wait for the next updates with new cool features!

descriptionHTML:
Explore Talking Angela’s world and customize her fashion, hairstyle, makeup and home - all while playing addictively cute mini-games.

With over 165 million downloads already… don’t miss out on the fun!

ADOPT BABY ANGELA
Adopt Angela as your very own virtual pet and give her a fabulous life! Help her grow into a stylish city kitty. From teeth brushing to clothes shopping – she’s all yours!

TAKE CARE OF HER
Make Angela your very own superstar! Nurture her, sing to her, feed her delicious treats. Just watch – she’ll become your new best friend!

CREATE COLORFUL MAKEUP
Let your stunning sense of style shine through by giving Talking Angela a style make-over!
Lipstick, eyeshadow, blush - customize to your heart's content! With dozens of different colors and endless creative freedom; you can really express yourself!

EXPRESS YOUR FASHION FLAIR
You’re fabulous, so make Angela fabulous too! Dress her in the latest fashions and the cutest costumes, from beautiful ballerina to punk ninja! Complete the look by giving her the perfect hairstyle too! With over a million different fashion combinations, you can create something truly unique!

PLAY MINI-GAMES

comments: Best curling game I've seen Enjoy the graphics, controls, love the 1 on 1 against international players and career game options. Seems consistent and easy to learn. Needs a few tweaks like... throws that don't make hog line or touch hogline must be taken out of play. Have seen the bug that others reported, sometimes rock after thrown disappears , some kind of glitch that happens occasionally.  Sometimes the sweepers don't react to my movement to sweep. Would love to see 8 stones instead of 6. If you love curling, this should satisfy

Great game except for hackers. There is a hack that allows some to bump or change finish of a throw. Yoy can go from having 2 scoring to opponent having the score, changing after the rocks stopped. Developers have not replied ti report. Fine for some fun but don't waste your money in upgrades

Very fun game. Multiplayer is awsome! Please add private matches so i can play with friends.   Physics still need work to hold up to real world standard. Rocks dont follow thru on take outs in real life as they do in this game. Also (rules), a rock needs to make it all the way over the hogline in order to stay in play.  Thank you for making this game!

The physics of this game are terrible. It's fatal flaw is if you have a completely frozen rock, you physically can't remove it, but this game you can completely remove 3 rocks even if they are all frozen. Also the free guard rule is very loosley applied. This game clearly was not created by someone who has ever curled.

Physics are not like real curling, rocks are dead in the house when hit, physically impossible doubles and triples, improper use of the free guard zone rules (if a rock is in the house, it is free to be removed...not in this game).  Connecting people across the globe is a cool idea but you frequently lose people and you win without finishing a game.  I've played for 35 years so I speak from experience.

Full of cheaters Started to play and it was awesome. But it seems that some people created cheats and make your pins move from their places without even theirs touching them so that they win points. I will not play it until its updated and try again. Too bad.
