descriptionHTML:
FUN, ACTION-PACKED NINJA RPG GAME
THE LEGO® NINJAGO® MOVIE™ app is a fun, creative role-playing game for 9-12-year-young ninja-in-training (and other adventurous heroes). Players are assigned important missions by Master Wu, and must rescue and team up with the rest of the brave WU-CRU – ninjas Jay, Zane, Nya, Cole and Kai – to uncover ancient secrets and hidden treasures, and battle against a lurking evil that threatens to destroy the peaceful NINJAGO Island.


FEATURES
- IMMERSIVE ROLE-PLAY: Create a personal LEGO NINJAGO avatar, learn how to master the most
important ninja skills, and personalize your ninja Cru before each battle.
- FAMILIAR CHARACTERS: Rescue and fight alongside your favorite LEGO NINJAGO characters.
- EXPLORE NINJAGO ISLAND: Collect blueprints, crystals, and hidden treasures to unlock NINJAGO
vehicles.
- ENDLESS GAME PLAY COMBINATIONS: 60+ levels to unlock.
- AGE-APPROPRIATE: Engaging storylines, intuitive navigation (some reading skills required) and lots
of humor!
- SAFETY FIRST: Your child will play in a safe, closed environment, with NO third-party advertising, links to external websites, in-app purchases or hidden data collection. LEGO marketing content and information is served, for instance LEGO news about LEGO sets and other LEGO games, in hope of inspiring children’s creative play.


Why play with LEGO NINJAGO?
LEGO NINJAGO is an immersive story about good and evil, centered around a group of five young ninja with each their elemental powers, and their training in the capable hands of old Master Wu. Friendships are forged, and evil enemies defeated in their battles to bring peace to NINJAGO Island – always with a balanced mix of danger, creativity, excitement and comic relief. And even enemies can sometimes become friends, just as friends can sometimes make mistakes. The role-playing opportunities are endless – almost anything goes in this fascinating, creative universe.
Come play with us on LEGO.com/NINJAGO


For app support contact LEGO Consumer Service.
For contact details refer to http://service.LEGO.com/contactus

Our privacy policy and terms of use for apps are accepted if you download this app.
Read more on http://aboutus.LEGO.com/legal-notice/Privacy-Policy and http://aboutus.LEGO.com/legal-notice/terms-of-use-for-apps

LEGO, the LEGO logo, NINJAGO and the Minifigure are trademarks of the LEGO Group. ©2017 The LEGO Group.
LEGO System A/S Website --- THE LEGO® NINJAGO® MOVIE™ app Support

description: You will really feel like you are behind the wheel of a muscle car. Cruise around the city in your car with friends, and experience how cool and difficult it can be at the same time. Explore the city, and perhaps you will find something interesting. You have a 360-degree view of the cabin. Fun companions are waiting for you to join them in the game.Set up a race according to your own rules! Turn on the music and let's go!!!!           Tips:1. Do not speed. Drive carefully in order to avoid crashing or damaging your muscle car. 2. Beware of the traffic police. If you speed, then you will get a ticket. 3. Pay attention to the interactive hints.  4. Don't forget to fill up your car with gas at the gas station.5. It is cheaper to pay a bribe than the official ticket.  6. For your convenience, please keep the doors locked when driving.    Please note: The input area for the interactive buttons is around the center of the screen.    ***Game features:***- Fun interactive game with endless replay value.- Daily bonuses. - First-person mode. - Richly detailed car models.- Many of the components inside the car are interactive.- You can modify and tune your car in a large number of ways. - Interesting map of the city and its environs.- Interactive gas station.  - Fun arcade-style missions.- Service station cars: Car Service: Tinted, Low Ride, Paint, License Plate, Body Repair, Wheel Rims... - Car showroom.- Additional multiplayer-mode missions.    Additional bonus! The game contains an additional 3 cars. One of the cars has a dead battery, the second lacks one entirely, and the third is missing a wheel. Find a way to get them going again, and they will be yours!!! Hint! New modern 3 muscle cars.  Bonus!Baseball-bat. Play the beta versions. Follow us!Tell us your wishes for new features and comments about the game.  Download and play OPPANA GAMES! And enjoy yourself!  https://www.facebook.com/OppanaGameshttps://vk.com/oppana_games   While you're thinking, your friend is already driving!

You will really feel like you are behind the wheel of a muscle car. Cruise around the city in your car with friends, and experience how cool and difficult it can be at the same time.

Tips:
1. Do not speed. Drive carefully in order to avoid crashing or damaging your muscle car.
2. Beware of the traffic police. If you speed, then you will get a ticket.
3. Pay attention to the interactive hints.
4. Don't forget to fill up your car with gas at the gas station.
5. It is cheaper to pay a bribe than the official ticket.
6. For your convenience, please keep the doors locked when driving.

Please note: The input area for the interactive buttons is around the center of the screen.

- You can modify and tune your car in a large number of ways.

- Service station cars: Car Service: Tinted, Low Ride, Paint, License Plate, Body Repair, Wheel Rims...

comments: I've played the same game/ level 3 times now and passed it. For some reason the game is stuck. It just brings me back to the beginning. Also if I won a bomb or a fire ball in one level and don't use it. It should carry over to the next.
It's not fully free. It's designed to make you pay for extra bonuses otherwise it would be very difficult to pass a level. Uninstalling for this reason.

It was fun to play earlier but as you reach the higher levels it becomes frustrating it seems like purposely it is not completing the challange ,.. my level is 1629 how much I try it is failed by single ball   ... It looks that they are not having further challanges  but  not agree to accept

I'm about ready to give up on this.  The 'laser' balls introduced around level 1260 are both unplayable and completely pointless. The game is all about popping bubbles, well... it was until this point.   I was hoping to push through to the final levels but as long as these are in the game I really can't be bothered.   Honestly, when I have to guess the best time to launch balls based on totally random evidence... and lose when those balls are gobbled up for reasons I cannot fathom...  Following on... I've reached level 2082 and cannot possibly see how to  get further than about half way through with the balls provided!  I guess if I stick at it for a month or so I might be able to accumulate enough bonus balls to have a chance!  And there I was thinking that 2076 was tough!     And I **still** hate the laser balls!   Been playing for a year now... on the free version... you guys must have earned a motza from all the adverts that I've displayed!!  Update - I think I've found a bug in level 2215 - whenever I launch a ball it is immediately invisible and doesn't seem to have any effect on the balls it's aimed at. Randomly a ball will cause others to drop... sometimes invisible ones will appear as they drop.  I've rebooted the phone... problem still here.
Way too many Ads! As soon as you finish a game Ads , ads, ads!
Very addictive game. Just finished level 2530. I am getting ready to upgrade my phone. Is there any way to capture level data so i can start at my current level on my new phone?

descriptionHTML:
"Dragon Mania Legends is for anyone that wants their very own pet dragon, which is obviously everyone…" – Gamezebo

WELCOME TO DRAGOLANDIA
- Dragons have never looked this good! Eye-popping visuals make the diverse islands and inhabitants of Dragolandia come to life.
- Your pets appreciate attention; feed them, cuddle them and care for them to receive extra gold and special bonuses.
- Create the island of your dreams and customise your city with dozens of buildings and fun decorations.
- Never run out of cute, scaly friends with more than 350 unique species you can breed and add to your dragon collection.

ALWAYS A NEW ADVENTURE
- Take your dragons on a journey across the land! Reach higher and higher leagues as your collection and skills improve with each new battle!
- Seasonal events, new content and special quests are added with each update, so you never run out of fun things to do.
- Show 'em who's boss! Raise your pets and take on your opponents in the Arena to become the best dragon trainer and collect awesome prizes!

FIGHT FOR DRAGONKIND
- The Vikings just can't give it a rest, and they smell bad too… Teach them a lesson in exciting 3-on-3 battles!
- Take your dragons to the Academy to improve their skills and teach them special attacks.
- Train your pets to fight and raise them to become legendary warriors.
- Use the power of Dragon Fury to defeat your opponents.

THE POWER OF CLANS
- Make friends, visit their islands and exchange gifts.
- Be the Clan with a Plan! Use the Clan Chat to devise the best strategy, or just discuss what you've been up to…

_____________________________________________

Visit our official site at http://gmlft.co/website_EN
Check out the new blog at http://gmlft.co/central

comments: It just lags now. The new update made it to where my chat, my character, and my animations won't work. I run about as fast as a turtle, and I am not pregnant. Please fix!!!! I love this game. I have a few questions if you don't mind... Can you guys add in multi-player mode, like single player mode, that we can pick up our pups, it would be cool to add that option in the top left menu. Thank you guys so much!! Love the games!!

I have only had this game for a few days, so I can't write a very comprehensive review just yet. But I have good feeling about this game. It is fun, challenging, with easy-to-learn controls. Less fast paced than Dragon SIM and less worlds and bosses. Customization is better though, and slower pacing may mean more long-term fun; not over so fast. Multiplayer is always a plus. Not pay-to-play, though paying gets you more benefits, it's up to you how you want to go about getting coins and acorns. Great game, few problems, would recommend.

Most awesome wolf simulator game I have ever played! The graphics are absolutely beautiful, and the controls are pretty good. Although getting attacked by several animals at once when you only go for one makes completing missions pretty hard. And you should be able to run from a fight if you're losing, instead of having animals come at you until you're dead. All in all a great game play experience though. I love it!

Man i love this game!!! So much better than wolfquest!!! I do hope tht this game soon be added new things like more animal to play as, better in performance. The ad free guys...keep it up!!! Just wondering if there's a add as mate system in multiplayer in the future? Anyways....this is the best wolf game tht i played!!! Do hope tht you guys one day add more animals to play as (like a snow leopard for example)

Love it but pleeeeeaaaase make it possible to play as a boar or a rabbit or deer. Also I think it would be really nice to have a hunger and thirst bar because there is no real point in drinking. That way if you dont have enough food or water you start to lose health.  Also I don't think we really need stamina from the food we eat.  These are just suggestions but I really really love this game.  Best simulator out there.

Most realistic wolf sim I have found out there, with the ability to get a mate, have cubs and your own den in which you can invite players into. There are also multiplayer game servers and an ability to create your own public or private game. You can also play as a wolf, fox or lynx and customize eyes, pelts and add masks/hats and scars/clothing. Its just AMAZING! Also saying that you don't have to pay to play and in-game currency is easy to get.
description: Explore nature as a wild animal and raise a family in the wilderness in Wildcraft, a new RPG adventure set in a huge 3D landscape!Start your adventure as a wolf, fox, lynx and more, and take your family on a new adventure. Play with friends in multiplayer games and form animal families to protect your cubs from enemies. Unlock new animal breeds as your family legacy grows in Wildcraft!WILDCRAFT FEATURES:Choose Animal Breeds- Start your adventure as a:- Wolf- Fox- Lynx- And more!Raise a Family- Animal simulator: Customize each family member by name, gender, fur color, bark, eyes, body size, and more!- Raise a family: Have up to six cubs per family and continue your legacy.- Animal simulator lets you leave your current family to start a new one.Explore a 3D World- Explore the world and travel to unique locations.- Adventure the wild and survive the elements in summer, winter, spring and fall.Battle Enemies- Battle dangerous enemies as a wild animal and protect your family.- Unlock fighting achievements after defeating specific enemies.Online Adventure Games- Play with friends, explore the world and battle enemies.- Battle enemies with friends to effectively protect your family.Raise a family as one of your favorite wild animals and explore a huge 3D world. comments: This game is ok. The graphics are good. It's my favourite bowling game out there.  However I really don't know why this needs access to my phone contacts and other permissions.  As a result it's been removed. Apps and games need to sort out their permissions for what it needs to do. If it's not required I'm not installing it. Other than that complaint it's actually a nice game for a quick 5 minute time waster.
I have this game on my note, iPad, and computer so it definitely should let you home much I love it.  Not including its wonderful to have when I'm always at the Dr. for hours.

I like this game very much. You dont quite get the amount of exercise as reality provides, however it is something to be overlooked. The method of saving game scores leaves MUCH to be desired, as well as changing and editing profile photos. Notice my photo is (was) displayed 90¬∞ out of vertical. So I give the game 4 out of 5 stars in hopes of encouraging the edit functions to be reworked and made more user friendly.
So much fun to play! I am not a very good bowler in real life, but I love bowling so this game allows me to be a much better bowler.

I just installed it and played one game. Seems simple and entertaining but it's WAY too soon to give a fair rating. It's annoying when games are begging you for ratings  before you can even have a chance to explore the game.

Needs to have better controls. Sensitivity to the roll, angles to throw while using curves. Maybe a power gauge for the roll, & moving your stylus or finger while giving it a curving flight on it's way down to the pins

comments: I used to love this game, very addictive but recent updates have made the game have too many elements (clubs - who cares???) Ads all over and money disappears quickly due to cost of each game.  Not easy to complete games it feels "fixed" with random cards plus drains the battery on my phone.  Uninstalled.

This is my 3rd review. Love the game but had issues when ads were introduced. That was rectified, then had issues with new Android version. That was fixed and game was going fantastically for about 3 weeks and now they have reduced the amount of free treasure to $1000 instead of $5000. This means I need to come back 3x more often without playing a single game just to be able to play once.

I would like it more if in the perk levels it showed how many club points were needed for each level and how many more are needed to finish the perk level. The green filling up the bar doesn't really accurately show how close you are. It looks like you are almost done, but then it takes forever to fill up so you don't know how many more points you need.

This game has many issues! It continually freezes and shuts me down. I can no longer play on my tablet, which I purchased just for games, and have to use my phone. I don't like using my phone because it drains my battery. I am so ready to quit this game and return to candy crush instead. Latest updates have rendered JP and other perks useless.

Originally I really liked this game BUT the further you go the  more it costs to play.  That was ok, but you add more and more ads in there, they are on the "boards" they are between the games, between the levels and NOW you have Tri Peaks Solitaire brought to you by, yet another game. I like it, as a game it's addictive and was  fun but I think I have had enough.  It's becoming not so much fun and headed for the uninstall list.

I don't know if a review is still available  after a game has been deleted. The game was fun to play I'll say that. I didn't need 5 push notifications coming @ me in the middle of the night however. The one that came through @ 3:17 a.m. was it for me, I'm out.

Was enjoying the game.  Something happened an update or something and now the game has terrible performance, lags and stutters bad, even single player and the challenges.  I have a note 8 so its not on my end.  Tried uninstalling and installing, no change.  Too bad, it was fun.

This game is fun, but I would be setttled with happy if I got to have 10 keys to use in multiplayer instead of just 5. Secondly this app eats too much battery that my OS gives a notification for that every time. Please consider this.
Some probs are there like if we disconnect during the game then - 35 trophies are penalties. Then if i come 1 St then I see that I came 4th. So please take care of these things. Thank u

description: SkidStorm is a global multiplayer realtime racing game, free of charge and with simple graphics. You can challenge others online or play alone offline. It offers the smooth control which is really easy to get the hang of! In the game, you may drive the cars and drift though all kinds of tracks, swipe your fingers to experience the thrilling races. You may also fill up nitro tanks to speed up or overtake in the corner to become the champion.How to play:- Simply click the button ‚ÄúLeft‚Äù, ‚ÄúRight‚Äù to control where the car goes, and fill up nitro tanks to speed up, and overtake in the corner to win the game.Feature:- 24 tracks for you to choose from and enjoy the multiplayer realtime racing to the limit- 17 different types of cars- 12 skins to customize your cars as you want- 5 upgradeable parts: engine, turbo, motor, nitrous and tires- Form a clan to play with your friends and share the glory- Leaderboard: win the trophies and get on the top of the chart- Various game modes: global multiplayer realtime matching mode, single player mode, Career mode, AI mode...- New content coming soon!Tips:- Carefully maintain your drifts to fill up nitro tanks and earn more chances to speed up- Chicane is the key of how you overtake the others- Use your nitro wisely: straight paths or the home stretch is the bestThe most latest drift racing game made by Cheetah Mobile. descriptionHTML:
SkidStorm is a global multiplayer realtime racing game, free of charge and with simple graphics. You can challenge others online or play alone offline. It offers the smooth control which is really easy to get the hang of! In the game, you may drive the cars and drift though all kinds of tracks, swipe your fingers to experience the thrilling races. You may also fill up nitro tanks to speed up or overtake in the corner to become the champion.

How to play:
- Simply click the button “Left”, “Right” to control where the car goes, and fill up nitro tanks to speed up, and overtake in the corner to win the game.

Feature:
- 24 tracks for you to choose from and enjoy the multiplayer realtime racing to the limit
- 17 different types of cars
- 12 skins to customize your cars as you want
- 5 upgradeable parts: engine, turbo, motor, nitrous and tires
- Form a clan to play with your friends and share the glory
- Leaderboard: win the trophies and get on the top of the chart
- Various game modes: global multiplayer realtime matching mode, single player mode, Career mode, AI mode...
- New content coming soon!

Tips:
- Carefully maintain your drifts to fill up nitro tanks and earn more chances to speed up
- Chicane is the key of how you overtake the others
- Use your nitro wisely: straight paths or the home stretch is the best

The most latest drift racing game made by Cheetah Mobile. Go give it a try!

We’d love to hear your thoughts and suggestions on our game. You are invited to join us to improve it together. More updates and surprises are coming soon. Stay tuned!

E-mail: skidstorm@cmcm.com
FB: @SkidStorm

title: SkidStorm

comments: Now these days, to be powerful is cards. And it's really sad to see it in one of my favorite fighting game. I have a galaxy s8 plus and when I put the controls on large, it feels like there on medium. If your playing duel and your opponent has 5 power points ahead of you, just call it a lost. Do better. Battlefront 2 is about to be banned in Germany because of the card system. I hope you look into it.  Edited: it's still the same. It feels like a pay to win. I'm going back to shadow fight 2. You know. The good one.

I really like playing the game. It has great animations smooth gameplay and isn't too easy or hard. The one thing I dont like is you can't sell your old equipment or skills. If there was a shop to sell them or add runes to them or be able to combine them to make either new or more powerful ones of the sane type I would give this game 5 stars.hopefully the Devs will take this and add this feature in a update. Speaking of updates, I just installed the latest one it was like 403MB but nothing changed! What was the update for then?

Hey NEKKI i have the best suggestion ever. WHY DON'T YOU add a grab button separately or at least give the option. Also make the side quest more satisfying. Just giving me commons just isn't going to work. Please nerf the herlad faction. 1 its crit chance is to stupidly high 17 percent is to much. Its also so quick and has long range

Would be great if there were a better sign in feature. I had to restore factory settings on my phone... Now the game won't allow me to log into my account. Which sucks a lot, I have spent money on microtransactions and a bit of time into leveling up. But now that seems to be all gone...

The game is a lot of fun but there's one big problem the only way to advance in the story mode is by leveling up and getting better armor but the only way to level up is in story mode so your other option is spend real money on better equipment. So it's kinda just a money grab. If that was fixed I'd give it 10 stars

The only good thing about this game is graphic and animation. Beautiful and smooth. But how about the Gameplay? Yuck! Lack of contents. Story goes nowhere. After several duel, you didnt gain anything. Which mean it stops you from progressing to follow the story. The only way to progress is spend money. There is even no option to delete/sell common chest or gear. In short, uninstall and find another game.
description: Step into the world of shadows at the time of changes. Reveal all its dark secrets and become the greatest warrior this land has ever seen. In this RPG-fighting game you will take on a role of a hero whose destiny isn't determined yet. How do you see the future? It's your call! Choose from three different fighting styles, experiment, combine your gear, learn some fresh new moves and explore a massive world full of adventures! Enjoy the beauty of a real fight which has been made possible due to modern technologies and smooth animations. CREATE YOUR OWN FIGHTING STYLE Shadow Fight 3 offers you 3 unique fighting styles to choose from. Collect new moves, perks, weapons, gear and combine them in the way YOU like it. Be fast and graceful, strong and shattering, enigmatic and deadly. Raise a character that will represent your distinctive playing technique and personality. AT THE EDGE OF TECHNOLOGY Shadow Fight 3 brings the fighting genre to a whole new technological level. Colorful graphics, smooth animations, realistic physics and effects create a picture of a living and breathing world you've never seen before!  DEEP AND IMMERSIVE STORYLINE Shadow Fight 3 is a story-driven game. You'll find yourself in a dangerous world that is on the threshold of a great war with you in the middle. Three powerful factions are tearing these lands apart and plotting against each other. Which side would you choose? You decide! MANAGE YOUR GEAR COLLECTION. There's large amount of weapons and armor in Shadow Fight 3. If you've ever dreamed of having a rare collection of war goods, now's your time! The world of shadows has got splendid rewards for the most adventurous ones! Collect epic gear, combine and upgrade it, equip it with new lethal moves and perks. Fight your enemy with style! It is all limited by your imagination only. Shadow Fight 3 in a nutshell: - Smooth animations and lifelike physics- Spectacular SHADOW-based fighting mechanics- Lots of gear and weapons to collect- Gorgeous visuals- Three unique factions and fighting styles- Hundreds of perks and supermoves- Character creation tool- Diverse fighting modes

comments: I really enjoy playing this game. It helps me to relax while I am watching TV, or even using in split mode while watching a video or something. It's a bit different then the way I originally used to play Klondike, but still a great game and easy to get used to quickly! I don't mind the 5 second or so ads between games. It's the price you pay to get a good, free game. It's not like they play constantly and during a game there is usually an ad on the bottom screen but it will quickly move if you go to start a new game or need to access the other options.

It's a fun relaxing game. Its so addictive that every device I have, must have this game. I have it on my phone, ipad and tablet. Except my laptop cuz then I would get no work done. About the ads, one pops out each time you finish a game, so I'm not to bothered by it. Also, theres no videos too watch in order to earn coins or diamonds because none are needed. I just love it. Its stress free.

I would have scored higher except there is suddenly super annoying music being played that there is no option to turn off. The ads also now autoplay loud music. I agree with another poster who said it starting to seem like you lose more so you see more ads. I liked this because it was good for a quick game while getting ready to sleep. The music ruins this. I'm going to try another app now.

I love the game solitaire played it on many different computers over the years. Downloaded three other version on my phone. All of which I deleted almost straight away because they were finicky and I didn't like the format. This one is easy to use and no glitches. So far so good.

It locks up whenever you hit the back key on your Android phone.  Have Samsung note 5 and as I hold it, the back button sometimes gets hit and it asks me if I want to exit the game or cancel.  When I hit cancel, nothing else works, can't move cards or select next 3 cards, except the bottom control buttons do work, so all you can do then is undo, or redeal. But even after an undo or redeal, you still can't play cards, it's unresponsive. All you can do is exit the game and restart to get it responsive again. Too frustrating to use.

Terrible ads. So bad they hid the menu bar behind an ad banner so you click the ads just to access settings. Pretty sure they recently increased losing deal rate to make more ad videos play. So many other solitaire aps available so skip this one.

descriptionHTML:
Play with LEGO BATMAN™, LEGO WONDER WOMAN™ or with LEGO SUPERMAN™ in this free and fun LEGO® DC Comics racing game.

Chase or be chased! You can play as the Killer Moth™ or BIZZARO™ and escape the city before BATMAN™ or SUPERMAN™ can catch you. Or would you rather be the superhero?

This game is a fun and free racing LEGO® game designed for boys and girls with the following ages: 5-12

You can race through multiple environments, unlock stickers and achievements or just enjoy the ride with your favorite LEGO® DC superhero.

Do you want to see your favorite LEGO® DC Mighty Micros sets in action?

* Swoop through the air in the LEGO® DC Mighty Micros Batcopter and swat Killer Moth™ out of the sky! Throw Batman’s Batarang at the flying bug’s wings and send the villain crashing, but watch out for the cocoon gun.
* Doomsday™ is powering up his Mighty Micros car and going in for the attack with his club. Watch Wonder Woman™ strike back using her mighty sword and shield as she zooms around the villain in her Invisible Jet!
* Zoom into battle and catch Bizarro™—if you can! Who knows which direction Superman’s imperfect nemesis will turn next in his back-to -front Mighty Micros car. Use the blue Kryptonite to sap Bizarro’s energy, but watch out for the green Kryptonite! Bump the giant fists against each other to see who will win this crazy battle.

Features
* Collect and play as your favourite DC Comic character and explore the 3 different worlds!
* Great fun for kids 5-12!
* Become the hero or play as the mischievous villain
* Fun cinematics to watch and learn about the villains and heroes!
* Bluetooth Game Controller Support

LEGO DC Mighty Micros is free to play and offers no in-app purchases.

For app support contact LEGO Consumer Service.
For contact details refer to http://service.lego.com/contactus

Our privacy policy and terms of use for apps are accepted if you download this app.
Read more on http://aboutus.lego.com/legal-notice/Privacy-Policy and http://aboutus.lego.com/legal-notice/terms-of-use-for-apps

LEGO and the LEGO logo are trademarks of the LEGO Group. ©2016 The LEGO Group.

comments: The movement and the ability to delete structures for refund could be better. Trading HQ could be so much better, my main concern are the loading screens. Perhaps instead of loading the whole city a separate map viewer could be opened that shows general statistics and layout but not the entire city. That way trading could be done faster between cities and there would be more involvement with the trading community. As it stands its a real chore and is deterring me from trading as much as I'd like. Another idea is if the stock market could be integrated somehow. I think that would be cool, and it would add an element of realism.

Thanks for new upgrade . Even when the game was slow i didn't stop playing. I love this game. It's not only a game for me...i am a President of my club and i have to lead my members... in less than one year i reached level 50 and almost all land expanded...just  you have to understand how to play... be smart... some advice for beginners  start participate in mayor competition...this way you will grow faster

This game is crazy addictive. But it's way too easy to accidentally spend sim cash when you don't want to. I save religiously and in half a second my finger brushes the wrong button and cash is gone just like that. Really disheartening.  Again I just accidentally spent sim cash. A lot of it and it took me months to save it. I think I'm officially done with this game.

By a stroke of luck I got my old game back in February 2018 after a span of a year and a month. Good to be back. A suggestion : why don't you have something like a banking system wherein you can exchange the different currencies in play in the game. There could be a selling price and a purchase price which gives the bank a margin

Great game. But what I miss are written below.   1. Direct search & contact any city.   2. Invite a city to be friend from within game.   3. Direct private message with a city from within Game.   4. Make a city tagged as favourite city or liked city.   5. Want a clean viewing mode of own city without those construction hats and other info symbols on top of  building being constructed.  I think they are massively missed. And if you can provide these facilities then it will be the best game of it's class.

Addictive & fun.  In a perfect world: more land expansion is needed. Also, variable prices at the GTHC based on scarcity would be better than fixed ones based on difficulty to produce.  One important thing.  There is premium currency in this game.  It's very easy to accidentally spent it, as there is no confirm button on premium currency purchases.  Fix this and will give 5-stars again
description: Welcome, Mayor! Be the hero of your very own city as you design and create a beautiful, bustling metropolis. Every decision is yours as your city gets larger and more intricate. Make smart choices to keep your citizens happy and your skyline growing. Then trade, chat, compete, and join clubs with fellow Mayors. Build your way to extraordinary with the most popular city builder on mobile!BRING YOUR CITY TO LIFEBuild skyscrapers, parks, landmarks, factories, and much more! Place buildings strategically to keep the taxes flowing and your city growing. Solve real-life challenges like traffic, fires, and pollution. Provide services like power plants and police departments, and boost your population with parks and education. Keep traffic moving with grand avenues and streetcars. Take on fun challenges to shape your society.PUT YOUR IMAGINATION ON THE MAPExpand along the beach with a marina, waterpark, and luxury beachfront. Build a Tokyo-style neighborhood and unlock exclusive landmarks like the Eiffel Tower and Statue of Liberty. Discover innovative technologies with Future Cities and get athletic with sports stadiums. Hit the town with Las Vegas buildings and go Hollywood with movie studios. There‚Äôs always something new and different to make your city unique.BATTLE YOUR WAY TO VICTORYCompete in real-time PvP with Club Wars, where you strategize with Mayor‚Äôs Club members and declare war on other cities. Once the battle is on, unleash crazy disasters on opponents, like the Disco Twister and Plant Monster, to do damage and watch the wreckage happen live. Earn disaster cards, SimCash, and other valuables to use in battle or to improve your city. Also, take on other players in the Contest of Mayors. Complete weekly challenges and climb the ranks to advance through Leagues. Become a top Mayor and get rewards that can upgrade and beautify your city.CONNECT AND TEAM UPJoin a Mayor‚Äôs Club to trade supplies with other members and chat about strategies and available resources. Collaborate to help someone complete their personal vision and get support to complete yours. Build big, work together, lead other Mayors, and watch your city come to life!-------User Agreement: terms.ea.com/enPrivacy and Cookie Policy: privacy.ea.com/en Visit https://help.ea.com/en/ for assistance or inquiries. Important Consumer Information.¬† This app:¬† Requires acceptance of EA‚Äôs Privacy & Cookie Policy and User Agreement. Contains advertisements for EA and its partners. Collects data through third party analytics technology (see Privacy & Cookie Policy for details).  Contains direct links to the Internet and social networking sites intended for an audience over 13. EA may retire online features after 30 days‚Äô notice posted on www.ea.com/service-updates.

descriptionHTML:
Please give our game a 5 stars - your evaluations inspirate us to improve the game. Your support is very important for developers and for our development.

This game is for those who love adventure and creativity! Here, you definitely will not be bored! This game will appeal to both children and adults.
There are two game modes: survival and creativity. Create your perfect world! Make it brighter and more interesting with advanced settings.
All generated worlds store many secrets and unpredictable finds! But be on the alert, you never know when you'll have to defend yourself!
In addition, each of the worlds has its own conservation, and you can return to the game later without any loss.
For more fun you can play with your friends in multiplayer mode.
This game will not leave anyone indifferent! It will entice you for a long time. In this game is always fun and very interesting!
Thank you for choosing our game! Pleasant pastime and high achievements in the game!

Board to switch to flight mode
- Press once on the button in the center of the joystick;
- To go up, slide your finger from the same button to the top arrow;
- To go down, slide your finger from the same button to the bottom arrow;
- To land, press again on the button in the center of the joystick.

Features:
Beautiful graphics in high resolution.
It is supported by all modern devices.
Free flight mode.
Randomly generated maps with complete freedom of action.
Dynamically changing world.
Many other inhabitants and animals.
Two game modes: survival and creativity.
Many different blocks and objects.
Even more items and functions.
Different types of terrain.
Multiplayer mode
For all age categories.
summary: Beautiful cubic worlds. Free. Survival and creativity. Many blocks and items.
title: Loco Craft: Exploration And Building

comments: Definitely pay to win. When you scroll up or down it thinks you are clicking on something. Stamina is a nightmare as when you reach a high enough level that takes more xp to level up, you can't play for hours as it takes to long to recharge. Should make gems easier to get for non paying players so it is more fair. Other than that pretty good.

One of the few games that I don't mind spending a bit i.e. $10+ every month. Requires team guild effort to achieve stuffs together definitely gives a good feeling. Event is weekly and community is lively. Card's artwork feels like Rage of Bahamut but using matching puzzle style to deal damage. Skills of card matter as well increasing the complexity and fun. Only thing to improve would be cheaper ingame currency to encourage more people to have better decks thus higher activity rates.

It's a lot other games of this type. I haven't been able to find a problem with it yet. Great graphics although the timer is a bit fast when you're looking up connections. If you had a button that the players would push when they couldn't find any more connections, that would be great!

Number one of the best games I have ever played on my phone. I'm watching ads for bonus experience when sacrificing my cards. And I love the fact of that availability. Especially since it pays them which increases chances of more games like this one. Keep up the great work. Really helping my cognitive development of pattern recognition

Dont expect any support for this game. I've been locked out and i am still waiting on a resolution, like many here. I've paid money and i know i wont be getting any compensation let alone how long its going to take to fix it.

Its a match 3, pay to win game with heroes. Its pay to win lootbox style pay to win mechanics enures that unless you are extremely lucky or9 intend to pay alot, you wouldnt win jack. The match 3 RNG can also make the game infuriating, such as when there is little to no matches or the matches are for colors which yohr team doesnt have. However, unlike other match 3 games, it is fun for longer.

comments: I played this a while back and decided to come back and see if anything had changed and it sure did. There have been several updates that I love (the new maps, new sharks, equipment, etc.) and I'm glad I'm playing it now. In game currency price for items has been balanced out which I love and the missions system is much better now. I would highly recommend this game to anyone who likes progression-based time-killing games like Hungry Shark World.

This game is amazing! Everyone needs to play this. I would've given a fifth star however you need to not only buy all XXL sharks to unlock the "!!" Sharks but max them out. Definitely download this, just one tip. Don't delete when you have progress. I've downloaded, played, got bored, and deleted 3 times. Now I'm never deleting it. I have so much progress, if I never deleted it the first time I would have everything in the game

Favourite Shark game in the entire world. I became obsessed because it's so addictive and fun. The graphics are amazing, disappointed when I got my new phone I lost my progress even when I used the smart transfer to transfer the app. I've had to start all over again... but the fun continues!

Do not upgrade your Sharks.  The bigger the shark, the more difficult it is to play.  Big sharks have more drain on health and hunger, causing you to die more frequently. Impassable areas due to size of !! shark and less fishes to eat when health gets low.  Not to mention how slow these big sharks move!  The more you spend on bigger sharks, the less fun you'll have.

I've had to start this game all over from the very beginning 3 times. After working hard to get all the way to the top sharks, the app will suddenly refuse to connect to your Facebook account and want you to start a whole new game. Waste of time. Very frustrating. Not enjoyable at all. Find a game that's enjoyable. This one is definitely not fun.

This game is really addictive and i love it but i own everything now so I don't play anymore. I occasionally get on just to check for new stuff and they do put out new stuff but it takes a long, loooonggggg time. Please put new sharks out and don't make us wait foreverrrr!

descriptionHTML:
*** Hungry Shark World Selected in Google Play’s Best Games of 2016 collection ***
The Sharks are back in the bigger and badder sequel to Hungry Shark Evolution!
Control a shark in a feeding frenzy and eat your way through many oceans feasting on everything from bite-size fish and birds to tasty whales and unwitting humans!
***This game is only compatible with devices running on Android 4.2 or above***

MORE THAN 20 SHARK SPECIES
Choose from a range of sharks in 7 different size tiers, including the most iconic ocean predator: the Great White!

HUGE OPEN WORLDS
Explore the lush Pacific Islands, frozen Arctic Ocean, exotic Arabian Sea, and now the South China Sea, a vibrant urban destination full of fresh, unwary victims!

FEAST FOR YOUR EYES
Experience the feeding frenzy in stunning console quality 3D graphics that will blow everything else out of the water!

SURVIVAL OF THE HUNGRIEST
It’s eat or be eaten in waters packed with 100s of delicious and dangerous creatures… Whales, submarines and wandering locals BEWARE!

SMASHING SHARK SWAG
Level up your shark and equip jawsome gadgets to bite harder, swim faster and grow even hungrier! No shark is complete without headphones, umbrella and a freakin' jetpack!

MANIC MISSIONS & BADASS BOSSES
Take on more than 20 different types of mission including high score challenges, prey hunts and epic boss fights!

HELPFUL PREDATORY PETS
Baby sharks, whales, an octopus, and even a bald eagle are happy to help with special abilities to increase health, score and more!

SUPERSIZED MEAL DEAL
Unleash your shark's predator potential: SuperSize mode, rushes, explosion, hypnosis and more!

INTUITIVE TILT CONTROLS
Back by popular demand, now you can control your shark simply by tilting your phone!

Google Play Leaderboards and Achievements enabled.
Use Facebook to synchronise your progress across your GP devices.
Hungry Shark World is regularly updated with new features, content and challenges to keep you coming back for more!
This app contains In-App Purchases which allow you to buy Gems and Gold currency which can be spent on upgrades and accessories. Gems and Gold can also be collected in game without requiring purchases.
This game contains advertising. Advertising is disabled if you make any purchase.

comments: So I love the app but in free mode it will let you play.missions.. In a couple of the missions I have noticed it has given me 200 passengers to bring to a airplane boat (forgot what its called) and you cannot land a plane big enough for 200 passengers on it! No room to land without the wing getting clipped off by the tower and no place to take off from it! Other than that it is an awesome game

A really good game to play if your board and have nothing to do. Its proberly one of the best flight simulators on mobile devices ive ever played. The graphics are acctually really good for a mobile game that runs smoothly. The controles can somtimes be wonky but youll get used to it. I love to play this game i really enjoy. The best thing about it is that, its FREE! Good job 'fun games for free' üëèüëåüñí‚ò∫

Was able to start playing right away because of the level of simplicity and yet you have to learn so you can challenge yourself in the more advanced campaigns that soon come up. The game will leave you finding out that a couple of hours has passed in a blink of an eye because of the fun you're having. I really just started the game so I will come back and update this in a few months as I advance in the game.

I've been losing sleep for days now playing this incredible game. Hahaha! Great graphics, smooth controls, realistic sounds, and easy-to-navigate interface. It doesn't force users to pay real money to fully enjoy and access the game. I wish the game offers a first-person mode where you get to play inside the cockpit and navigate the aircraft. That would be so much extra fun! Hats off to the team behind the game's development! :)

Pretty cool app. I'd like it more the planes/jets could be personalized with personal/or existing airline company names and if you could play commercial type flying modes. All without having to level up or earn money or pay real money for. Like a free fly mode. Oh,oh... and that there was real life situations that happen as a result of no fly zones and stuff. Otherwise it's pretty cool so far.

This is the most addictive flight simulator I have ever played. The game is fairly easy to progress through without having to spend any money. If I had to find one fault it would be that you can't reverse when on a runway which means some times you have no option but to crash your plane as there is very little room to turn around.

descriptionHTML:
Get ready to party with Talking Tom and Friends in a completely NEW KIND OF PUZZLE GAME! Sling and match colors to clear the pool and win! It’s FREE and EASY to play, whether you’re young or just young at heart, so jump into the fun! There’s no other game like it.

***HOW TO PLAY***

Here’s how you can rule the pool!

SLING, BOUNCE, AND MATCH
* Enjoy the game’s unique “sling” mechanic – just pull back the floaties, release, and let them bounce! Match the floaties in the pools to complete the levels and earn keys.

USE GREAT POWER-UPS
* The ROCKET removes all floaties of one color;
* The UNICORN will make all your floaties multicolored for a turn; and

USE THE KEYS to UNLOCK, BUILD and CUSTOMIZE THE WATER PARK
* Use the keys you earn to open new levels and unlock more imaginatively-shaped pools with fun backgrounds.
* Complete the 360 EXCITING LEVELS and beat all the challenging obstacles.
* Explore worlds filled with pirates, dragons, and more!

Join Talking Tom, Talking Angela, Talking Hank, Talking Ben, and Talking Ginger in this exciting water park adventure. It’s the ultimate pool party and everyone's invited! Get ready to party with Talking Tom like never before as you bounce, splash, play, and build the greatest water park ever!

Jump in and download Talking Tom Pool now – it’s free to play!

comments: This is all I needed: another Criminal Case game to take up my free time! I love the whole four of them. The the hidden objects tease my brain to no end. Each game  is intriguing with an original story line. I do have my favorite crime scenes,  and plenty of friends(all over the world) whom play as often as they can too!

It would be nice if you level up and get full energy but your energy had some if not all left before you got it restored that you just increased by the full amount, the way it is now I lose energy when levelling up because it doesnt add any more to the 110 that is standard. I dont think it is fair to those of us who play daily. I never know when my pet will find that last batch of XP and cause the level up to happen. If I am over the 110 already, I don't even see the new energy. Some concessions need to be made for this. I love the game though, it is fun and challenging.

I love this game. I have all of the criminal case games & love them all. The only things that I don't like is that when when ur energy gets refilled, it only adds to what u have, instead of adding an extra 110 to what u have. The other thing is that u can't buy none of the hamburgers, orange juice, chips or anything with ur tokens

Love Criminal Case and a True Fan!! One thing I think should change is that whatever score you have when you level up, the 110 should be added to it. We deserve it  because we Earned it and the only reward we get is to share juice with other players. Give us a Happy Meal and 110 pts.!!

4th instalment of the Criminal Case games. I love playing them all excellent time wasters intriguing story lines. I'm well & truly hooked on the whole series. Gainsborough, Pacific Bay, Save The World & now this Mysteries Of The Past........ all brilliant

I've been addicted to the Original Criminal Case for a long time! I thought I would try this version! Just started & I'm already hooked! It's great fun! I Love all the old fashioned before the 20th century stuff! Can't wait to see what comes with the game!

comments: I mean, come on! It's a fantastic game. At least some of us should try something new! The creator spent days trying to create it for us. Why don't we appreciate it? At least give the fantastic creator credit, because you can just leave suggestions. We don't have to push them.

want a fun game to play? Your in luck. Download now. Its short, but challenging. Don't waste time looking for games that you  like but don't. its very easy to upload. I was very happy when I found something I could upload...THIS GAME. its free and fun. Enjoy playing this! Thanks for reading.

Well, I don't even know how to start the game. First, they show me the starting video. Then I just have 20 coins and I can't do anything except for changing the 2 people's clothes. I would be thankful for anybody who tells me how to start the game. But I really like the mansion's design.

Okay, I guess I mean there isn't a point to this game. you just keep doing the same thing over and over again. It's not the worst thing I played bit defiantly needs some updates, But it isn't that bad of a game. All I can say is try it, if you like it, good for you!

FOR THOSE WHO DOESN'T KNOW HOW TO PLAY: When you get to the homescreen, go to the bottom right and you'll see a play button, press that and it'll start the fun. For those who hate this, why can't you observe closely first before screaming your complaints? Can't you see the game creator worked hard just in order to entertain you and you repay them with complaints on not knowing how to play?What if you created a game and others complain not knowing how to play? Is that nice?(Not to offend) thank you

Disappointed It was cute but its really boring, you get a timer that goes too fast, meaning you can't get things done in time! You don't have control of them, they tell you what to do next so no free will, its not like the sims for kids

comments: The game is alright, but I  have some frustrations with it. For one, sometimes when you release the ball, the aim will move suddenly and cause it to hit off of your intend target. Also, it isn't cool when you start a new level and you have no available moves (you can't pop any bubbles! ), Sometimes for a number of turns, sometimes in the middle or at the end of the level. Usually it is manageable enough. Still frustrating tho. Maybe it is an international challenge of the game..  Overall a decent game

Uninstalling. The controls are imprecise (ball would slip off the desired direction occasionally) and the order of the colours would make it impossible to win on occasion. I can forgive the first thing (muscle) but making it impossible to win is not forgivable.  Work on the algorithm.

I used to enjoy this game when I had a minute spare. I was cruising at around level 300 enjoy the simplicity of it but not anymore! Since the introduction of the "ice" balls, it's become near impossible. Reading the other comment I'm glad to see that others are frustrated with the aim moving right at the last minute. I had this at 5 stars now it's 1.

Games really nice good mind challenge, great for color match making if color blind. You may not know what colors your matching however, ever since i started playing i've also been getting better at matching my clothes and random day to day organising of colored items. Love the game however the ball simetimes seems to go where it wants to instead of where you released it... I noticed this a few times i would aim let go and the line would randomly jump to a new spot and the ball shots almost a completely diffrent location

It is a good game but is built to take $$.  There are some levels that will not let you pass without spending $$ which I refuse to do.   I understand the need to make $$, but when it is blatantly built to take money, that is where I have an issue.  I wish I could upload the video of the level this takes place in, then you would understand what I mean. Decent game but sad for the obvious reason for the game.
Best goddamn game I've ever played, most amazing graphics in the entire gaming world! I'm thinking of naming my next kid Power Pop. I didn't believe in God until I discovered this life changing game.
description: Start your engines and get ready to shoot and pop all the electric bubbles until you clear the screen. Solve the fun puzzles and challenges to level up and advance along the silver map. Download for free from Google Play and join the electric factory fun with bubble shooter. Pop bubbles and explore over hundreds awesome levels filled with seriously amazing boosts, power-ups and features.- Make 7 shots in a row to earn a fireball that will burn up bubbles on the way.- Drop 10 bubbles or more and get a bomb that will take out surrounding bubbles.Cool FeaturesAddictive gameplay. Play and enjoy hours of endless fun. Hundreds of incredible levels packed with fun puzzles and challenges. Bubble swap is free, simply tap on your bubble to change its colorAwesome graphics and effectsPlaying our game is easy, just follow these instructions: Drag your finger to move the laser aiming and lift it to shoot bubbles. You have to match at least 3 bubbles of the same color or more to pop the group and win points. Aim and pop bubbles to win levels. Remember: the fewer shots you use to complete a level, the higher score you‚Äôll get and the chance to earn 3 stars on every level. So warm up your fingers and start working on those matching skills.

comments: Good I hope they fixed the bug where you double buy a car and it gives you the same car but still takes your money. But its still a great game. Ohh! And also raise thr chance if getting a legendary I played for almost a year and I never got one l. My friend got one all the time on his apple but there Is a glitch with android.ive never had one.

It's good but... I enjoy playing this game, there isn't too much skill involved but it's a good way to kill time and it stays easy enough to make it enjoyable while raising the difficulty.  The only thing I want to see is no more of this, automatically backing up stuff. When you are nose first in an object, the game automatically backs you up, but I've lost countless games because it doesn't stop or doesn't back up enough. Let me choose when to back up!

Good but... you can sometimes glich and get trapped but it's a good game anyway like you run from police. Also when you start off you have to press right or left to start so you can't go straight forward when you get on. I really liked it though it is one of my favourite games! I'm out  Later ima go play some Smashy Road now!

Good, but has some bugs I'm sorry if I'm being too critical in this review but especially on Mobile Data, Smashy Road can lag. This is to the extent the game will no longer work. Moving on to a positive, the graphical interface is very nice, the perspective, movement and background vehicles is very well created.  Very good game overall

Shalom there, The game is awesome. I liked it very much and hoping that in the future they will be more cars to be added. I really hope that "military helicopter" can shoot something, it is funny...so idle. Last thing, a HOVERCRAFT can go "river mode" ! Wrecked... because of...water. Hope you'll add the " police boats " in next update. Overall, abundant of thanks and good luck.

I LOVE THIS GAME. It just need's some work to do. Like, you guys need to fix the glitch of the lines by the road. And you need to fix when we explode the oil truck and fall on the ground and you disapear. And can u guys please add some new prizes like to change the color of ur car. And when I have 100 dollars u can spend it on colors  theirs a button to choose what prize you want. Like say I get the color blue for a red car. And I like the red car so I go to the prize machins and choose to buy a color than I have the button to change the color of ur car. That will make the game a lot better. And I'm sure when u do it there will be more downloads.

Actually i love GTA GAMES so i thaught it would be fun playing but its almost 3 weeks and i have completed all the mission.. And have nothing to do... So just uninstalling the game.... Waiting for more mission but could not find any so now uninstalling it... Ya it is quite a fun to play but quite difficult to handle the controls if ur new to this kind of game...

Major problems with the Rope Hero games. ALL OF THEM. First problem: Leaving the game at all shuts it down completely; any quests you may have been in the middle of, will be dropped. Second: By tapping any of their many ads, you leave the game. Which in turn, shuts it down, and whatever you were in the middle of. Third: there are far too many ads. Anything you do? There will be an ad. Fourth: There are major grammar problems in any speech within the game. This shows a great neglect during the creation of the game.

It's fun but you should offer a paid version and Bluetooth controller support. If you did I'd buy it but since I doubt this will happen I'm uninstalling. Looks fun but too many ads and touch-screen controls for these games suck.

comments: Can no longer watch ads to get an extra rewards chest plus, I logged in for 90 days and did not get my legendary chest. My screen froze up when I hit the claim button and had to restart my game. Now my chest is gone and the next level has appeared without me being able to chose what I wanted from the chest.

What the f..k? Every time i watch a video for an extra bird I get nothing. Its pay to play not play to have fun... How long till they will get low ratings? I see the comm are all complains only about every thing in the game. Cant blame people they are right.

RESUBMITTED: Arena games were sucked up by those high-card players or maybe cheaters. My power cards are the same, just like my opponent, or higher than my opponent's cards. When I slinging those piggies or blocks, it gives me lower points like 4 hundred thousand. But if my opponent slinging them all, it gives higher points like 7.5 million. I lost my winning streaks so I had to play again but it gives me same points so I lost again, sadly. I thought your arena games are really much fun, but they're not.

GAH! They've over complicated this game with unnecessary graphics and gifts and prizes etc. I couldn't even figure out how to get into the levels for a while haha. I'm sure if I had the patience to go through and understand it properly it would be fine, but I didn't want to. Old angry birds setup was better. Wish you didn't change it. Uninstalled after 1 day.

I really think the tower is rigged. 1 in 4 chance of getting the pig but it seems to happen ALL the time. Cant get past the 6th or 7th floor. However if you spend lots o money to buy gems I guess it can be done. Not for me I am out.

Broken game mechanics. unstable. Repeated crashes during tournament resulting in instant loss. unbreakable pig structures added. Big Red and bomber unable to break glass? Next level tab covered up by fb connect tab. Game has become a disgusting money grab.
description: Join hundreds of millions of players for FREE and start your Angry Birds slingshot adventure now! Team up with your friends, gather in clans and take on challenges and events in the all new game modes. Are you ready to evolve your birds and show your skills in the most daring Angry Birds game out there?CHOOSE YOUR BIRD!It‚Äôs the ultimate slingshot strategy ‚Äì YOU choose which bird to fling next! ‚ÄúBut that makes it easier, right?‚Äù WRONG! You‚Äôll need to choose wisely if you‚Äôre going to stop those eggs from getting scrambled. Plus, destroy blocks to fill up the Destruct-O-Meter and earn extra birds!NEW MULTI-STAGE LEVELS!You‚Äôve never seen Piggy Island like this ‚Äì jaw-droppingly stunning levels brimming with exotic plants, quirky details and plenty of peril. And because those naughty porkies are building their teetering towers right under your beak, many levels have multiple stages. Uh oh.SPECTACULAR SPELLS!Blizzards, Hot Chilis, Golden Ducks and other outrageous spells give you an added advantage against those swindling swine. descriptionHTML:
Join hundreds of millions of players for FREE and start your Angry Birds slingshot adventure now! Team up with your friends, gather in clans and take on challenges and events in the all new game modes. Are you ready to evolve your birds and show your skills in the most daring Angry Birds game out there?

CHOOSE YOUR BIRD!
It’s the ultimate slingshot strategy – YOU choose which bird to fling next! “But that makes it easier, right?” WRONG! You’ll need to choose wisely if you’re going to stop those eggs from getting scrambled. Plus, destroy blocks to fill up the Destruct-O-Meter and earn extra birds!

NEW MULTI-STAGE LEVELS!
You’ve never seen Piggy Island like this – jaw-droppingly stunning levels brimming with exotic plants, quirky details and plenty of peril. And because those naughty porkies are building their teetering towers right under your beak, many levels have multiple stages. Uh oh.

SPECTACULAR SPELLS!
Blizzards, Hot Chilis, Golden Ducks and other outrageous spells give you an added advantage against those swindling swine. And when you need some serious help, guess who’s at hand to make a pork-smashing cameo? That’s right, it’s the sardine loving Mighty Eagle. Oh yeah!

CHALLENGE OTHER PLAYERS!
Challenge players from across the world in the Arena to see who’s the most hardcore bird flinger of them all. Play new tournaments every day, earn feathers to level up your birds and face off against the toughest competition on the planet. Game face!

DEFEAT BOSS PIGGIES!
There’s some serious bad guys on Piggy Island, and your slingshot skills are needed to take them down. Foreman Pig, Chef Pig and the infamous King Pig will stop at nothing to keep your eggs. Are you gonna let ‘em get away with that? It’s time to teach the pork a lesson.

Found a game called "Infinite Balls" on my friend's iPhone, we loved it. This is the best Android alternative we could find, but it's not quite as satisfying. Balls are never randomized, there are no circular objects for the balls to bounce off from and neither an infinite mode. Also you  have to get used to the controls. Would be nice to turn off the help lines, too.

Super fun and addicting, the beginning levels are pretty easy but they get to be rather challenging after a while!  The only thing I don't like is the frequency of the ads.  Game itself is great though.

Would be good but the most annoying part is if you fail and you get the prompt to watch an ad to continue and you just want to restart it makes you watch a full bloody ad anyway. So whats the point of not continuing. Rubbish concept.
Good game.  Wish I could purchase ad- free version.  Deleted! I turn volume off for a reason, but then volume is forced in ads, which makes turning volume off option pointless.

I found a bug. If u are playing offline and game is over, you choose to watch video ad while internet is off, it gives u the life anyways. Without watching ad. May b your developera forgot to call the reward video function on that UI's onclick () üòÇ. Overall a nice gameplay

comments: Big fan of Beyblade since I was a kid, from the first generation. So this is cool to play this game and see how far its came. Reopening the game puts me back in the same match and ends in the same endless loop.   Dev team needs to fired and a patrol of lemurs hired instead because they'd at least be entertaining.

comments: I love Beat the Boss 4! But there are some things that I would like to be fixed. For example, when naming your custom boss, the name duplicates. The way to fix it is by putting spaces after it. Another example is that the boss customization screen sometimes switches back to boss selection screen and can't go back after being there for long periods of time. I would love to give this game 5 stars if these issues were fixed.

I loved it. I understand the ads are so that you can continue your work. However, there is a few probelms. First of all, when you click on the judgey/uneven eyes, they change to even eyes. Second of all, when you click on a custom character, the game doubles the name, and following along with that, sometimes it undoes it. I understand if it takes a long time, but i'm asking you, if you can, to please fix these when you can. Sorry for bothering you.      Doge is waiting

Too many ads. It's annoying especially when you are connected to the internet. The King Boss is not working and is always saying "Something went wrong, please try again later" and crashes the whole gane. On the other hand it's a super addictive and fun game to play.

This game needs a lot of work done. So many glitches its really weird and hard to explain the glitches that happen. One of them was the screen uncalibrated itself an it was moved to the upper left side , an the right side was just black . idek if that makes sense but it shouldn't happen.

The game is amazing, but it is pathetic at the fact that there are ads popping up every 2 minutes and there's no way to remove them... I would be happy to pay to remove the ads, I won't be playing this game until this is fixed. I remember playing this game years ago, I understand you guys may be making more money from displaying ads than people paying to remove them.

I'd happily purchase this game but that doesn't seem like an option. Tge ads, especially the LOUD BLOW UP EXPLOSIONS game that go on for 30 seconds are especially annoying. I'll gladly buy it, if only to not deal with Fing ads all the Fing time!!

comments: I've been gaming on my cell for 10 yrs now and in all that time there's been maybe 5 games total that I've played for yrs, continuously, and will always play. It's an adrenaline I've gotten from no other game. But super peaceful and calming @ the same time! Here's to hoping the Developers are just scratching the surface wth this amazing game! But if this is it? Kudos to you guy's on a job well done!

comments: I have loved Hot Wheels for years and this is a good game. Fun and challenging. However I have been a bit frustrated because sometimes I just explode for touching a wall like on level 6. Awesomeüòí Not to mention I sometimes just hit a ramp and don't reach the end and fall into a void. Also fix your Poppa Wheelie's handling. You killed it, literally. Just try and fix your game a bit and I will give a 5.

Horrendous abuse of in game ads like I've never seen before in an app. At some points, you literally cannot proceed until you open the play store. The game races are short balancing acts wherein you simply try to keep your car on its wheels. Do not download, and do not let your kids start playing.

My 2 almost 3 year old and I really like this game. It's pretty fun BUT it seems to freeze up after a few races and I have to shut the game off and restart it to play more. This obviously frustrates little man and I'm sure I'm not the only one this has happened to. Other than that, we think it's a great game.

Lost all in app purchases which amounts to stealing. Beware of doing in app purchases. Way to many ads. App also crashes a lot. Support said they would help then didn't respond after that. If my son was able to lose his progress and the money we sunk in the game because he was using multiple devices and didn't know what Cloud and Local meant which cause him to lose his progress then mabe this game shouldn't be labeled E for Everyone. Change the rating to Teen if they have to know what cloud means or risk losing there in app purchases.  Google change the rating on this game.

I've been playing this app for a while now and up intil now I loved it but ever since the daily race-off challenge the game has been full of bugs. The daily race-off is a great idea but there are just too many bugs in it. I lose lives when I didn't even lose the race or I lose all my lives when I only lost one race.

The game is my little boys favourite but the recent batch of adverts in game (Yahoo specifically) don't close - meaning you have to force quit the game. Lazy programming and terrible QA process from the developers. Avoid.

description: Bubble Witch 3 Saga ‚Äì A magical bubble shooting puzzle game from the makers of Candy Crush Saga.The newest game in the popular Bubble Witch series. descriptionHTML:
Bubble Witch 3 Saga – A magical bubble shooting puzzle game from the makers of Candy Crush Saga.

The newest game in the popular Bubble Witch series. Stella the Witch is back and she needs your help to defeat Wilbur in this exciting puzzle blasting adventure! Wilbur may look cute, but he's full of magical mischief! Travel the realm bursting as many bubbles as you can in this bubble shooting puzzle game.

Help Stella, Nero and Violet restore piece to the realm by matching bubbles with the unique aiming line that allows you and Stella to blast and pop with magical precision! Solve the puzzles to reunite the ghosts, save the owls and rescue the important fairy queen in this explosive bubble shooting adventure. Cast spells and power ups with Nero and blast your way through those extra tough levels to keep up with the mischievous Wilbur!

Blast! Stella needs to rebuild her home all thanks to the evil Wilbur. Take aim and pop your way through the levels to find the magic star dust Stella needs in order to rebuild, customize and style her new home!

The only bubble shooter you will ever need! Take on this magical Saga alone or pop with friends, burst their bubble by setting an all new high-score.

Bubble Witch 3 Saga features:
• Match 3 bubbles to pop them in this magical puzzle shooting adventure
• Spellbinding game modes and cute characters!
• Release the owls, free the ghosts and save the Fairy Queen from Wilbur!
• Rebuild Stella’s house and visit your friends to get rewards
• Special boosters to help you pass those tricky levels
• Easily sync the game between devices when connected to the Internet
• Leader boards to watch your friends and competitors!
• A free & easy to play bubble shooter, challenging to master!
• Available to play on Android phone and tablet devices

Bubble Witch 3 Saga is completely free to play but some optional in-game items will require payment.
You can turn off the payment feature by disabling in-app purchases in your device’s settings.

Visit https://care.king.com/ if you need help!

comments: Graphics have glitches from time to time.  There's not a whole lot of choices to choose from other than what's being offered.  There are no way of earning diamonds to play the game other than buying them. I'd like to see more ways of earning tickets rather than buying or just waiting for it to regenerate. I'd also love to hear the characters speak.

It is addicting! I love the graphics and how everything plays out! You are always hanging on edge, biting your nails and wondering, 'Whats gonna happen next?' Over all its awesome. Sometimes there are glitches but apart from that 5/5!

This is by far one of the best choices games I think I've ever played the graphics and animation is absolutely second to non, the story so far seems awesome and intriguing. The animation is beautiful and smooth and runs well on my phone. Please never change the way this game is. It gives you the option to buy things but it is very fair to those who can't pay due to money issues so I would definitely recommend this game. The developers should be proud of this game because it really is beautiful designed and made you can tell alot of care and effort went into perfecting this game. It's worth the wait on each episode, I love the stats from other players feature and how you can go back for free to see how different choices would of effect the game differently. All round a very professionally well built game 10 out of 10 wish I could give it more stars it deserves more than 5 :D.
I really like the plots to this game and that it's in Rio. Interesting love story. No matter how much I put Linda with Bruno, she loves Rodrigo.  It's very addictive
I find myself watching the clock for the next episodes. Great app but I wish you would change their wardrobe up. Most especially Marcia's.
If she will be with Rodrigo again, Im not playing this anymore. This drama is so boring. No matter what I do, she will always choose Rodrigo. I want her with Bruno !

comments: I'm loving these updates really bring more life to the game. The new car is really fun because it can flip over really easy. Please don't change that. A few suggestions: When you go to winter wonderland you can't go back. Would be cool if car panels would become detached like the hood or the trunk. Adding a police cruiser would be cool too. I like the breakable rear lights on some of the cars. Maybe add deflatable tires? Very good game all in all

This game is fun and entertaining and you can test drive all the vehicles which make it quite cool. Wish there was a camera view which you could zoom out so you can see from a better angle of all those around you. Reversing auto changes the camera. Some times multiple simultaneous button clicks don't work. And I wish they had one of my favourite cars here, the Lamborghini Sesto Elemento

Its a very addictive and also a great time killer would like to see a spoiler selection for the cars. My favirote car is fury. I would like to see a (1963 Ferrari 250 gto WITHOUT smoke stacks) the thing i dont like about the game it is not letting me into the city i bought it and i tried over and over again but its not letting me its gliching a lot and exits me out of the game other than that it is a great game would like to see some new buses and trailers for  the semi's out in test trive mode and a new land area in the mountains.

I had loved this game until it stopped saving my car purchases. Like my last  one the pick up that looks exactly like a 80s chevy with the cap off and roll cage. I put 7.0 motor in it with NOS tires and paint. Went in this morning it was gone. Please fix.Norton also says you're monitoring my location how obtrusive you dushbags.

This game is awsome!  Controls and graphics can be a little laggy,  but the large amount of tracks and cars to unlock and play around with makes up for it. My favorite car is the Duke Wagon Classic, nitro-charged, with a v-8 dropped into it.  Will kick butt in any race or derby! My only suggestion would be on the physics of the cars... Instead of having the bodies simply crush and get smaller/deformed, it would be cool to see body panels and  small pieces like lights and mirrors fall right off. Just a thought. Also it would be cool to have more big station wagon type cars.

Need a 67 Shelby mustang gt 500 fastback "Eleanor". Also needs a hand brake for sharp turns and drifting and maybe an inside view with steering wheel and stick shift. Very fun and addicting game. Great job here. Multi-player would be cool too.
