description: Remark: The game language itself is German, but most words are still in English, and most functionalities are easy to guess. There will be an ‚Äúall-English‚Äù update in the future, but feel free to race for your personal best time with this version already. #unraceable icebox - Create it, feel it!#unraceable #icebox turns you into a track designer in a playful way: You build your own track with your own hands directly at the #unraceable #table into a real snow slope - incl. Inclines, curves, archways, ski jumps, finishing line, blue slope markings and so on.The finished racing track will then be scanned and completed to a revolutionary 3D virtual reality landscape that you can drive in either in the #unraceable simulator, or at home via ‚ÄúAudi #unraceable‚Äù app. This is where the adventure starts: With the VR glasses, you experience the virtual car race on your personal route sitting on a Motion Seat in real time. Emotional, real, tangible: the Motion Seat transmits speed, braking- and physical forces up to 2G directly to the player in a perfect simulation. Check out the current location of the seat at www.unraceable.at.Take it, enjoy it, share it!The mobile app gives you the unique opportunity to take your individual racetrack back home with you on your smartphone, to experience it over and over again and to further improve your personal top performance. You can challenge your friends via Facebook on your track and rate the tracks of other friends. Your track will also be sent to you by E-mail including a photo of your performance in the Motion Seat.How are you able to share your track with friends? The image of your racetrack will include a code: If you enter this code in the app, your track will be publicly available for everyone to race on. When a friend shares his "skiing adventure", you will have the opportunity to accept the challenge and beat your friend's time with this track-code. Moreover: As a logged-in Facebook user you will be able to see the shared routes of your friends on an extra tab.The ultimate Special: Beat the stars!An absolute highlight are the star specials from #unraceable. For example, you will be able to challenge various stars on their tracks. The master track of the 6-time overall World Cup winner and Audi brand ambassador Marcel Hirscher is certainly the ultimate challenge. Hirscher's best time is the benchmark for all challengers and gives you the chance to get your personal bonus for your Audi. The faster you are mastering Marcel Hirscher's racetrack, the more bonus (up to 2,000 ‚Ç¨!) you will receive - applicable for a new Audi ‚ÄúJungwagen‚Äù. Simple as that. It is worth it, because there are only 100 bonuses available! Start against the World Cup winner as often as you like - but only your best time will count! But be careful: This bonus expires by the end of this year (2017).Your individual upgradeBeing a top performer pays off: #unraceable #icebox offers you the opportunity to earn "Audi Credits" on all racetracks. These credits are the currency that gives you unbeatable advantages when choosing a vehicle. This lets you for example upgrade your Audi A3 to an S3 and subsequently to an RS3 ‚Äì with each upgrade the vehicle is getting faster and thereby improves your performance while hunting for extra bonus points. Audi Credits can be collected with jumps, drifts and other furious driving maneuvers.
descriptionHTML:
Remark: The game language itself is German, but most words are still in English, and most functionalities are easy to guess. There will be an “all-English” update in the future, but feel free to race for your personal best time with this version already.

#unraceable icebox - Create it, feel it!

#unraceable #icebox turns you into a track designer in a playful way: You build your own track with your own hands directly at the #unraceable #table into a real snow slope - incl. Inclines, curves, archways, ski jumps, finishing line, blue slope markings and so on.
The finished racing track will then be scanned and completed to a revolutionary 3D virtual reality landscape that you can drive in either in the #unraceable simulator, or at home via “Audi #unraceable” app. This is where the adventure starts: With the VR glasses, you experience the virtual car race on your personal route sitting on a Motion Seat in real time. Emotional, real, tangible: the Motion Seat transmits speed, braking- and physical forces up to 2G directly to the player in a perfect simulation. Check out the current location of the seat at www.unraceable.at.
Take it, enjoy it, share it!

The mobile app gives you the unique opportunity to take your individual racetrack back home with you on your smartphone, to experience it over and over again and to further improve your personal top performance. You can challenge your friends via Facebook on your track and rate the tracks of other friends. Your track will also be sent to you by E-mail including a photo of your performance in the Motion Seat.
How are you able to share your track with friends? The image of your racetrack will include a code: If you enter this code in the app, your track will be publicly available for everyone to race on. When a friend shares his "skiing adventure", you will have the opportunity to accept the challenge and beat your friend's time with this track-code. Moreover: As a logged-in Facebook user you will be able to see the shared routes of your friends on an extra tab.

The ultimate Special: Beat the stars!

An absolute highlight are the star specials from #unraceable. For example, you will be able to challenge various stars on their tracks. The master track of the 6-time overall World Cup winner and Audi brand ambassador Marcel Hirscher is certainly the ultimate challenge. Hirscher's best time is the benchmark for all challengers and gives you the chance to get your personal bonus for your Audi. The faster you are mastering Marcel Hirscher's racetrack, the more bonus (up to 2,000 €!) you will receive - applicable for a new Audi “Jungwagen”. Simple as that. It is worth it, because there are only 100 bonuses available! Start against the World Cup winner as often as you like - but only your best time will count! But be careful: This bonus expires by the end of this year (2017).

Your individual upgrade

Being a top performer pays off: #unraceable #icebox offers you the opportunity to earn "Audi Credits" on all racetracks. These credits are the currency that gives you unbeatable advantages when choosing a vehicle. This lets you for example upgrade your Audi A3 to an S3 and subsequently to an RS3 – with each upgrade the vehicle is getting faster and thereby improves your performance while hunting for extra bonus points. Audi Credits can be collected with jumps, drifts and other furious driving maneuvers.

I am rewriting my review and giving 5 stars for all. One of the rare games where it is possible to play without paying real money. If you want you can pay to proceed faster but not paying doesn't mean that the game will be unplayable. Bravo!

Great graphics, good storyline, campaign mode is challenging. It would be better if more scenarios could be added for skirmishes. Overall enjoyed it. I will recommend even for those who don't wish to spend money on games.

descriptionHTML:
Taxi Game

Good news! In a few weeks we'll release a big update. Stay tuned for the best taxi sim 2018

You must be a fan of the driving games. We assume that you're crazy about parking games as well. If so, this taxi game is what you need! Try to become a taxi driver in one of the best taxi simulator.
Race your car through the big city traffic, pick up passengers and drive them safely to their destinations.
In your taxi cab you can drive faster than in the bus simulator so be careful! Duty driving is not that easy. Life in the city is crazy, watch out for the people and the traffic.

There are many taxi games in the Google Play store but this one is exceptional. You can driving around the big city, suburbs, construction sites, parks and even the beach. It's crazy how the city lives - people are walking, cars are crossing. Get in your taxi, fasten your seat belts and become a city traffic racer.

Taxi Game features:

- Full 3D large environment
- Smooth controls optimized for taxi sim
- Realistic big city graphics
- Engaging taxi driver missions
- Drive the passengers to their destinations
- Many different routes across the city

Master your driving skills in one of the best taxi games!
summary: Crazy to be a taxi driver? Start as a duty driver in this taxi sim.
title: Taxi Game

comments: This game is a game I can proudly say I will never delete. I hadn't played this game for very long but I have loved it so much. The game is incredibly fast paced so you can play up to about 4 games in 10 minutes. It's never boring and always keeps you on your toes. Both sides are fun. (I feel the sniper needs a buff but this is just my opinion). Other than that small compliant  I love this game.

It was very fun testing the early access! And the thing that i noticed was the new token system. Im not saying the token system was bad, but i liked the older system better. On how there were bronze, silver, and gold stars, and the star depended how good the item was. I was wondering why you changed it. –±–ª–∞–≥–æ–¥–∞—Ä—è!

This game has been amazing since early-access. I  have loved it for a long time and will still love it for a long time. One suggestion though. It would be cool if one could emote inside the van once you have got away or have been arrested

Excellent game. Highly replayable. Fun and challenging. My only issue is that emotes switch from one side to the other when playing as a thief vs playing as a sniper. Plus, having to hit a button to fire vs just hitting the right side of the screen is a bit more difficult. Otherwise, almost perfect game.

WARNING: YOU WILL BE HOOKED AS SOON AS YOU START THE GAME. The game is really cool, I love the gadgets, the replayability, variety of maps, and how this could be free to play. Even though there are alot of glitches, these improvements will make up for them

Its greedy from the developer to make bigger price of silver and other chests every time when i get close enough to amout of gold needed for buying it. First the price of silver chest was 80 then when i got 60gold price gone to 110 then when i had 90 gold it got up to 130 its like they are pushing me to spend money and i never did that. Good game but so greedy that it deservs one star!!!!

comments: I really love this game. Of course it WANTS you to spend real money on it, but you don't really have to to make progress. Just set stuff up then go back to it later. As per other reviews it does take a while to load, but due to the excellent graphics, music and overall feeling of happiness I get playing this - they are forgiven.

SO HAPPY!üòÄüòÄüòÄüòÄüòÄüòÄ This is really fun! It is really magical. I love disney ever since I saw this game. Just it lags when we collect rewards and it kicks me off. Rather than that it is perfect! Great game, I need more games like this! Why do companies  do not make more games like this ?! I had been playing since the second month it came out! So 2 years. Who cares about money I do not use my real money and I am progressing a lot! Maybe it is some phones and tablets. When I do not need the characters I put them in long missions and get a bunch of magic. SO HAPPY!

Okay, this is probably the most honest review I will ever take the time to write. The game is beautiful and entertaining...just like everything Disney does. The other thing Disney does EXTREMELY well is suck money from you (I live in Orlando - I KNOW this, Man). I'm not proud of what I'm about to say but I just spent $30 on essentially a "Russian Roulette" for Alice in Wonderland characters. It's like this...the game is entertaining and enjoyable to an extent...but if you're money concisious don't download this game. I've played a lot of app games and this one FAR surpasses the need for real money. The game is entertaining and fun if you semi/kinda love Disney stuff because of nostalgia or whatever...but if you're a die-hard Disney fanatic...this game will bankrupt you. So, fear it.

I really love this game. My only complaint is when they have special release items every 2 hours or every 4 hours. They release 24 hours a day, so if you want to rank high on the leaderboard you have to wake up multiple times a night to play! I'm sleep deprived!

OK I love this game, however have a problem, I recently broke my phone had to send it of to get fixed. Have uploaded this game to my iPad have clicked it over to the correct game to keep my level however gets right to the loading section then kicks me out. My iPad is up to date, can you please fix this bug. I haven't played for a few games, the tempary phone I have won't let me play either. Please fix..

This is a literal waiting game.   Little to no reward for waiting hours at the very start.   I tried being patient and sticking to it but the waiting just gets longer.   It's a money sink.   You'll not make any progress.   The chests are a joke, the rewards are a joke, and you'll never unlock new characters.
description: WELCOME TO THE MOST MAGICAL PLACE ON MOBILE!When Maleficent casts an evil spell on the Kingdom, ridding it of all of its powerful magic, can you help bring it all back? Relive the thrill of Disney Parks and create the most fantastical Park of your dreams in Disney Magic Kingdoms!EXTRAORDINARY & TIMELESS DISNEY PARK ATTRACTIONS‚Ä¢ Charming attractions such as ""it's a small world,"" the Monsters, Inc. Laugh Floor and Space Mountain from Disney Parks from around the world, including Disneyland, California Adventure, Walt Disney World, Tokyo Disneyland and Disneyland Paris!‚Ä¢ Dazzling new attractions such as WALL-E‚Äôs House and Cyclops Sushi -- all uniquely inspired by their movies!‚Ä¢ Relive magical moments from the Parks with the entire family through lively Parades featuring beautiful floats and fireworks!CHARACTERS SPANNING MORE THAN 90 YEARS OF DISNEY‚Ä¢ Share spectacular moments with beloved characters such as the ever-optimistic Mickey Mouse, the spirited princess Rapunzel, brave space ranger Buzz Lightyear, the sweet and sassy Tinker Bell and more fun characters!‚Ä¢ Play hundreds of whimsical, fun, and animated quests that bring every pixel of your Kingdom to life!‚Ä¢ Collect memorable Disney-themed items to free each character from Maleficent's evil spell!PLAY A RIVETING TALE OF HEROES AND VILLAINS‚Ä¢ Unravel and play a magical story and an exciting adventure with every tap!‚Ä¢ Take a stand against menacing villains such as Pete, Mother Gothel, and Zurg to save the Kingdom!Come and join us in the most magical free game on mobile! It‚Äôs your world for the making!Perfect to play for fans of Disney, Disneyland, theme park games, Pixar movie games, a fun game, tycoon games, free family games, and park builder games.___You can download and play this game for free. Please be informed that it also allows you to play using virtual currency, which can be acquired as you progress through the game, or by deciding to watch certain advertisements, or by paying with real money. Purchases of virtual currency using real money are performed using a credit card, or other form of payment associated with your account, and are activated when you input your Google Play account password, without the need to re-enter your credit card number or PIN. In-app purchases can be restricted by adjusting the authentication settings within your Play Store settings (Google Play Store Home > Settings > Require authentication for purchases) and setting up a password for each purchase / Every 30 minutes or Never. Disabling password protection may result in unauthorized purchases. We strongly encourage you to keep password protection turned on if you have children or if others could have access to your device.This game contains advertising for Gameloft‚Äôs products or some third parties which will redirect you to a third-party site. You can disable your device‚Äôs ad identifier being used for interest-based advertising in the settings menu of your device. This option can be found in the Settings app > Accounts (Personal) > Google > Ads (Settings and Privacy) > Opt out of interest-based ads.Certain aspects of this game will require the player to connect to the Internet. Find out more about the game on the official site -- http://www.disney-magic-kingdoms.com/_____________________________________________Visit our official site at http://gmlft.co/website_ENCheck out the new blog at http://gmlft.co/centralDon't forget to follow us on social media:Facebook: http://gmlft.co/DMKonFBTwitter: http://gmlft.co/DMKtwitterInstagram: http://gmlft.co/DMK_InstaYouTube: http://gmlft.co/GL_SNS_YTForum :  http://gmlft.co/DMK_ForumThis app allows you to purchase virtual items within the app and may contain third party advertisements that may redirect you to a third party site.Terms of Use: http://www.gameloft.com/en/conditions-of-usePrivacy Policy: http://www.gameloft.com/en/privacy-noticeEnd-User License Agreement: http://www.gameloft.com/en/eula

When Maleficent casts an evil spell on the Kingdom, ridding it of all of its powerful magic, can you help bring it all back? Relive the thrill of Disney Parks and create the most fantastical Park of your dreams in Disney Magic Kingdoms!

EXTRAORDINARY & TIMELESS DISNEY PARK ATTRACTIONS
• Charming attractions such as ""it's a small world,"" the Monsters, Inc. Laugh Floor and Space Mountain from Disney Parks from around the world, including Disneyland, California Adventure, Walt Disney World, Tokyo Disneyland and Disneyland Paris!
• Dazzling new attractions such as WALL-E’s House and Cyclops Sushi -- all uniquely inspired by their movies!
• Relive magical moments from the Parks with the entire family through lively Parades featuring beautiful floats and fireworks!

CHARACTERS SPANNING MORE THAN 90 YEARS OF DISNEY
• Share spectacular moments with beloved characters such as the ever-optimistic Mickey Mouse, the spirited princess Rapunzel, brave space ranger Buzz Lightyear, the sweet and sassy Tinker Bell and more fun characters!
• Play hundreds of whimsical, fun, and animated quests that bring every pixel of your Kingdom to life!
• Collect memorable Disney-themed items to free each character from Maleficent's evil spell!

PLAY A RIVETING TALE OF HEROES AND VILLAINS
• Unravel and play a magical story and an exciting adventure with every tap!
• Take a stand against menacing villains such as Pete, Mother Gothel, and Zurg to save the Kingdom!

Come and join us in the most magical free game on mobile! It’s your world for the making!

Perfect to play for fans of Disney, Disneyland, theme park games, Pixar movie games, a fun game, tycoon games, free family games, and park builder games.

comments: I have only had the game a few hours and I am already falling in love with it. It is great to go on when you have a spare 10-15 minutes. The grid is larger than others so I can read the words fluently and quickly without them being hard to see. You get points after each time you complete the grid so if you are really stuck you can receive a hint for some points. I would highly recommend this excellent game.

Only been playing for a few days now, and so far, I love it! Forgot how fun Word Search puzzles can be, and to have it on my phone is priceless lol.. No complaints with the app so far. I will say though, maybe they should tweak it just a tad, instead of giving a hint only after a short moment, possibly creating 'the option' to have a hint may be a little better. Not a big deal to me. It truly is a great app, love the simplicity of the graphic design too. Glad I came across this game.

I enjoy ALMOST the whole game, being a word find and all, simple, yet deceptively hard at times. Still, I wish there was a way to turn off the 'hints' it gives, as they get annoying... unless there IS a way that I haven't discovered yet...otherwise, I REALLY like the game, and would suggest it to all ages, as it's not too tough for the young ones, but still challenging enough for experienced players.

Pretty good word search game. It's sometimes hard to hit the right letters, especially toward the bottom of the screen. Occasionally words share more than one letter in common. Sometimes  (especially in the  lower levels) a word will show up more than  once in a puzzle. Maybe extra credit for finding a word that's not on the list?

It's a good game but there needs to be a way to turn off hints. If you don't find a word in the time it thinks you should, it keeps giving hints which ruins the gameplay. I pause for various reasons like talking to someone, cat catching a mouse, watching tv at the time, etc.. Or sometimes it might take longer to fins a word than seconds allowed before the hint.

I love this game. Really nice and well thought out game. It's educative too. But I have just one issue with it though: The flashing hint. This gets me distracted each time it flashes. Maybe there could be a hint button at the bottom of the puzzle. That way instead of it flashing and getting us distracted, we could just click on it whenever we need help. Apart from that, it's just perfect. Will give it a 5 when the flashing hint is worked onüòÅ

comments: Absolutely nothing to do after completing campaign mode because all the events after RQ100 are pvp based and with a RQ150 limit while you are only around RQ110 - 115 when you complete campaign.  Even if you paid a lot of real cash to roll for good S class cars it does not mean you could go further after the relatively short campaign mode.  The game is so dead after you 100% the campaign and there will hardly be any reward for you to make way to RQ125 + in order to be competitive in those pvp events again.  This game probably just last 2 weeks tbh.  Great hope and great let down.

Definitely a game for car buffs. It requires using your "mind" to win. I'm not to sure about my rating yet. But, will definitely change if needed. It's unlike any game I've played & I like it! Someone wrote a review that this is a lazy person's game... LMA√ò, I wish they would show me the games they play while they are running, swimming & mountain climbing "while" they play, smh HAHA!

First download crashed and wouldn't load. Had to reinstall the game and Hutch games couldn't recover my profile so had to start again from scratch. I've played through several updates and fixes but the same issues remain, car X beats car y when it shouldnt. Hutch in game support agree there is a problem and send to devs but nothing gets fixed. The whole game seems flawed. To be competitive to you will have to spend about ¬£50 a month. I enjoy the premise but the game is poorly executed.

I love the concept and it's been great to see how far this game has come, but I've been playing since beta and nearly every update wipes my save data and forces me to restart. Luckily, I don't get too far into the game each time, but it is frustrating and enough of a buzz kill for me to drop two stars. If there was a cloud system implemented for saves this game would be a five star in my book

Incredible game. Awesome concept. Two complaints to developers. High speed loop-when you win, it starts detracting points. And also certain mph based drag races,I run out of road but the challenging car gets like 60 miles of road. Besides these, fantastic game.

Followed your advice exactly same as before it doesn't reset to my previous stats back at the start of the game. It's been 2 weeks now and still nothing so I will no longer be playing which is a shame because it was a good game

comments: Loved the game for the first few minutes as it is very simple and interesting. BUT may photos temperature started to climb and quickly shot through the roof to a point where it literally burns you! And it kills your battery! For a simple game like this these facts fore me to give only one star. Fix the code and improve the graphics and it can easily get a 4 to 5 star rating.

Silly pointless battery killing little game, I loved it! The game kinda runs out of puff after level 150 though, as there is nothing else to achieve. I've got all the prestige balls, all the regular balls, all above level 150. Can we have some higher order balls above Thunder please?

Looks BORING at first. But I can't put it down now. And to those complaining about the adds, spam the back button after they start. The only adds this doesn't work for are the ones with the fast forward button in the top left
AD INFESTED! Opens up adds (videos) every time you level up pretty much, which is every 5-15 seconds in the beginning. I cannot give this a proper review when half the game is just watching ads.

Would give this a better review, but there are so many glitches. You can only upgrade a booster once, then you have to close the app and open it again so you can keep upgrading. Loved the game before this started happening. And the tap boost should be longer than 60 seconds, how about 30 minutes like the speed boost.

The first thing that happens when you open the game is collect what you've earned while you're away. And whether or not I pick the X2 option I have to wait through a 30 second add. Every. Time. Whoever decided to force adds at every collection is costing the developer a lot of money.

You need to sort a league out also need to sets and legs against players and also the scoring when it looks like it's in a treble it's given as a single there are not fall outs or hitting wires which make things more interesting
I think it stupid how you match higher average with lower average should be by level also fix your daily challenge i do daily challenge everyday and im still stuck on day 1

comments: This game is really fun, challenging at times & exercises and has a great variety of important brain exercises. My only qualm with this game is that everytime you level up a full screen ad gets in the way. Usually they can be closed out easily but not always. Regardless, it's the best free brain training app I have used and it really keeps you sharp!üòÄ

Its rlly a good game for brain training!! Idk why but i didnt find any bug, glitch, or smthing like they all saying. It works well in my device. This is the best app for training your brain. Ofc its not easy, its so challenging, in a good way. I rlly struggle in quick searching and some stages, but its just so addicting and so great!! I recommend you to download it!!!

Additive and helpful. Its not an over night cure so people expecting that need help instead lol. It doesn't deserve a low rating. Yes theres add but it's to be expected with a free game. Having adult a.d.d and huge memory issues.. i can i liked this game. 100 doors is anther good one.

It's fun. My problem is on the attention one we are suppose to click stop once the red dot is on the brain and I do. There is plenty of time to click it  but it tells me i missed it. No matter how many times I click it while the red dot is still on the brain. If I press it 10 times then the screen that tells me I've failed comes up 10 times. Driving me insane.

There's a glitch in "Quick Decision Skill" game. It is based on whether the previous and current object is same or not. When I click on the peach-moon-type object as same, it gives error, though I click on Same when two moons appear consecutively in the game. This way I'll not be able to clear the levels.

I love it!!! The games are interesting. Now I am on "memory match" game which was initially locked and it keeps on freezing and promotes me to next level without me completing the level well. Besides that, I would highly recommended it to others, it's worth installing.
description: Brain Trainer app to quick exercise to your brain short term memory, concentration, focus , speed & accuracy.it has 15 type of brain training games. ‚óÜ  Multitasking brain training . ‚óÜ  Quick Search brain training . ‚óÜ  Math brain training . ‚óÜ  Focus brain training . ‚óÜ  Colors Vs Brain ‚óÜ  Memory Power Training ‚óÜ  Left Brain Vs Right Brain  ‚óÜ  Remember Faces  ‚óÜ  Concentration ‚óÜ  Quick Decision ‚óÜ  Grid Memory Challenge ‚óÜ  Listening Memory ‚óÜ  Word Memory Challenge ‚óÜ  Concentration Plus 1) Multitasking skill: -  Increase your brain multitasking capability by playing this.Questions will be displayed at a time in 2 panels. You have to get target score to finish the level by managing not to loose 3 chances on any panel and with in 1 minute..  Try to get max score on each level.. 2) Quick Search skill :   Increase your brain searching skills by playing this.Blast the balls from high number to low number with in time limit. 5 seconds penalty on each wrong click. 3) Math Skill : Add,subtract,multiply numbers fast in balloon solver. The objective of the game is to pop the balloons with correct answer.     4) Focus Skill:  Increase your focus by controlling your attention. Number will be displayed with rapid pace. Tap the screen after every number except do not tap on withhold number.5) Color Vs BrainColor List will be displayed for few seconds and colors will be be shuffled, remember the colors by putting full concentration before shuffle and arrange them in same order by dragging the items6) Memory Power    Remember the objects which displays only few seconds and reenter them in same sequence.This exercise defiantly challenges you memory power 7) Left Vs Right Brain  Balancing Left and Right brains are very important, playing this game will train your brain on balancing activities   If you are not satisfied with your results, Play this game daily 5-10 min. You may see better results.
descriptionHTML:
Brain Trainer app to quick exercise to your brain short term memory, concentration, focus , speed & accuracy.
it has 15 type of brain training games.

◆ Multitasking brain training .
◆ Quick Search brain training .
◆ Math brain training .
◆ Focus brain training .
◆ Colors Vs Brain
◆ Memory Power Training
◆ Left Brain Vs Right Brain
◆ Remember Faces
◆ Concentration
◆ Quick Decision
◆ Grid Memory Challenge
◆ Listening Memory
◆ Word Memory Challenge
◆ Concentration Plus

1) Multitasking skill: -

Increase your brain multitasking capability by playing this.Questions will be displayed at a time in 2 panels. You have to get target score to finish the level by managing not to loose 3 chances on any panel and with in 1 minute.. Try to get max score on each level..

2) Quick Search skill :

Increase your brain searching skills by playing this.Blast the balls from high number to low number with in time limit. 5 seconds penalty on each wrong click.

3) Math Skill : Add,subtract,multiply numbers fast in balloon solver. The objective of the game is to pop the balloons with correct answer.

4) Focus Skill:
Increase your focus by controlling your attention. Number will be displayed with rapid pace. Tap the screen after every number except do not tap on withhold number.

5) Color Vs Brain
Color List will be displayed for few seconds and colors will be be shuffled, remember the colors by putting full concentration before shuffle and arrange them in same order by dragging the items

6) Memory Power
Remember the objects which displays only few seconds and reenter them in same sequence.
This exercise defiantly challenges you memory power

7) Left Vs Right Brain
Balancing Left and Right brains are very important, playing this game will train your brain on balancing activities


If you are not satisfied with your results, Play this game daily 5-10 min. You may see better results.
developerAddress:
601 Union St. #4200
Seattle, WA 98101
summary: Train your brain for memory,concentration,focus,speed & accuracy. Download now!
title: Brain Training

description: Peppa's Paintbox is a drawing application designed specially for Peppa fans! It brings together traditional drawing tools and some magical surprises that little ones will love. You can draw straight onto canvas or choose a background or character to color in. Peppa and George will pop in from time to time to see how you are getting on and once you are done drawing, you can have your very own exhibition at Peppa's school! Features: 7 paintbrush colors 7 paint tin colors 39 character and prop stickers 10 animated stickers 6 magical drawing tools 3 Peppa backgrounds 3 characters to color in Eraser Choose to play with Peppa or George Exhibition space on the wall at Peppa's school Save your drawing to camera roll No adverts, no in-app purchases, just lots of painting fun!
descriptionHTML:
Peppa's Paintbox is a drawing application designed specially for Peppa fans! It brings together traditional drawing tools and some magical surprises that little ones will love.

comments: I just wanted to play Tetris. Happy to pay for it, was hoping I could pay a $5-10 purchase price and then have the game and play it to my liking. No, need to join the T Club (who comes up with this) and pay an ongoing fee. It's TETRIS from the 80s, EA must you milk everything. Nothing is sacred

Classic tetris with modern graphics, you can use one touch controls or classic directional pad if you wish, both have their own advantage. I am afraid I can't find Bradinsky song. It's okay for me with advisement because EA need something to eat right? Lol

Enjoyed it at first, and short adverts were expected, but recently adverts have become longer, and now last longer than the game. The latest video advert lasted inbetween games lasted 8 mins....ridiculous!!!. I understand the need for adverts, but if you can't play the game, the adverts are pointless, espeacially if it makes players quit.
Great game, but there's an annoying window that pops up everytime I try and start a new marathon. The window is pretty much useless and wastes my time. Would give this 5 stars if it gets patched

Great game and builds on. The original. The only thing stopping it getting the 5* rating is that the ads on it are sometimes several minutes long and at times when they have finished you can't return to the game. I don't mind watching them as I know that's what funds it, but they are putting me off playing now.

Trying to play Tetris with these abysmal touch and swipe controls is an absolute abject mess. Just add some virtual buttons in, since your loot-boxing asses are supposedly so focussed on 'player choice' lately.

descriptionHTML:
Don’t miss out on one of the best-selling mobile games of all time – free to download! Rediscover the world-famous Tetris® game you know and love, with all-new features and ways to play. Keep your lines clear and keep your cool as things heat up in this puzzle game that’s easy to pick up, but difficult to master. This is Tetris®, reimagined.

GO THE DISTANCE IN MARATHON MODE
Create the perfect strategy and keep your lines clear with endless Tetrimino action. Choose between original Swipe and One-Touch controls in this traditional Tetris® mode.

DISCOVER THE TETRIS® GALAXY
Dig for the galaxy’s core using as few Tetriminos as possible in this multi-level puzzle mode. Exchange Coins for Power-ups and transform Tetrimino blockades into amazing rewards.

COMPETE FOR THE TOP
Show off your skills in the new Explorers Mode. Challenge yourself and other players when you go head-to-head with the competition.

TRACK YOUR PROGRESS
Keep a tally of every line you’ve cleared, or link to Facebook to compete with friends in Tetris® Rank. You can even brag about those sky-high scores on your newsfeed!

Requires acceptance of EA’s Privacy & Cookie Policy (privacy.ea.com) and User Agreement (terms.ea.com. Visit http://help.ea.com/ for assistance or inquiries.

comments: The Graphics is super awesome but the controls, it is not worse but it has NO JUMP BUTTON. It also Pay-To-Win game so you need to buy stuff for real money to upgrade your items. I know it is business but made it a friendly free game. Also Pop Up ads like "Buy this thing for the limited offer". Were free gamers not rich gamers.

Well just like the ww2 fps shooter or whatever was the name, i guess everything you guys make is awfull. 20 bullets to kill someone with headshot is funny. I believe you guys wanted to make a parody of shooters. Hahahha well you guys did it. Its funny and laughable and yea a waste of time.

There are many glitches in the game like wall glitch, players can kill through the wall sometimes.  Out of 10 upgrade points only 2 times upgrade will be successful, what the developers want to acheive with this ??? Give me back my upgrade points, I have spent money in this game and dont want to waste my upgrade points like this. Updated - 3 mar 2018  After reaching lvl 30, i am forced to play with higher level players, They are having upgraded equipments and guns making it impossible to defeat them. Fix this Issue or I have to search for some other online FPS game Updated - 4 Mar 2018 - Finally after no reply from developers i have quit this game as I am now forced to play against higher level players , literally this game is all about money.

plz make this game fair play for f2p players...sure this game is pay 2 win.. also one problem is annoying that when i play game mode it automatically freezes screen and i have to exit that round and start new one ,it consumes time ....plz fix this

This game can be hell for tride and true free to play gamers, as this game is pay-to-win. I, myself, am a free to play gamer, and I struggled to reach lvl 12 with the amount of times I had gotten killed by someone who forked over some cash to easily get a legendary AK or L96. Me, however, grinded to get 800 gold for a UMP after a month or so, then I had deleted the game because I couldn't find a game where I had a fair battle with someone in-game. However this game is still nice.

I was a great fan of this game ..I just reached level 30 and now the match making is getting worse ..player at very high level are getting included in the game and they kill with one or two shots as they have a fully upgraded weapon..pls fix this as soon as possible ...it is kinda annoying now.. yet it is a great game but pls fix the match making issues

You know money is very precious can't spend on a game. Please please please please unlock things. Ok bakeries we will do but others you. And yes when I have not reached that bakery then the orders come in which they can be completed in other bakery only?üòüüòû

Nice game... everyone who love cooking should download it. But there is only one problem that the things which are the main are locked and we have to pay the real money or watch s 40 ad. For ex:- In the doll cake we don't have the doll so how are we going to bake it.Please fix this problem, otherwise the game is nice.

At first, I was pleasantly suprised this came from TabTales. The lack of pay walls at the beginning is wonderful for their games. Though I'm not very creative, the game demands it for making food. The graphics look great, gameplay is realistic. I was sad to see a paywal at the princess cake though. If you have 10 dollars and a young girl who loves to cook and bake, by all means buy it for her.

This game is awesome!!!! It makes me go hungry every time I play it!!! The graphics are awesome and very realistic. I luv the fact that it is automatic so you don't have to waste your time in perfection... Please keep it automatic like this forever. P.S, for those who are worried about unlocking other stuff like the princess cake, etc. Well, don't be, you will get a chance to play it when you unlock the other new bakeries and when you also compete in the competitions.... üòâ

Most of the things r automatic so I rate it 3 or 4 stars. Pls guys pls,pls I want u to make it nonautomatic so that we can play it properly .that's all I want to say about this game and most and things are locked these r the two things which I did not like about this game. So guys pls make it properly. Then I will rate it 5 stars for sure. One of the best game I have ever played. Thank u so much

descriptionHTML:
Once upon a time, there was wannabe baker whose dream came true! Enjoy this mouth-watering cake bakery story and help Lizzie fulfill her dream of someday opening up a sweet bakery of her own. Now that day has finally arrived! She's graduating from college, and she's more than ready to get baking some tasty cupcakes. But she needs your help! Have fun opening up lots of yummy bakeries, baking with Lizzie and becoming a true baking professional who’s famous for beautiful, tasty delights!

Help Lizzie open up world-famous bakeries and take specific orders from her demanding customers! Learn how to bake delicious, mouth-watering desserts like cupcakes, smoothies, donuts and cakes! With your assistance, Lizzie will become the most talented pastry chef ever! You’ll just LOVE this tasty bakery story game!

But here’s a little warning - this bakery story game WILL make you hungry!

Features:
> You’ll love this fun cake bakery story game! Help Lizzie open up a cake bakery… and then another cake bakery… and another cake bakery! There’s no such thing as too many bake shops! And definitely no such thing as too many cupcakes!
> Take specific orders from your customers, and serve them with a smile! Make sure they get exactly what they asked for, whether it’s cupcakes, donuts or cakes!
> Learn how to bake tons of desserts from so many yummy recipes, with a professional cake maker!
> Make your cakes extra fancy with colorful cake decorations!
> Dress up Lizzie like the true baker she is! Give her a pretty chef’s hat and a pretty apron!
> Show off your sweet bakery skills and win first prize in baking contests and cake fairs!
> Get ready to bake the tastiest desserts ever, from apple yogurt smoothies to princess birthday cakes, to scrumptiously delicious cupcakes!
> Build up your reputation and become the most famous baker in the world, in this fabulous sweet bakery story game!

comments: Whenever I try to open the app the screen starts flashing black and it'll stay like that or keeping turning back to the screen I was on and off, which ends up somewhat strobe-like. The actual game itself is amazing despite having a hard time trying to beat the bacteria level but, what's the point of a good game concept, if the game won't work properly

I thought the new scenario was a free-trial only like the simian flu. (At least you can unlock it after being a brutal pro at the game) I'm gonna enjoy playing this a good few times and unlock even MORE scenarios. Keep up the good work! I wanted to make a suggestion, but I just can't remember now. Oh well...

The game is addictive but when you get to a certain point the cure kicks in and it stops giving away DNA points and it makes it hard to advance in the game. I have read the hints in the news it gives, but I still can't manage to beat the game. I want to delete the game. Butim going to continue to try. I just wanted to mention it idk if its the game or just me. I won't tell others about the game only because its frustrating to play. These games are not good for people to play that has any type of mental issue unless they want to buy a new phone.

Fun game. I wish the rate of death was more consistent. 37,000,000 a day at one point, but waiting 6 months for 100,000 to die towards the end. The disease didn't change, the rate of death shouldn't decrease just because there are fewer people. Good game otherwise

From beginning to end I've been pleasantly surprised and let down but mainly let down. I was all for this game when it came out but now you wanna make a quick buck on a scenario app... pay more for something that should be part of the game. Overall good game business practices not so much.

I didn't buy the new plague, i might need to. The first 2 difficulty settings are easy, the 3rd not so much. Good game to me! Just have to read what it is that you spend your DNA points on and you should do just fine

descriptionHTML:
Can you infect the world? Plague Inc. is a unique mix of high strategy and terrifyingly realistic simulation.

Your pathogen has just infected 'Patient Zero'. Now you must bring about the end of human history by evolving a deadly, global Plague whilst adapting against everything humanity can do to defend itself.

Brilliantly executed with innovative gameplay and built from the ground up for touchscreen, Plague Inc. from developer Ndemic Creations evolves the strategy genre and pushes mobile gaming (and you) to new levels. It’s You vs. the world - only the strongest can survive!

◈◈◈ #1 top game globally with 200 million+ games played ◈◈◈

Plague Inc. is a global hit with over half a million 5 star ratings and features in newspapers such as The Economist, New York Post, Boston Herald, The Guardian and London Metro!

The developer of Plague Inc. was invited to speak at the CDC in Atlanta about the disease models inside the game!

▶ “The game creates a compelling world that engages the public on serious public health topics” – The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
▶ “Best Tablet Game of 2012” - New York Daily News
▶ “Plague Inc. will snag your attention in all the right ways and keep it there” - Touch Arcade
▶ “No denying Plague Inc.'s high-level of quality” - Modojo
▶ “Plague Inc. should not be as much fun as it is” – London Metro
▶ “Will leave you hoping to destroy the world, all in the name of a bit of fun” – Pocket Lint
▶ “Plague Inc.'s gameplay is infectious” - Slide to Play
▶ Winner – “Overall Game of the Year” – Pocket Gamer
▶ “Killing billions has never been so fun” – IGN

◈◈◈

Features:
● Stunning HD graphics with a highly polished interface (Contagion guaranteed)
● Highly detailed, hyper-realistic world with advanced AI (Outbreak management)
● Comprehensive in-game help and tutorial system (I am Legendarily helpful)
● 12 different disease types with radically different strategies to master (12 Monkeys?)
● Full Save/Load functionality (28 Saves Later!)
● 50+ countries to infect, hundreds of traits to evolve and thousands of world events to adapt to (Pandemic evolved)
● Full game support for scoreboards and achievements
● Expansion updates add the mind controlling Neurax Worm, the zombie producing Necroa Virus, Speed Runs and real life Scenarios!

Localised in English, German, Spanish, Brazilian Portuguese, Italian, French, Japanese, Korean and Russian. (more coming soon)

P.S. Give yourself a pat on the back if you got all the themed literature references!

Special sale price to celebrate being the 15th most popular touchscreen game of 2012!

◈◈◈

Like Plague Inc. on Facebook:
http://www.facebook.com/PlagueInc

Follow me on Twitter:
www.twitter.com/NdemicCreations

comments: Lost another These constant updates caused me to uninstall this. Fun game - very good game!But if it ain't broke don't fix it. I will not sacrifice all the other good games I have for this single one. Now with google only allowing so many apps ( no writing to sd card). Atleast if you update you should let people keep playing with version they have. Make updates optional.

It's a fun game. If you're a COD player you'll love it. In general It does good on it's own as a solid shooter. Only thing I think you really, REALLY need to change is the way to get weapons. Using rentals is great, picking up enemy or ally weapons, sure, but having to spend money to get most weapons, if not all, seems a little unfair. It's good that there's a grind to get them but I think it's a little overkill how difficult it is. I think levels should determine what you unlock, then use silver (make it easier to get) to purchase it. Or, if players want to speed up the process, use gold.

I really like the game. Fun, exciting, and addictive. The only problem I have is that the rewards you get are not nearly enough as I think they should be. Exp gains are good, but cash gains are so bad and you will have to play for hours to accumulate cash and then you can buy HALF of a weapon, because they require a lot of cash to get one. You also can barely upgrade weapons without any gold and you can just forget about that unless you put some real world currency in this game, which is a real shame. As a player I know we would like to buy and upgrade our own weapons instead of having to "rent" which is an option in the game.

Do not install this game! It is broken! For start the spawning doesnt work. You can spawn behind people, in front of people and inside of people who are your enemies. Second is the complete unbalance between premium and standard weapons. You can hit someone with a standard shotgun at close range three times and not kill them. They will then one shot you wherever they hit with a sniper. Dont waste your time people!

One of the dumbest cod ripoff i have seen and played in 2k18 so far. You need 20 bullets to kill someone with head shot. Dont waste your time with this dumb game. Play something else and yea a FREAKING TANK IN A MAP THIS SMALL. like were you under the influence of some substances when you made this game. Wast of time. Dont download this abomination.

Good game. Needs a seeding system. Getting bored of being killed by players 10-15 levels above me. Spawn points need looking at too. Keeps respawning at the same point I just died at. There appears to be some hacked players too. Just shot 1 guy 7 times in the head and he took it and shot me back once which was enough to kill me

descriptionHTML:
WORLD WAR HEROES
Fight soldiers from all over the world in the best World War II online shooter for Android!
This game will take you to World War II, where you’ll able to use military vehicles to conduct battles.

The game features 7 game modes:

✯ Hardcore Mode
Mode increase the damage and makes the game more realistic;

✯ Deathmatch
Free fight for all. You fight for yourself. Player with the highest score wins the round, 1-2 hits and you lost, just like in real life.

✯ Team Deathmatch
Two teams fight for domination. The team with the highest score at the end of the round wins.

✯ Bomb Mode
One team should bring and plant a bomb at the indicated point, the other team must prevent it!

✯ Team Squad
Two teams fight each other with no respawns. The team which has at least one member alive wins.

✯ Team battle on panzers
Two teams are fighting each other for superiority using heavy machinery. The team that has the most points at the end of the round wins.

✯ Custom Modes
Create a game with your own rules! Tell your friends game number in the statistics window when you create a room and play together!


Features:

✯ 7 legendary World War II battles!
✯ 4 types of battle vehicles from different countries: USA, Russia, Japan, and Germany!
✯ 5 game modes and a custom mode with your own rules!
✯ 57 unique weapon types: pistols, assault rifles, machine guns, shotguns and many more!

*Reminder: Join tournaments to win prize, raise your clan!


More features:
✯✯✯ Login to Get Daily Free Gifts ✯✯✯
Login to Get Daily Free Gifts, Login to get Free Daily Quests!
Login to get daily free items. Don’t also miss the bonus EXP and Credits time!
　
✯✯✯ 50+ Weapons, Customize yourself ✯✯✯
50 types of weapons: guns, pistols, tommy-guns, subguns, grenades, rockets and body armors!
Customize your weapon and get a unique test piece – change the color and get all options, from barrels and stocks to scopes.

✯✯✯ Upgrade gear system ✯✯✯
Upgrade your gear and become stronger!
Claim first place and give a headshot to the one who will dare to contest the air!

Regular updates and new elements are waiting for you. This year’s best graphics and perfectly matched sounds will make you spend your time playing WWH!

GOOD LUCK SOLDIER!

comments: It is so amazing i love this game and have had 3 accouts before on it. on my ipad but now i have it on my laptop. I have allways loved it and allways will.    Update suggetion: can you please add  more lvls and every time you go up a lvl you get the same stuff but can unlock more of the game but you can diside what you can ulock as i think this will make it much more funnier.  can you also make the game better by letting ipad users join laptop users in clans as i have wwr on my ipad and laptop but on my ipad i cant join my clan that is on my laptop and its unfair so please can you add this in too. I think it will make the game much better thank you   PLEASE READ!!!!!

I totally like the game and all but there must be balance between different robots especially..... some robots have a big advantage like the haechi with 3 medium slots and its dash ability.. its like u cant even aim at it......  Also please remove the components so that everyone is able to buy newer robots... u can make them available in gold or silver or even workshop points

They have fine a great job with this game. The dynamics, the playability, the graphics, and it feels as if you could never stop growing. Every bot is beast with a certain load out and play style.  Update! After playing for over 3 years, and over many different platforms this game rocks. It's definitely not the mech its the pilot kinda game. The balance is good so if you spend money and level quickly you'll be placed on your mechs rating(mech level + weapon level) so take your time and learn some tactics. Every gun has its purpose but it takes a good pilot to make them work.

Game is designed to milk money out of its players. Fun to play. But $200 for a pretend robot or $100 for a single gun. Lower prices. You might be shocked more people can afford 20 than 200......reply- you think giving someone 15 pieces of a random bot that takes 2 games to earn if you place first out of the 10000 you need. Only real option they give is purchas. Don't be fooled. This is a pay to win game.

I like how the game has gotten better over past year in many ways.. But could you guys quit making the puzzle peice stuff to get newest goodies? I get you added lots of cool ways to get extras that's cool and all.. But who wants 7 puzzle pieces out of 7,000? Not worth the effort. Keep it gold and silver guys!!

Game plays fine. No ability to choose mode is a major letdown. I did the $20 test to see if you can actually buy anything valuable. The answer is no. The game is geared towards the have money people. Update 2/23/2018  The queing is under 10 seconds. After Lunar New Year update you can earn upgrades better.  Discounts on purchase items is better.
description: War Robots is an action-packed multiplayer game with 6 vs. 6 team battles in real-time! Join the ranks of the Metal Warriors! "If you are looking for something new and love robots and multiplayer battles it's worth the download to check it out since initially it won‚Äôt cost you anything." - Droid Gamers"War Robots is an excellent game that works well no matter if you play it on your Android smartphone or tablet, and it‚Äôs such a good multiplayer game that it can give people a competitive challenge while on the move." - AndroidHeadlines"As a high-end, team-based online multiplayer mech game on Android, it's also fairly unique to the platform." - Android PoliceIt's a time of war, pilot! Are you ready for surprise attacks, intricate tactical maneuvers and the many sneaky tricks your rivals have in store for you? Destroy enemy robots, capture all the beacons, and upgrade your weapons to increase combat strength, speed, and durability of your battle robot. Prove yourself in each map and use different strategies and tactics to emerge victorious from battle!MAIN FEATURES:‚Äì 31 battle robots with different strengths;‚Äì more than 20 weapon types, including ballistic missiles, energy and plasma guns. What will you choose?‚Äì many possible combinations of robots and weapons. Create a war machine to fit your own play style;‚Äì create your own clan and lead it to glorious victories;‚Äì join epic PvP battles against rivals from all over the world;‚Äì complete military tasks for bonuses and earn the Best Pilot title.Onward, soldier! Victory is yours!Want to talk about the game or find allies?Join us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/warrobots/Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/WWR_by_PixonicWatch new videos on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/user/WALKINGWARROBOTS Find all about WR on our Knowledge Base: http://faq.wwr.mobi/hc/en-us/Important note: This application requires a stable internet connection.Enjoy the game!

War Robots is an action-packed multiplayer game with 6 vs. 6 team battles in real-time! Join the ranks of the Metal Warriors!

"If you are looking for something new and love robots and multiplayer battles it's worth the download to check it out since initially it won’t cost you anything." - Droid Gamers

"War Robots is an excellent game that works well no matter if you play it on your Android smartphone or tablet, and it’s such a good multiplayer game that it can give people a competitive challenge while on the move." - AndroidHeadlines

"As a high-end, team-based online multiplayer mech game on Android, it's also fairly unique to the platform." - Android Police

It's a time of war, pilot! Are you ready for surprise attacks, intricate tactical maneuvers and the many sneaky tricks your rivals have in store for you? Destroy enemy robots, capture all the beacons, and upgrade your weapons to increase combat strength, speed, and durability of your battle robot. Prove yourself in each map and use different strategies and tactics to emerge victorious from battle!

MAIN FEATURES:
– 31 battle robots with different strengths;
– more than 20 weapon types, including ballistic missiles, energy and plasma guns. What will you choose?
– many possible combinations of robots and weapons. Create a war machine to fit your own play style;
– create your own clan and lead it to glorious victories;
– join epic PvP battles against rivals from all over the world;
– complete military tasks for bonuses and earn the Best Pilot title.

Onward, soldier! Victory is yours!

Want to talk about the game or find allies?
Join us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/warrobots/
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/WWR_by_Pixonic
Watch new videos on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/user/WALKINGWARROBOTS
Find all about WR on our Knowledge Base: http://faq.wwr.mobi/hc/en-us/

Important note: This application requires a stable internet connection.
Enjoy the game!

You really don't have to spend money, as long as you are an active player an devote enough time to it. descriptionHTML:
-Over 3,000,000 Downloads!-
Thanks to your support, we now share the happiness and joy of toy games with millions of players all over the world!

-Description-
Time can change many things, but not everything. Take a time travel to your dearest childhood, continue your unfinished adventure and join this toy game!
Lead your green army soldiers, remote-control planes, rubber ducks, transformers and many other toys to defend your bedroom, hallway, living room and backyard against the invasion of the Evil Legion! To experience a great war game!

-Features-
Lilliputian Toy War:
• Build Headquarters in your bedroom, use the moneybox as your treasury, transport resources with your little train, and collect metal with magnets. Every houseware has its unique function in this toy world!
• Fight the enemies in the kitchen, the living room and even the bathroom! The adventurous and playful battlefields will make war interesting and fun!

Grow Your Army:
• Design and assemble ultimate strategic bomber to strike out your enemies!
• Recruit the elite toys as heroes to lead your army, let the toy war commence!
• Upgrade and promote your green army soldiers, flamethrowers, snipers, tanks, artillery units and many more troops of various types to teach your enemy a lesson!

Expand and Exterminate:
• Compete with real players for more territory, greater power and higher prestige.
• Build fortifications to keep invaders at bay.

Strategize to Win:
• It takes patience and strategic moves. Build and deploy your troops with heroes wisely. With a good strategy, you can defeat enemy troops much bigger than yours in size!
• Outwit your enemy with intelligence and timing rather than brutal force.

Play with Global Players:
• Get to know friends with the same interest and ambition as yours in the alliance.
• Compete or cooperate with other alliances. Diplomacy or War, it’s up to you!
• Chat with players from all over the world without barrier anytime and anywhere.

-We Are Waiting For You!-
Childhood is unforgettable, and the toy soldier game is irreplaceable. Join us in the toy world and it will be a better place with your participation!

PLEASE NOTE: Army Men Strike is free to download and play, Some Game items that can also be purchased for real money. In-app purchases can be disabled through your device’s settings.

Official Facebook Page: https://www.facebook.com/ArmyMenStrike/

Pokfulam Road, Hong Kong, China

description: Get in the car and start your lessons in the most realistic city driving simulator. This game will test your driving skills and it will need your full attention to traffic rules. You have to watch for traffic and pedestrians, stop signs, traffic lights, speed and much more. If you are looking for a real driving experience, Driving School 3D is the game for you.You will learn how to drive a manual transmission vehicles or stick to the classic automatic gearbox. You can pick a simulation in a large open city, country town and open highway. After passing individual levels, you will enter the final exam. On each map and level you will collect points and unlock many different vehicles. In addition to career driving mode, you can also compete with your friends by inviting them to online challenges.UNIQUE SPORT CARSIf you drive carefully and without mistakes, you collect points and unlock different vehicles such as sport sedan or racing car.REALISTIC TRAFFICCity streets can sometimes have heavy traffic so you will have to watch for other vehicles and pedestrians. Driving on a highway can be even more difficult if you are fast so be careful.ONLINE CHALLENGEChallenge your friends in online mode. You drive on a selected map and you have to obey the rules. This way you collect points and when you both arrive to the target parking lot, the better driver wins.GAME FEATURES+ multiplayer mode to race with players around the world+ sport and SUV vehicles to unlock+ more than 50 levels on 3 maps+ smooth car handling and realistic physics+ manual transmission with clutch+ switch cameras on vehicle
descriptionHTML:
Get in the car and start your lessons in the most realistic city driving simulator. This game will test your driving skills and it will need your full attention to traffic rules. You have to watch for traffic and pedestrians, stop signs, traffic lights, speed and much more. If you are looking for a real driving experience, Driving School 3D is the game for you.

You will learn how to drive a manual transmission vehicles or stick to the classic automatic gearbox. You can pick a simulation in a large open city, country town and open highway. After passing individual levels, you will enter the final exam. On each map and level you will collect points and unlock many different vehicles. In addition to career driving mode, you can also compete with your friends by inviting them to online challenges.

UNIQUE SPORT CARS
If you drive carefully and without mistakes, you collect points and unlock different vehicles such as sport sedan or racing car.

REALISTIC TRAFFIC
City streets can sometimes have heavy traffic so you will have to watch for other vehicles and pedestrians. Driving on a highway can be even more difficult if you are fast so be careful.

ONLINE CHALLENGE
Challenge your friends in online mode. You drive on a selected map and you have to obey the rules. This way you collect points and when you both arrive to the target parking lot, the better driver wins.

GAME FEATURES
+ multiplayer mode to race with players around the world
+ sport and SUV vehicles to unlock
+ more than 50 levels on 3 maps
+ smooth car handling and realistic physics
+ manual transmission with clutch
+ switch cameras on vehicle
developerAddress: Zarovnica, Croatia
recentChanges: + bug fixes
summary: How fast can you get a driver's licence?
title: Driving School 3D

description: Run your own Horse HotelHorseHotel makes you the owner of your own horse ranch. Take care of the horses, look after their needs, and discover exciting games, until they return to their owners happy. You are responsible for their health and well-being. There is enough space on your green pastures for up to six horses. Each horse has to be examined in order to see if it‚Äôs healthy. Feed them, nurse them, and play with them. Make sure they have everything they need before they go back to their owners.Exciting horse games and challengesThere are six different horse breeds waiting for you, and each breed has its own individual needs. Take a look at the horse‚Äôs file to find out what exactly the horse needs. This will help you to provide the best care for the horse. If your horse needs more endurance play the obstacle course minigame. If the horse is lacking in confidence, you can build it up with flatwork exercises in the riding arena. To increase its ability, just play the dressage minigame. But one thing all horses have in common: they need your affection, so don‚Äôt neglect to give them treats and pet them!Expand your hotel to take in more guestsTo turn your horse ranch into a luxurious hotel, you will find lots of expansions in the shop which will create more space for more horses. But bear in mind that the bigger your hotel gets, the more demanding your guests will become. Earn more coins by completing missions so you can afford to improve your hotel and take care of more and more horses. Besides maintaining your hotel, caring for your horses is the order of the day: clean out their stables everyday so all the horses enjoy a comfortable stay with you!‚ùÄ Run your own hotel for horses and turn it into a luxurious hotel‚ùÄ Discover exciting minigames‚ùÄ Feed and take care of up to six different breeds of horse‚ùÄ Collect coins, complete quests, and spin the wheel of fortuneVisit us on Facebook: facebook.com/tivolamobile
descriptionHTML:
Run your own Horse Hotel
HorseHotel makes you the owner of your own horse ranch. Take care of the horses, look after their needs, and discover exciting games, until they return to their owners happy. You are responsible for their health and well-being. There is enough space on your green pastures for up to six horses. Each horse has to be examined in order to see if it’s healthy. Feed them, nurse them, and play with them. Make sure they have everything they need before they go back to their owners.

Exciting horse games and challenges
There are six different horse breeds waiting for you, and each breed has its own individual needs. Take a look at the horse’s file to find out what exactly the horse needs. This will help you to provide the best care for the horse. If your horse needs more endurance play the obstacle course minigame. If the horse is lacking in confidence, you can build it up with flatwork exercises in the riding arena. To increase its ability, just play the dressage minigame. But one thing all horses have in common: they need your affection, so don’t neglect to give them treats and pet them!

Expand your hotel to take in more guests
To turn your horse ranch into a luxurious hotel, you will find lots of expansions in the shop which will create more space for more horses. But bear in mind that the bigger your hotel gets, the more demanding your guests will become. Earn more coins by completing missions so you can afford to improve your hotel and take care of more and more horses. Besides maintaining your hotel, caring for your horses is the order of the day: clean out their stables everyday so all the horses enjoy a comfortable stay with you!

❀ Run your own hotel for horses and turn it into a luxurious hotel
❀ Discover exciting minigames
❀ Feed and take care of up to six different breeds of horse
❀ Collect coins, complete quests, and spin the wheel of fortune

Visit us on Facebook: facebook.com/tivolamobile

descriptionHTML:
Welcome to the MultiCraft ― world of unlimited opportunities! The real Adventures are waiting for YOU here!
Built and destroy blocks! Extract Resources and different Stuff that will help you easier to survive!
Choose your side in this world – a Builder (mode Creative) or a Ruthless Hunter, who will do everything to survive (mode Survival)!

► Be careful, in this world not only peaceful Animals, but an awful Monsters too! Win a battle with them and you will get priceless resources!
► Swim across the seas for new lands and resources – lands are unlimited. Exploration their!
► If you decided to survive – keep eye on hunger and fill out it in time! Search for food, grow plants and kill mobs for meat!
► Built your shelter from the monsters and you will survive this night! They are coming for you… Zombies, Skeletons, Huge Spiders and other hostile mobs.
► At any time you can fly to the skies with the mode “flight” or become fast as flash with the mode “acceleration”. But remember, it will take your time!
In this game your actions are unlimited only by your imagination! With MultiCraft you can spend good time everywhere and every minute! And it’s totally FREE!
Do you want to play with your friends? Create your own server (Local Server) or join one of the servers of Minetest. In the nearest future we plan to launch a large number of the non-stop servers of MultiCraft.

In this game they are waiting for you:
⇒ Huge Spiders;
⇒ Insidious Skeletons;
⇒ Strong Zombies and other hostile mobs;
⇒ Red ore and mechanisms;
⇒ A realistic game process;
⇒ Cows, pigs, sheep and other peaceful mobs;
⇒ Hens lay eggs;
⇒ Stable FPS and drawing card without lag;
⇒ High game optimization and the generation of the world for all modern devices;
⇒ A lot of different biomes and the unique topography;
⇒ Incredibly easy operation;
⇒ Completely revised for easy management of the game;
⇒ Single player;
⇒ Multiplayer mode and accelerated flight.

This is an original MultiCraft Open Source Project Open Source, licensed under LGPLv3. License and source code can be found on this site. Before using any part of the project MultiCraft You must fully read the license (attached to the source code).

--- --- ---

descriptionHTML:
Teil 2 des beliebten Spiele-Klassikers Galgenmännchen oder Galgenspiel ist da!

Errate das vorgegebene Wort bevor der Galgen aufgebaut ist und rette das kleine Männchen.
Vermutlich kennt jeder das Spiel aus der Schulzeit und hat schon die ein oder andere langweilige Minute damit überbrückt.

Die beliebte Galgenmännchen App wurde komplett überarbeitet.
Neues Design, bessere Performance, mehr Wörter, neue Animationen, Erfolge und vieles vieles mehr...

# KATEGORIEN #
🌟 Berufe
🌟 Comics
🌟 Computer
🌟 Deutsche Städte
🌟 Film
🌟 Fußball
🌟 Geschichte
🌟 Körper
🌟 Länder
🌟 Marken
🌟 Mode
🌟 Musiker
🌟 Nahrung
🌟 Namen
🌟 Naturwissenschaften / Labor
🌟 Pflanzen
🌟 Promis
🌟 Religion
🌟 Sport
🌟 Städte
🌟 Süßigkeiten
🌟 Tiere

# MULTIPLAYER #
🌟 2-4 Spieler

Spiele gegen deine Freunde im Multiplayermodus. Bis zu 4 Spieler können an einem Gerät spielen und sich messen.

Weitere Updates werden folgen mit neuen Kategorien, neuen Wörtern und anderen coolen neuen Features.

Das Worträtsel ist ausschließlich für deutschsprachige Leute geeignet oder für diejenige, die die deutsche Sprache und Rechtschreibung gerne erlernen möchten. Die kostenlose Galgenmännchen App ist komplett auf Deutsch und für Kinder aber auch Erwachsene geeignet. Das Rätselspiel beinhaltet außerdem einen Multiplayer-Modus. Hier können bis zu vier Spieler gemeinsam Spaß beim Erraten von Begriffen haben. Nachweislich ist Lernen durch Spielen das bestmögliche Lernverfahren und deshalb ist die App optimal geeignet um Deutsch zu lernen und das Gehirn zu trainieren. Durch das tägliche Gehirntraining kannst du deine Stärken und Schwächen in der Rechtschreibung und Wortgewandtheit steigern.
Die App ist für Kinder, Jugendliche und Erwachsene konzipiert, um das Erlernen oder Auffrischen der eigenen Rechtschreibfähigkeiten zu gewährleisten. Durch spielerisches Lernen wird damit nicht nur das Gehirn von Kindern und deren logische Denkfähigkeit trainiert, sondern kann ebenfalls für Erwachsene zu der ein oder anderen guten Erkenntnis führen, wenn es um die deutsche Sprache und Rechtschreibung geht. Außerdem entdeckst du vielleicht auch einen Begriff, der in deinem Vokabular noch nicht vorhanden ist und kannst diesen direkt nachschlagen. Galgenmännchen ist also eine Mischung aus Worträtsel- und Sprachspiel mit dem du kein schlechtes Gewissen haben musst, dass du deine Zeit verschwendest, da du dein Gehirn anstrengst und somit trainierst.
Spiele mit deinen Freunden in der Schule, auf dem Pausenhof, in den Schulferien oder im Schulbus und erfinde Wörter, die deine Schulfreunde erraten müssen und lerne dabei auch noch etwas, womit du intelligenter wirst. Rocke die Schule und habe Spaß mit deinen Schulfreunden. Mit Galgenmännchen spielst du nicht nur ein Spiel, du lernst außerdem für die Schule und deinen späteren Beruf. Viele vergessen, dass Bildung der Schlüssel zur Bekämpfung von Not und Elend ist und deshalb kann nur nahe gelegt werden, dass sich jeder jeden Tag etwas Zeit nehmen sollte, um etwas schlauer zu werden.

# ANLEITUNG #
Beim Galgenraten hast du das gesamte Alphabet zur Verfügung, um ein Wort zu erraten. Ist der geklickte Buchstabe nicht im Wort enthalten, baut sich ein Galgen auf. Gelingt es dir das Wort zu erraten bevor sich der Galgen vollständig aufgebaut hat, gewinnst du. Viel Spaß beim lustigen Wortspiel Galgenmännchen!
Im Mehrspieler-Modus werden abwechselnd Begriffe eingegeben, die die Mitspieler zu erraten haben.

# SUPPORT #
Zögert nicht mit Verbesserungsvorschlägen oder neuen Wörtern. Schreibt einfach an support@nextwebgeneration.de oder besucht die Facebook Seite:
https://www.facebook.com/pages/Galgenmännchen/145954518860869

# BERECHTIGUNGEN #
Die Berechtigungen werden ausschließlich zur Einblendung von Werbung und für die Möglichkeit die Werbeeinblendungen durch einen In-App-Kauf zu entfernen, benötigt.
Galgenmännchen steht kostenlos zur Verfügung.

Viel Spaß beim kostenlosen Quiz, Rätsel und Lernspaß für Kinder und Erwachsene.

Made in Germany :-)

description: #BRINGONTHEMAYHEMWWE Mayhem is bigger & bolder than the rest, with fast-paced mobile arcade action and over-the-top moves!Play as John Cena, The Rock, Brock Lesnar and ALL your favorite WWE Legends and Superstars in this high-flying, in ring, arcade action game. Take your WWE Superstars to the next level in weekly WWE RAW and SmackDown Live challenges!Play through epic matches between WWE Legends and WWE Superstars to determine the greatest of all time, each with their own Signature Moves and Super Specials. SPECTACULAR ROSTERChoose from an ever-growing roster of WWE Superstars and WWE Legends, including: John Cena, The Rock, Andre the Giant, Triple H, Xavier Woods, AJ Styles, Stone Cold Steve Austin, Brock Lesnar, Roman Reigns, Undertaker, Randy Orton, Seth Rollins, Jinder Mahal, Kalisto, Big E and many more.Each WWE Legend and WWE Superstar boasts a distinctive and highly stylized look, adding to the overall spectacle and atmosphere.6 DISTINCTIVE SUPERSTARS CLASSES:Elevate the WWE Action with 6 distinctive character classes. Create a supreme WWE Superstar squad from BRAWLER, HIGH FLYER, POWERHOUSE, TECHNICIAN, WILDCARD & SHOWMAN. Each class comes with unique strengths and fighting advantages. TAG TEAM AND WEEKLY EVENTS:Build your roster of mighty WWE Superstars and join forces with other champions in TAG-TEAM match-ups. Play action-packed EVENTS in sync with real world WWE Live shows like Monday Night RAW, SmackDown Live, Clash of Champions PPV, and monthly Title events.NEVER BEFORE SEEN REVERSALS:Time your reversal perfectly to turn a loss into win! Build your special attack meter throughout the clash and utilize it as a brutal special move or REVERSAL. Be careful though ‚Äì your reversals can be reversed!PLAY WITH YOUR FRIENDS IN EVENTS AND VERSUS MODE:Build your defense with your favorite WWE Superstars and Challenge your friends in Versus Mode. Take your experience to the next level by adding additional WWE Legends and Superstars to your team.REWARDS & BOUNTIES:Aim for the ultimate prize ‚Äì The WWE Championship Title, to gain precious Bonus Rewards with each win. Open your Lootcases to unlock new Character Classes, Gold, Boosts, special prizes, and even high-level WWE Superstars!WWE Mayhem delivers all the adrenaline, thrill, and excitement of a Live WWE Match!  Experience the raw emotion of WWE Action Now ‚Äì DOWNLOAD WWE MAYHEM!This game is completely free to download and play. However, some items can be purchased with real money within the game. You can restrict in-app purchases in your store‚Äôs settings.*Also optimized for tablet devices* Permissions:- READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE: For saving your game data & progress.- WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE: For saving your game data & progress- ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION: To determine your location for region based offers.- android.permission.CAMERA : For scanning QR-Code.Like us on Facebook: www.facebook.com/WWEMayhemSubscribe on YouTube: www.youtube.com/WWEMAyhemFollow us on Twitter: www.twitter.com/WWEMayhemFollow us on Instagram: www.instagram.com/WWEMayhemwww.reliancegames.com/WWEMayhem
