I mean for f@$k sake every two seconds there's an ad. Click on the car buying button there's an ad. Sit there to long there's an ad. I understand this is how you make your money but come on there's a line and you didn't just cross it you swan dived over that bad boy. I'm sorry but I do not recommended this game for anyone.

description: **Google Play Most Innovative Game 2017 - Winner**Test your engineering and improvisation skills in a puzzle game where the stakes are as high as they get. It is you who will construct bridges for cars, trucks, busses... And sometimes even monster trucks. Gather your wits and get on with the construction!During the planning phase the game presents itself with a simple, 2D interface. It is there that you select the best materials for your bridge and connect the dots to make the most resilient structure you can. You can approach each level as a complex puzzle, trying to be as efficient as possible and get the best solution. But don't be afraid to experiment too. You can just go crazy and construct something that looks outrageous but still somehow works. There's fun in both of these approaches.When you're done, switch to the 3D mode and watch a car drive through your bridge. Will it hold? Or will you watch a spectacular crash? In addition to the normal mode the game features the easy mode for more relaxed gameplayed, focused on creativity and improvisation. You can also use in-game hint system if things get too hard. With 30 levels plus hidden and bonus bridges to construct you will not run out of things to do quickly.Game features:- Different materials to build from - Wood, Metal, Cables- 36 levels of increasingly difficult puzzles - Varied, detailed environments full of interactive elements- Multiple cars to test out your constructions- Realistic physics engine - Beautiful, stylised art style- Available in 13 languages
descriptionHTML:
**Google Play Most Innovative Game 2017 - Winner**

Test your engineering and improvisation skills in a puzzle game where the stakes are as high as they get. It is you who will construct bridges for cars, trucks, busses... And sometimes even monster trucks. Gather your wits and get on with the construction!

During the planning phase the game presents itself with a simple, 2D interface. It is there that you select the best materials for your bridge and connect the dots to make the most resilient structure you can. You can approach each level as a complex puzzle, trying to be as efficient as possible and get the best solution. But don't be afraid to experiment too. You can just go crazy and construct something that looks outrageous but still somehow works. There's fun in both of these approaches.

When you're done, switch to the 3D mode and watch a car drive through your bridge. Will it hold? Or will you watch a spectacular crash?

In addition to the normal mode the game features the easy mode for more relaxed gameplayed, focused on creativity and improvisation. You can also use in-game hint system if things get too hard. With 30 levels plus hidden and bonus bridges to construct you will not run out of things to do quickly.

Game features:
- Different materials to build from - Wood, Metal, Cables
- 36 levels of increasingly difficult puzzles
- Varied, detailed environments full of interactive elements
- Multiple cars to test out your constructions
- Realistic physics engine
- Beautiful, stylised art style
- Available in 13 languages
developerAddress:
BoomBit Games
Office 102 - 2 London Bridge Walk
SE1 2SX
London
recentChanges: Improved controls.
summary: Creativity! Logic! Construct bridges and see if they hold! Multiple levels!
title: Build a Bridge!

comments: Great game app!

I love playing slot machine games, and Pop Slots feels like the only game that does not immediately shoot me down when I get a little crazy/ ambitious with my betting. It is the ONLY game I have ever played where I've hit the jackpots on multiple occasions. Now maybe it's all completely luck on my part, but it feels like a game that doesn't immediately take all of your money faster than you can collect it. It's very easy to level up with a good win streak, and those hourly and daily bonus grow pretty quickly. Love this game!

Used to be fun to play when there were decent rewards. For some reason the comp room rewards are gone besides small discount options. Ticket rewards are available for shows nobody would want to pay to see.  I have been playing for a few years now and have saved up quite few loyalty points. I guess we are playing for an occasional comp buffet. What a shame

I like this game..but once i got to a certain level my daily bonus stopped going up.  It has reamined the same and it would be a little more exciting if it would increase the higher you go.  Win or lose is ok with me, it's something to pass free time.

Game is really fun to play probably my favorite, and is the best slot machine app. I've been playing at least 5 years But have recently stopped because it's not fun if you hardly win. And I totally get that it's supposed to be like Vegas, Win some could lose a lot. But it's just a game, it's for entertainment and I get that you can redeem the gold chips for real rewards in Vegas, but that's not why I play. I play because the games and different casinos are fun along with the bonuses. I spend 11 million just to play the pirate gem bonus and only win back 5 million. I could really care less how frequent the gold chips are, you only get 1 in 4ish balloons anyway. I just want to PLAYYY. Especially the bonuses, but it takes forever sometimes for them to be triggered in some casinos. Any chance it can change?

Like almost everyone else on here I loved this game until recently.  Like tonight for instance I was playing mostly the 7s slots.  In less than an hour betting at $120,000 to 180,000 max I went thru 45 million coins!!! I mean COME ON!!!  At the beginning when the payouts are generous I didn't mind purchasing coins,  tickets,  etc... But now forget it not going to spend one more dollar on this game.

descriptionHTML:
Do you love fire and water (ice) style game ?
This game made for you : Luckyboy and PrettyGirl - Crystal Temple Maze.
One of best game adventure. One of best teamwork game . One of best Maze game !
Lucky boy and his lover (Pretty Girl - Ice girl) , who go with him, is a puzzle adventure game for two players.
It's an addicting and very fun to play with your kid or your lover or your friend.
Control and move Lucky boy and Ice girl through the maze in the Crystal Temple and collect all the diamonds.
This game duet bested the trials of three other ancient temples or wats.
Now they face the most mysterious one yet!
Help Fire and Water kid get through each level quickly in this challenge game.
Use the uric acid to teleport and gather gems for bonus items.
Be sure to keep Lucky boy out of the water puddles.
You have a long and difficult way of saving the planet!
Do not waste your time, and get started your journey now!

How to play :
1. Avoid obstructions.
2. Just tap the button "Change" to change from Pretty girl to Luckyboy
3. Collect gems many as you can keep him more robust..

descriptionHTML:
Wie würden Sie sich als Kandidat bei „Wer wird Millionär?“ schlagen? Mit der offiziellen Trainingslager-App zu Deutschlands beliebtester Quizshow können Sie jetzt Ihr Allgemeinwissen testen!

▶ Mit 15 Fragen zum Punkte-Millionär
Das Quiz folgt dem gleichen Spielprinzip wie die RTL-Show mit Günther Jauch: Meistern Sie zuerst eine Sortieraufgabe, um es auf den WWM-Kandidatenstuhl zu schaffen. Dann warten auch schon 15 knifflige Fragen mit je vier Antwortmöglichkeiten auf Sie. Können Sie alle Fragen richtig beantworten und sich die Million schnappen?

▶ 40.000 Original-Fragen
Beweisen Sie Ihr Wissen bei aktuellen WWM-Fragen oder lassen Sie sich auf ein zufälliges Spiel ein – Sie haben die Wahl. Oder möchten Sie mal eine Rätsel-Runde aus einem der Prominenten-Specials nachspielen? Kein Problem! Nach jeder Show wird die App um brandneue Fragen erweitert. Bei insgesamt über 40.000 Original-Fragen aus „Wer wird Millionär?“ wird Ihnen nie langweilig – egal, wie oft Sie spielen.

▶ Alle Joker & Risikovariante
Natürlich können Sie bei jedem Spiel den 50:50-Joker, den Publikumsjoker und den Telefonjoker zur Hilfe nehmen. Wollen Sie mit Zusatzjoker spielen? Dann wählen Sie die Risikovariante aus. Doch Vorsicht: So verzichten Sie auf die Sicherheitsstufe bei 16.000 Punkten und müssen sich bei einer falschen Antwort mit 500 Punkten zufriedengeben.

▷ Sind Sie bereit für spannende Quiz-Runden? Holen Sie sich jetzt die kostenlose „Wer wird Millionär?“-App und los geht’s! ◁

Bei Feedback zur App freuen wir uns über Ihre Nachricht über unser Kontaktformular: https://www.rtl.de/kontakt

comments: Most puzzles are self explanatory. The odd few appeared to be impossible without some instruction. Few levels I had to skip probably around 7 levels. Couple due to pieces not moving or stuck. Very happy to be able to skip levels.  Would have been great to have a certain bank of hints for some of the  difficult ones. I found the later levels easier than the ones around 100. Max levels 120. Great fun!

Not responsive to most touches. I finally got a cheat only to realize it was the game.  Ads were not frequent but had a strobe light going off (health issues) and would not turn off. Had to close out of the game every time so I just quit playing. Typo many similar more challenging games out there to try and work with this one.

Some things are hidden in such a place makes it hard on note 8 due to curved screen. Level 89 doesn't work, as well as other levels where touching the same place over and over and over might get something to work.  Most puzzles are extremely easy,  it's just a matter of the game not working.

Good concept but a lot of the puzzles are stupid or they totally don't work unless you restart the game which is annoying. There's so many glitches I felt like uninstalling so many times! I'm just glad it's over so i can get rid of this app. 3/10 wouldn't recommend
Fun and challenging for awhile, but I found most of the levels after 50 impossible to figure out without a cheat sheet. Got frustrating. I'm at level 60 and about ready to throw in the towel.

I play this game in 2hrs and got stuck on level 42. It's challenge your mind. It's good for you, if you like doing brain games.. It helps you think about.. Like you really have to think about it or you will get stuck. But all the above, it's a awesome awesome game.

description: Flight Simulator: Fly Plane 3D is an awesome new 3D Airplane Simulator game, become the pilot and fly your commercial jet to the destination. Guide and steer your plane through all of the waypoints to ensure you head to the correct destination, go through all of the waypoints and land at your destination airport within the time limit to earn yourself more pilot stripes. When arriving at your destination zone, slow the plane down and prepare for landing, be careful not to crash! Guide your plane towards the runway and park within the marked zone to complete the level. While parking your plane, be very careful to avoid the buses, helicopters etc parked along the run way.

How many times in a row can you score? Let's try your skills and you will be not bored in an office anymore.

Features:

* Dificulty levels - Easy, Medium, Hard
** Have fun in office environment.
*** Great sound effects
*** Highscores and History for your winning streaks
**** Use Mouse (Point and click)
summary: Aim and throw your boring paperwork into the office trash can!
title: Flick a Paper

description: This is the official port of Five Nights at Freddy's 2: Demo version! The demo lets you play night 1.Please note that this game REQUIRES 512 megs of ram. Please make sure that your device will be able to run it before purchasing it. If you have a newer phone then this shouldn't be a problem!--------------------------------------------------------------------------------Welcome back to the new and improved Freddy Fazbear's Pizza!In Five Nights at Freddy's 2, the old and aging animatronics are joined by a new cast of characters. They are kid-friendly, updated with the latest in facial recognition technology, tied into local criminal databases, and promise to put on a safe and entertaining show for kids and grown-ups alike!What could go wrong?As the new security guard working nights, your job is to monitor cameras and make sure nothing goes wrong after-hours. The previous guard has complained about the characters trying to get into the office (he has since been moved to day-shift). So to make your job easier, you've been provided with your very own empty Freddy Fazbear head, which should fool the animatronic characters into leaving you alone if they should accidentally enter your office.As always, Fazbear Entertainment is not responsible for death or dismemberment.
descriptionHTML:
This is the official port of Five Nights at Freddy's 2: Demo version! The demo lets you play night 1.

Please note that this game REQUIRES 512 megs of ram. Please make sure that your device will be able to run it before purchasing it. If you have a newer phone then this shouldn't be a problem!

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------


Welcome back to the new and improved Freddy Fazbear's Pizza!

In Five Nights at Freddy's 2, the old and aging animatronics are joined by a new cast of characters. They are kid-friendly, updated with the latest in facial recognition technology, tied into local criminal databases, and promise to put on a safe and entertaining show for kids and grown-ups alike!

What could go wrong?

As the new security guard working nights, your job is to monitor cameras and make sure nothing goes wrong after-hours. The previous guard has complained about the characters trying to get into the office (he has since been moved to day-shift). So to make your job easier, you've been provided with your very own empty Freddy Fazbear head, which should fool the animatronic characters into leaving you alone if they should accidentally enter your office.

As always, Fazbear Entertainment is not responsible for death or dismemberment.
developerAddress:
Mill Creek DR
Salado, TX 76571
recentChanges: Bug fixes.
summary: Welcome back to the new and improved Freddy Fazbear's Pizza!
title: Five Nights at Freddy's 2 Demo

comments: I Personally would like to have the ability to upgrade stars on heroes easier without spending real money. Get 2 to 3 stars on the characters for free leaves me wanting, and im just not spending money on a game like this. Otherwise it is a fun game. Even though it basically can be a full time job you dont make money on and have to spend money on. So if you dont mind commiting months to barely make it to do the late game stuff amd still have to spend months to progress. This game will be great. This review is for those who play ftp games without actually paying to win.

So it's kinda fun but I'm rating it low based on the cost of purchasing character shards versus how many you get. I tested it out and purchased a ton of purple diamond things and purchased character shards that gives between 5 and 330. Out of 7 purchases at 1299 each, I got a total of 41 shards. So for roughly 9100 diamonds, I get 41 shards. You do the math. This game apparently enjoys taking your money. I've mentioned this to the developers with no reply. DC Legends knows what they're doing when it comes to purchases of character shards. At least they make it easier

I love this game but an issue im having since the newest update os why im giving 2 stars at the moment. Ever since the update the game will not load. Says "loading cantina" then closes the app completely. Im gonna end up getting kicked out of my guild...please fix this! Soon as its fixed it will return it to 5 stars bc the overall game is badass!

Very addictive. I started playing casually, and 4 weeks later I find myself checking it all the time. It's best played with at least a minor investment, but reasonably ftp...if you got patience.  Add: it's been six months, and I'm still hammering away at it. It has a huge base of fans,and I've only needed customer support once (and they handled my issue very well and quickly).  Still a bit grind-y, but great little bit of clicky gaming.

The game is fun enough but to sync it with your Google account to have to give your phone and all its abilities to EA. Why is there a need for the game to access my photos and make and answer calls? How 'bout I play a game on my phone with cool light sabers and fun music and when I need to make a call I'll stop for a bit. Just let people play and EA can make bank with their microtransactions. GTFO of people's personal info.

Great way to spend down time at work or at home. Really enjoy playing as characters from both light and dark side teaming up and defeating others. It does take awhile to get charcters leveled up. However can spend some money if you don't want to grind. However I find it rewarding grinding each day to get what i want.

descriptionHTML:
“Visually striking and with adrenaline-pumping Star Wars™ music, Galaxy of Heroes is a must-play for fans for the franchise.” – USA Today

"The best Star Wars™ game to release for mobile devices in recent memory." – Gamezebo

Live your Star Wars™ dreams as you fight with your favorite dark and light side heroes across iconic locations to become master of the galaxy. Create and customize your dream squad using characters from every era, including new characters from Star Wars™: The Force Awakens, Rogue One™: A Star Wars™ Story and Star Wars™: The Last Jedi™. Engage in epic turn-based war, confront giant bosses, progress your characters, and take your game to the next level!

CREATE THE ULTIMATE TEAM
Rebel leaders? Empire stalwarts? It’s your choice as you construct elite light and dark side teams while collecting heroes and other characters from the Star Wars™ universe. Make key strategic moves and pick teammates with complementary abilities to go to war with unbeatable squads!

BECOME MASTER OF THE GALAXY
Defeat opponents and rise to the top as you dominate the galactic hologames in a far-off cantina. Upgrade your heroes’ abilities as you play for even more powerful attacks and bigger wins. Then fight other players in Squad Cantina Battles, PvP Squad Arena, and Squad Tournaments to achieve greatness.

PLAY WITH POWERFUL CHAMPIONS
Make smart, tactical decisions and equip your heroes with the ultimate gear to enhance their damage in galactic war. Unlock fun abilities to make your team unstoppable as you unleash commanding moves like Luke Skywalker’s Bullseye, Jedi Knight Anakin’s Reckless Assault, and others.

ENGAGE IN EPIC SHIP BATTLES
Collect iconic starships and massive Capital Ships to construct your war fleets. Attack all-new challenges, fight through space, and compete in the Fleet Arena to test your prowess. Gather unique upgrade materials for characters, available only as rewards for Ship battles. Each vessel also has its own crew, adding special powers to individual Ships. Recruit powerful characters to create the strongest armada!

RISE TO THE TOP IN GUILDS
Lead Raids with friends and fight against bosses like the Rancor and AAT Tank when you create a customizable Guild. Collaborate with your Guild in Territory Battles where members unleash their entire arsenal of characters and ships against a progressively evolving battlefield. Show your dominance when you face off against other Guilds to conquer territories and top global leaderboards in Territory War.

Terms of Service: http://terms.ea.com

Privacy and Cookie Policy: http://privacy.ea.com

Game EULA: http://tos.ea.com/legalapp/mobileeula/US/en/OTHER/

Visit http://help.ea.com/en/star-wars-galaxy-heroes/star-wars-galaxy-heroes/ for assistance or inquiries.

EA may retire online features after 30 days’ notice posted on www.ea.com/1/service-updates.
developerAddress: Geneva, Switzerland
recentChanges: Get excited ‚Äì everything you love just got better! Now you can:
‚Ä¢ Earn the right to multi-sim Galactic War and Ship Challenges
‚Ä¢ Receive bonus banners based on combat performance in Territory Wars
‚Ä¢ View which Territory War defensive squads were most successful
‚Ä¢ Search for units by name when selecting your squad
‚Ä¢ Set inactive units as favorites and search favorites easier
‚Ä¢ Link accounts to play between Android and iOS devices
‚Ä¢ View an improved ‚ÄúRaids Ticket (Daily)‚Äù leaderboard
summary: Collect and battle with iconic heroes to become the top hologamer in the galaxy!
title: Star Wars‚Ñ¢: Galaxy of Heroes

LOTS of attempted upsells, but its free to play features ain't too bad on their own, either. All in all, a decent little bowling game.

It's a  fun game but it's rigged. I think if you have a billion chips you shouldn't be able to play on lower lanes. I thought you were supposed to be matched up with people who are the same or close level. How is it I'm bowling against someone who is level 171 and 8 billion chips and  I'm level 43 .

Amazing.  It's just fun watching the bowling hall whizz by and get a strike.  I've played and uninstalled this game, but the only reason for the uninstall part is storage.  For all of you who are new, try getting the ball between the front pin and either of the pins next to it, it usually gets strikes, but by strikes I mean doubles against level 7 Russians.

This is a fun game however it allows people to cheat or it's rigged. It's no coincidence that the better I play the better my opponent plays. I think half the time we are playing a rigged computer. I spent $50 on this app in a week and I am deleting it now. Sorry crooked people that run this app.

comments: Overall super fun game and I'm really enjoying it, however some of these levels are really easy, and then there are others that are super challenging and nearly impossible to find out. I just wish there was a difficulty setting so you start off with easier games and then it could get harder as it progresses, because at the moment I can't pass 70% of the levels without using hints.

They made me misspell Rabbids, including "games" like Sword Art Online and Attack on Titan, and had obscure art that gave really bad visualization of very simple things. Just play a better trivia game. Moreover. Don't give us awful games like Unity, Watch Dogs, and League of Legends. Anime is anime. Video games are video games. Video game adaptations of anime are still, at there core, anime. Leave those out of these kinds of apps.

Legit only mobile games its not I gaming quiz. They could of at least put more console or pc games who would even know all of the mobile games out there.aswell if you don't know it you will have to watch a add that can be 1min long. You might as well just watch youtube or twitch.

comments: The usual city builder game that's easy to build up your castle/city way faster than it's other counterparts. The people I've met on this game were pretty kind, the battle simulating is a nice touch which I haven't seen anywhere else. Sad that I only get to see like 3/4 models of the same monsters though.

Been playing game for couple of days, enjoying it so far. Lots to do, build times not to long at start, graphics good. Love the fact that in game purchases are there if you want them but you are not pushed to buy. Game plays well on my Samsung tablet and LG phone. Been playing for months now, still love it, definately not a play to win if you get into a good alliance

After playing mobile strike for a solid year, that game is really expensive if you want to be at the top with the big dogs. And this game seems great to where you don't have to spend much and actually enjoy the game. The graphics on her are amazing. I would suggest playing this game to all. üëçüëä

This is a war game where no one wants ts to fight. Don't try attacking anyone bigger than you. They won't fight you back, they will just attack your buildings, which you won't be able to defend. It costs real money to avoid having them destroyed. Spend your time and money somewhere else.

When I first downloaded it promised you didn't need to pay to win and that hackers would be felt with - that was a lie. If your not prepared to spend a lot of money your just going to get wiped out by those who do or their hacker friends. This game isn't worth the time and data needed to play until there is a level and fair playing field.

It is a scam game. You have users that work for the company and set up different realms but same players the force purchases. They then sell old accounts and start New realms. Money goes over seas to like turkey and russia.

descriptionHTML:
Google Play’s Carnaval - Festive updates you can’t resist

Build your own world in this strategy war game! War and Order is the perfect fusion of real time strategy, tower defense, and castle building games and has received several Global Google Recommendations.

Orcs, elves, and mages are yours to command in a gorgeous 3D medieval game world. Raise a massive fantasy army for HUGE fully animated battles. Clash with enemies from all over the world in real-time! Choose your alliance and take castles, slay monsters, and stake new territory as a tribe! This is WAR, and there’s never a dull moment as your screen lights up with constant new battles, chats, and upgrades!

You must battle to become more powerful than any king in history in this dangerous war game. It’s up to you, your strategy, and your allies to conquer an endless world of empires and imagination.

★HOMELAND
• Recruit and train over 50 fantasy soldiers, uniting Orcs, Elves, Humans, Mages, Beasts, and Angels.
• Your ultimate building game: Construct and upgrade tons of buildings for new soldiers, buffs, and resources!
• Research new magic and technology FAST for cutting-edge tactics and weapons!

★ALLIANCE
• Friend, feud, and chat with players from around the world in real time.
• Fight and build together to conquer enemies and build castles you could never hold alone.
• Share and expand territory for exclusive bonuses!
• But remember! This is a war strategy game. Tust no one!

★CONFRONTATION
• Sweep the battlefield in huge real-time PvP matches!
• Build your force to leviathan proportions!
• Engulf other lords’ castles as you expand your territory.

★CONQUEST
• Command and conquer other players’ castles to plunder their resources and climb power rankings!
• Vanquish roaming monsters for their treasures, from man-eating Ogres to massive Dragons.
• Play castle defense games and protect yourself and your allies from would-be conquerors.

★EMPIRE
• Not just a one castle game: Take over the Royal City to rule over the realm with unheard of power and privileges!
• Explore unknown lands to find elite resources, ancient ruins, and more surprises!
• Grow your alliance territory for richer rewards and resources!

Follow War and Order on Facebook:
https://www.facebook.com/WarandOrder1/
developerAddress: 1201 Orange street, suite 600, Wilmington DE, USA
recentChanges: Google Play‚Äôs Carnaval - Festive updates you can‚Äôt resist
1. Accounts can now be bound to multiple 3rd party services! A single game account can now bind 2 third-party login methods.
2. Optimized push notifications.
3. Optimized Elite Wars declaration requirements: Cannot declare on alliances that will battle within 2 hours.
summary: Build a fantasy empire! Orcs, elves, amazing graphics. Battle players worldwide!
title: War and Order

comments: This game is perfect for anyone who loves magic, fantasy, collecting, and a whole new level of adorable! Dragonvale takes everything to the next level! I highly recommend it, as it is a amazing game, my most played, and I hope everyone else enjoys it just as much as I do. Five stars! üåüüåüüåüüåüüåü Edit 2: I was re-organizing my islands by Element the other day, and I had just finished the Plant Island. I put down a Oversized Oak Tree, and immediately, a image flashed through my mind: a young girl, sitting on a branch of the oak tree, a book in one hand, a baby Plant dragon sitting next to her. Stretched out in front of them was my Plant Island, the dragons freely soaring, the other islands in the distance. And that sparked a inspiration in my head. I just wanted to ask; can I write a Dragonvale book, which takes place at my park? Please let me know !  :)

Cmon Backflip! Okay look I love Dragonvale, I've been playing it forever. First off I lost my amazing park a while back and that really sucked. But now I am restarting and I go to buy the beginners pack for 9.99 and it says there was an error and i wont be charged...come to find out it did charge me and i didnt receive anything! Please help

I have been playing for a while. After events you get a day to turn in your event specific currency for the prizes, even though the event has ended. Well for Gardenia's event, it turned in all my roses before I could exchange them. I had over 25,000 and was so pumped to get the new dragons. Now I don't have any roses and 25,000,000 extra coins i don't need. Please help. This is a very frustrating bug.

I really love collecting all of the dragons and the fact that you can theme/decorate your park too. But the amount of types of decorations are unbalanced, the majority that you can currently buy in the market are just plant and earth type while there are very few decorations of the other types (such as air, cold, etc).

When I first had it it was super fun. Then I saw a game I wanted so I deleted it I did that before and got it back I could log into facebook and go to my old island. But this time I could not. I was so far and looking forward to seeimg my dragons but it did not let me go to my old island. It left me im tears that I had to do what I did all over again. So I deleted this stupid game and gave this. If I could rate 0 I would

its ok, and you might think you cant li e without it, but trust me.... after a while year of playing, which is what i have waited to wrote this review, the game play becomes very repetitive. sure try it out, its fun, but not something for the rest of your life. dont put money into it, you will regret ir later.

description: Our lovely girl is getting married! She has dreamed about her wedding day since she was a little girl and now the moment has finally come. Enter one of the most elegant wedding games and help the bride and bridesmaids prepare for this special event.Getting ready for a wedding is not easy, it requires some effort and fashion sense. Our wedding game for girls has 4 levels, discover all the things you can do! The bride is going to be the center of attention, you should start with her! Enter the makeup salon and try on lovely shades of lipstick, eyeshadow, eyeliner and mascara. Create a delicate makeup look for the bride to be! After that, visit the hair salon and make sure she gets the perfect hairstyle.The most important part of a bride look is the dress. Enter the wedding dress up level and choose carefully. The dressing room is filled with all types of amazing wedding gowns and you can try all of them before you decide which one looks best on the sweet girl. Whatever you like, you will find it at the wedding fashion salon. Don't forget to pick a nice flower bouquet and a bride veil.The bridesmaids will also need a fashion adviser, don't forget to play dress up with them too. You can pick matching outfits or completely different clothes for each girl. Even though the bride is the most important person at the wedding, the bridesmaids will also need to shine. Do your best as a wedding stylist!Classy Wedding Salon game features:üíê a gorgeous bride and 3 bridesmaidsüíê makeup, hair and dress up game levelsüíê wedding themed makeup, hairstyles and clothing items (dresses, blouses, skirts and lots of accessories)üíê girly graphics and intuitive gameplayüíê free to play wedding gameüíê fun and safe for little girlsüíê no wifi gameThe wedding will start soon and these lovely girls need you! Join them right away in one of the most amazing wedding games. Do the bride's makeup, style her hair and find the perfect wedding dress. Then, explore different fashion options with the 3 bridesmaids. You will never get bored of this game for girls, give it a chance and let the fun begin!

upgrade spinners to boost our spinner coin production to unlock more superheroes spinners in your inventory.unlock spinners for more upgraded functionality.

Game Features :

- Realistic Superheros fidget spinner simulator with Avengers theme.
- Bunch of superhero spinners including avengers like SpiderMan, Superman, Batman, IronMan, Thor, Hulk, CaptainAmerica spinners.
- You Can Upgrade/unlock any spinner to boost our coin production.
- Glow, laser and neon graphics have shown even more details of the spinners
- Unique effects of every spinner make this SuperHero fidget spinner more eye feasting.
- compete on global leaderboards.

How To Play :

- swipe left/right or swipe circular on the screen to spin the fidget spinner
- Timer Mode: can spin the Fidget spinner within a particular time.
- Spin Mode: can spin the fidget spinner as much we can.
- You can unlock fidget spinners by getting coins through spinning.

comments: I like it a lot but I hate how the drawings are so linked with pokemon go. I hate pokemon go!!!!! The graphics are okay but I wish they were a bit better quality. I wouldn't recommend this game if you don't like colouring. It's ok!!!!

I love this app! It's sooo good. And its brilliant for when your bored. But its a little hard sometimes to go over the lines with our fingers as the lines are so thin. But overall I think it's a fantastic app!

I think there should be more cartoons to draw and color. And it should not always be right colors to trace it in. Also i think that one small part of the picture shouldn't color the whole background, because what if you didn't want them bother the same exact color, because no affence, but it looks weird and ugly sometimes. Sorry for no compliments.                    LOVE, YOUR DEAR FRIEND!!!

It's a great app however it keeps crashing and I have to start the drawing all over again. The whole app stops and my drawing starts over and it's really annoying. If this gets fixed I will definitely rate 5 stars

I like it because it teaches young artists how to draw animated characters such as Pok√©mon Avengers Princess and loads more characters from movies like Snow white and the seven dwarfs and Toy story 2! Overall it is a brilliant app for boys and girls of all ages!

comments: I can't tell you how long I've been looking for a decent game. Literally weeks. I came acrossed this one from a Facebook add and as soon as I started playying it has been super fun every since. The p2w ratio is literally not high at all. So F2P can definitely gain just ad much. Awesome gameplay good graphics for the game itself overall I definitely recommend this game. ‚ô°

This is one of the best rpgs out there in my opinion for a few reasons the graphics are very nice, rpgs whos graphics try to get really realistic are just not the same it looks blan likr that. My next reason is it isnt a pay to win game. For all of the people out there who like to pay a lot of money, its just dum. Money for a game should only be for cosmetic items to make you look really cool not to boost you 10 tens ahead of everyone, and for that I thank you Allstar gaming. Paying does get you a boost in game its just not very big the only reason rating s are so bad is cuz the top up didnt give them anything which is a huge bug.

Had a question about something and got response from koram games that they want free to play players and paying members on same page! What an insult. Not to mention we can't shut off vip status I regret ever spending in this game! No gratitude for the customer we are treated like dirt. Not to mention we payers get harassed in game by free to play players daily! Show some respect to the people who give you a pay check.

Non auto PvP. Not enough room on a phone screen for 360 group fight. When you can't even see your toon in the dogpile of toons to know which button to hit. And you burn thru stam in higher levels in an hour
At the beginning there is no setting menu to turn off the annoying music, but there is a menu to give them money for VIP status. That's all I need to know this is a cash-grab.

This game is awesome and a lot of fun. I've been playing for about a week and I can't stop playing it all day everyday. I'm looking forward to getting to higher levels and getting more good loot. Thanks for making this game!

descriptionHTML:
Your favorite characters in a brand new adventure;
In this new world, you are our only hope!

● After 14 years, Seal Online From Korea is Back!
The classic returns!
Finally play Seal Online in multiplayer mode on your mobile – a whole new story with a brand new experience!

● 3 Classes Are Back: Knights, Priests and Jesters!
An improved world-view with more exciting levels to challenge.
Upgrade your character, choose skills, gear and train pets.
Alliance system, World Boss gameplays, Arena, Survival challenges, Magic Beanstalk, and more for you to explore!

● Hide the Cleavers! Rascal Rabbit is Back!
Train pets and take them with you – over 40 kinds, all cute yet deadly!
Ride your mount into battle; no need to tire your little legs anymore...

● Hundreds of Costumes; Dress to Impress
Wondering what to wear today? Change costumes according to your mood.
Loads of fashion and accessories to choose from. If you can imagine it, we’ve got it!

● Say Goodbye to Singledom – Let’s Get Married!
Tired of being single? Try out the in-game wedding system.
Earn intimacy points and propose to the object of your desire.
Hold a wedding banquet, choose your wedding dress and invite your friends to witness your special occasion!

Chat with players in-game using text or voice messages.
The fairest trading system around; perfect for making new friends!

comments: I think its a great way to connect. This game can truly show you what you know about music, and how forgetful really are.As long as you have a good internet connection youre fine. It is both good for Iphone and androisld users. The only thing bad about it was that your profile picture takes super long to load, so I gave up on that.

I love this game, however recently I've been seeing a ton of video ads. It pops up everytime I go to choose my playlist. All these years playing this game and I've never had this issue before. It is very annoying

Very fun.  I wish I could just do the Party games though.  They are much more fun as I prefer competing with a number of people, not just one.  Too hard to get enough tickets, though!  I get discouraged when no tickets/videos are available.
Love this game! If you love music I really recommend downloading it. If your not so great at guessing songs then at least your getting music recommendations! Keep up the work guys
Forced closed every five minutes in the middle of a game. Slowed my phone down. And made it extremely laggy and hot. Said I would put a bad review if it didn't stop. Here you go!

Would be fantastic but it's sooooo damn laggy. My net is super fast, as is my phone but there's so many games the song plays without letting me click the answers or the answers are still sliding into view. Taking me 10 secs to answer a song I knew within the first damn bar. Absolutely infuriating. Surely the app should preload everything before making you start or perhaps it's just poorly made. The original was never like this and I'm sure it had a different developer. Also, I can't even change my pic, whenever I try it just freezes up. Very poor when it could be so much better.
